title: GTA San Andreas (Re-ported)
text:
This map is a ported replica of the area around Idlewood in Los Santos, San Andreas. GTA San Andreas is an old and still quite popular game (especially so online version known as SA-MP). The map was created a few years back as a survival hunger games map for the Minecraft: Java Edition but has since been ported to Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.

The map was actually originally built for hunger games but you can also just explore it for fun.

# What has been updated?

• Re-ported, fixed weird shadow bugs

# Creator

• Creator: Raymancaster
• Ported by: MrMvBPE

title: Command Blocks Boss
text: This map uses command blocks to spawn in mobs that you have to fight in an arena. This arena is being controlled by a command block on a golden throne. So the question is, can you beat it?

title: The Secret Laboratory
text:
Command block creation map for people that want their own place for making YouTube videos, redstone or command block creation or maybe even small builds. Follow me on twitter for more content like this and many many others:
https://twitter.com/AdrianSt18

title: Glowing Caverns
text:
You travel to the Glowing Caverns to find and acquire eight chunks of wool. The wool is needed for the building of a monument in the village you are from and you were sent to the Glowing Caverns alone to finish the task, but what you didn’t know was that there were others in the cave.. waiting for you.

Alone in a chilly place you need to fight your way through mobs and such to get the wool and fast get out of there and home to your village.

title: Growing Town
text:
This map features a modern town that is still under construction. The town has already been completed with houses, shops, hotels and malls, and more can be updated in the future.

# What’s new?

• Added Theme Park

title: Football Stadium
text:
The football stadium is the main focus created in this map. It’s a rather small stadium but the details and realism is on high. And to clarify, the stadium is not for American football but for European football, also often referred to as soccer.

Besides the stadium there is also a small city surrounding the stadium consisting of e.g. a big hotel with more than 250 rooms.

[Features]

• Hotel with 256 rooms
• Football Stadium
• Small city buildings

title: Trampoline House
text:
This map includes a small house with a snow capped trampoline.

If you want to visit the creator's YouTube channel, tap the name of the creator at the top.

title: Survival Water Base
text: This map features a survival base built on the waterfront. The base is a total of three floors, with facilities and items for survival on each floor. The default mode in this map is creative, but it is also good for enjoying the survival mode.

title: Seven Parkour
text:
This is a parkour map with seven different levels.

Depending on which way you choose between the two roads, the difficulty is divided between easy and hard.

Creator: R_billine
Assists: JangHosick

title: Survival Houses
text:
This map is suitable for anyone who want to start a new survival adventure.

There are two versions available for download.

• SSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: The Line Runner
text:
Welcome to The Line Runner, a parkour map that tests your knowledge of mazes and perception and mixes it with parkour.

This map is remake of PC map.

title: Mini Mansion
text:
Mini Mansion (Dream Mansion)

From the outside the mansion looks extremely small. It’s situated on an island in the water. Surrounding the mansion is a thick hedge and secure bars to protect the resident from zombies and other creatures that might want to try and break in. In other words it’s the perfect house to barricade yourself from the outside world.

The house got multiple floors and is nicely decorated with flowers, joyful colored rugs and even TVs and an old library.

There are two versions available for download.

• Pamplemousse texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: Zombie Survival - Nacht Der Untoten
text:
Zombie Survival - Nacht Der Untoten (Night of the Living Dead)

A zombie survival map inspired by Call of Dury Zombies. This map has features similar to those in the COD Zombies Series such as: weapons you can purchase, doors you can purchase to unlock, the mystery box, juggernog and a well working wave system that can even tell you what wave you are one at the bottom of your screen. It is suggested to keep difficulty at easy for simulations sake. The zombies have a modified damage using command block and if the difficulty is set to hard occasionally zombies will spawn with weapons and sometimes its possible they can 1 hit the player. Also a tip, watch out for the baby zombies!

title: Jungle Town
text: This map features a town in the middle of the jungle. The town is surrounded by a wall like a fortress, and inside the village there is a high tree house that can be seen far.

title: Donuts Hide & Seek
text:
This is a fun hide & seek map based on donuts. There are lots of hiding spots.

# How To Play

You should have at least 2 players (1 hider, 1 seeker). The seeker will count for 30 seconds while the hiders hide. The seeker's goal is to find and kill the hiders. There are even pigs to make it harder for the seeker to find the hider and for both players to move around. It's even more fun if you activate the Mob Disguiser Addon for this map.

title: Hologram Parkour
text:
This is a parkour map where you have to go through the levels without seeing the blocks.

# How to play

• In order to complete this parkour you have to look at the patterns of the blocks on the other side.
• And as with those patterns, you jump to blocks that are not visible on your side.
• Once you are on the emerald block at the end of the course, you will proceed to the next level.
• It consists of 8 levels in total.

title: Deathrun
text:
This is a minigame where one player will be the trapper whose mission it is to trap and kill the other player who tries to complete an obstacle course. The obstacle course consists mostly of parkour jumps and at some levels you’ll get different effects to help you. It’s a very intense map, especially if you are the runner, because then you have to constantly worrying about the other player trying to stop you.

# How to play?

This map is recommended for two players. There are two different roles in the map with two complete different objectives.

• Trapper: Enable the traps to trap and kill the other player
• Runner: Get through the entire obstacle course without dying!

title: Mechanics Apocalypse 2
text: This map is a sequel to the first Mechanic Apocalypse map. In the first map you helped destroying the Vanguard but now it’s time to take the fight one step further and fight them at their own headquarters. It’s all up to you to eliminate this threat once and for all, but even then it’s uncertain whether it’s actually the end or if they have already spread globally and become a worldwide threat to the human race.

title: Abandon (Horror)
text:
This is a demo version for a horror map (Sarah's Curse). It takes somewhere around 10-15 minutes to play through but it’s nonetheless a good experience with a couple of different scares and cool features such scary horror sounds.

# Storyline

You don’t know where you are.. but it looks like a mine.. “How could I possibly have ended up here?” You mutter quietly to yourself and as soon as you close your eyelids to blink a horrific memory flashes before your eyes. You shake your head a few times and then speaks with a quiet but slightly hysteric voice.  “I .. I can’t remember.. but I need to find a way out of here.. somehow..”

# Rules

• Field of view: 70%
• Brightness 40-60% (low)
• Turn up the volume

# Credits

• Creator: FuriousGamer, TeenWolf460, Destroyer99
• Helpers: TANUITGM, TNTMINEPRO55

title: VanillaGrinders SkyWars
text:
AutoGrind and the @VanillaGrinders build team put together this jungle themed, skywars map just for you! 

We figured out how to get this command block mini​game to work smoothly with as low as 4 chunks render settings so this will work on any device that has pocket edition installed.

Features a nice jungle theme/ spawn hub/ game hub with full game reset/ 8 player islands with chests on top and inside/ mid with 4 OP chests and a REAL OP chest in center, hope you find it, and enjoy!

title: Tiny Little Village
text: This is a tiny little village with fishing hut, barn, Graveyard. Etc. Enjoy!

title: Horse Racing (v2)
text: This is a big horse racing map which can be played up to 16 players. It’s a really nice minigame to see who among your friends is the best horse rider.

title: Epican Republic (v18)
text:
Welcome to the Epican Republic!

I started construction on this map sometime in 2014 and many hours of my time has gone into the creation of this city ever since. This map consists of 4 cities, with 2 of them currently being under construction. The world features a fully-functional transit system that reaches every part of the world. 

This map includes: Skyscrapers, Airport, Stadiums, Arenas, Apartments, Homes, Schools, Transit lines, Concert Halls, Theaters, Nether portals, Malls, Hotels, and other random projects I decide to do in this world. 

Download my map today, subscribe to me on YouTube(garetmi) and Twitch(garetmiStudios) where I stream and post videos on this map!

# Creator

• YouTube: garetmi
• Twitch: garetmiStudios

title: Ocean Dream Cruise Ship
text:
Ocean Dream is a huge cruise ship with an extremely detailed exterior as well as inside with all of the interiors decorated.

• All interiors are decorated
• A lot of details
• 246 blocks long
• 39 blocks wide
• 52 blocks high
• 10 decks high

title: SG Sand Castles
text: SG Sand Castles is a game where you have one minute to cover and hide your flag. Once the minute is up and the walls fall you must find, dig and destroy the enemy flags. Destroying the red flag will kill the red player and so on. Be the last player standing to win the game!

title: DeepOceanCity
text: The development of DeepOceanCity has been in progress for over two months. Today is the first release and this is without doubt one of the best cities we’ve reviewed. The city is situated on relatively small island far out in the ocean. On a very little area the builder have been able to fit many different types of creations. A shipyard, a beach with a boardwalk and a ferris wheel, skyscrapers, lots of fine homes and everywhere just beautiful details.

title: Hunger Games Forest Arena
text: This map is an amazing PvP arena perfect for hunger games. The surroundings are only forest but there are lots of chests hidden around the forest to create an incentive for exploration. As it’s a quite big map we recommend playing it with at least four players but if you are more players that will definitely increase the fun.

title: Biome Parkour - 12 Levels
text:
This is a parkour map with 12 different levels. If you are a beginner at parkour this might be suitable for you because the actual parkour isn’t that difficult.

# Tip

For each stage you need to find a lever that can open the door of the next stage.

title: 1000 Jump 3
text: This parkour map includes three different levels. By jumping on different terracotta blocks you’ll gain different special abilities such as extra speed or a jump boost. At the same time it would have been impossible to complete the obstacles without those abilities it also makes it quite difficult as you will have to strategically plan your next moves to complete the levels.

title: Shipwreck Island
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

Shipwreck Island is suitable for survival gameplay and role plays. A cruise ship is stranded on a deserted island. There’s a small house on the island which works great as a shelter for the first night on the island. But to survive you will really have to start scavenging the ship or look in your surroundings for ways to survive.

title: USS Independence
text: USS Independence is a ship intended for a close to shore battles. It’s a battle ship relatively small in size (compared to the huge monster ships the US navy got in store). Here we’ve got an alternative recreation of the USS Independence which do hold many similarities. Even if it’s not an exact replica it’s really well made and authentic looking.

title: SG Mexa: Tropical
text: SG Mexa is the new Survival World series with advanced world edit and amazing survival maps. In this installment, there is a curved tropical island with a curved tropical island with a large mountain and smaller hills followed by a couple of small islands in the ocean. Just know that this survival world does not contain all of the necessary items to survive. For that you will need to boat to the border where ordinary worlds are generated. Get ready for more maps of these!

title: Pixel Art Express III
text:
Pixel Art Express III is a map with tons of pixel art to explore. The magnitude of each pixel art is incredible. Some of the art are actual faces of realistic persons like Pope Francis but for the most part you will find characters from classic video games like Pikachu in Pokémon and Samus Aran in Metroid.

Rules
• Set render distance to maximum
• Play on peaceful
• Don’t kill the chickens

title: Redstone Smart House
text:
Welcome the Redstone Smart House by Chris.

This is a basic redstone house with some hidden features. Look out for the signs and have fun.

title: Medieval Fantasy Inn (Updated)
text: This is the most perfect inn which I personally would have liked to arrive to after a long day of mining. It really feels like a place which have been taken straight out of The Lord of the Rings. The inn is fairly small but everything is incredibly detailed. The creation includes two main structures (one stable & one inn) and also a mysterious Nether portal.

title: SkyWars Halloween
text:
This is a skywars map for Halloween.

SkyWars is a multiplayer mini-game map that you have to fight against other players in the islands above the sky.
There are 8 small islands and a big island in the middle. You can find much better items on the big island.

All you have to do is survive to the very end. Have fun!

title: Piston Password - Puzzle Map
text:
Welcome to Piston Password!

The goal is to solve each puzzle by moving a redstone block on top of a receiver. There will be pistons or sticky pistons play on certain blocks. You will be allowed to use certain items in certain levels to complete them!
Good luck!

title: Biggest Castle & Church
text: This is as you probably could have guessed a really big castle and a church. The outside looks primarily like an ordinary castle with a thick stone wall around it and huge towers placed on every corner to have a good overlook on the surrounding area and potential incoming enemies.

title: Mojave Region
text: Mojave Region is a world containing two medium sized cities. Inside the cities you will find things like an airport, parks, shipping ports, schools, fire departments, police departments and so much more. All structures stay true to the original Minecraft build designs and since there are such a good variety of builds it makes it quite useful for role-plays and similar gameplay.

title: American Flag Wave
text: This is a cool moving flag made out of armor stands! It may be a bit laggy but that is what happens with alot of pistons. It isn't a bug. The redstone is exposed so you can copy the idea if you want to do something like it

title: Horse Race
text: Horse Racing is a map that you must overcome all obstacles and do some parkour to reach the goal.

title: Hardcore Runner III
text: Hardcore Runner III is a speedrun minigame. Use Speed III effect to increase your speed and then try to complete all three levels.

title: Hidden Treasure
text:
Welcome to Hidden Treasure!

This is a short adventure map to find sacred treasures through three different mini-games in a hidden cave.

# Storyline

In this map you are an explorer looking for a sacred treasure. It's been lost for centuries.
After all these years of searching with no success. It might not even be a thing but I have a special feeling today.

title: The Old City
text: The Old City is a medieval city with more than thirty houses and a large castle in the center.

title: SG GenChunk
text: SG GenChink is a hardcore survival challenge. Your objective is to survive on a chunk that is being randomly generated. This map is suitable for anyone who’s interested in a fresh and exciting challenge for survival mode.

title: Powerkour
text: This parkour map includes 10 different challenging parkour courses. In each level you’ll get a different status effect which you must use in order to get through the level.

title: Galaxia’s DeathRUN
text:
DeathRUN is a fun multiplayer minigame where one team activates traps and the other team has to evade them.

• Runners will evade the traps that Deaths activated to kill you
• Deaths will activate the traps to kill the Runners
• There are 20 traps for the Runners

# Creators

• Main: Galaxia
• Additional: TerriA, TooSimpl3Mean, lourence, spencer
• Tester: CallMeKJ

title: The Four Pillars
text: The Four Pillars is a PvP multiplayer minigame which can be played by up to four teams simultaneously. You select a team by walking into one of the four corners at spawn. Once that’s done the player will be teleported to their designated pillar and receive a few different weapons and other items. The objective is quite obvious in that sense that each team has to kill the other teams to win the game.

title: VerseCrafter: The Beginning
text:
VerseCrafter: The Beginning is the first map in a series of multiple maps to come. It’s a quite fun map with multiple levels and a story which goes with it. The story goes as following.

You’ve lost your memory and to get it back you need to complete 7 different stages to reach the hall of memories.

title: Winter Mansion
text: This map features a two storey wooden mansion built on snowy biome.

title: BasinPVP
text: This is a PvP map which lets you customize the colors of the arena and it’s all done by using a simple selection system (powered by redstone and command blocks). It uses 16 of the new concrete blocks and you can combine them any way you like. Players are given some weapons and gear but also some wood planks which they can use for skybasing.

title: 50 Ways To Decorate
text: This is a great source of inspiration for anyone but especially beginners who need some help on what they can build in Minecraft. Most of the decorations here are just to improve the visual look of your build since they don’t actually add any other functionalities. It’s a great mix of decorations which will work great for both modern and medieval creations.

title: Blaze PvP Arena
text: Challenge your friends (and enemies) in a duel. This is a PvP arena suitable for anywhere between 2-10 players. Its limited size makes it most suitable for melee combat (e.g. sword fights) as the bow is more suitable for long-range combat. The arena is very well built and this makes the map so much more cool to play!

title: Command Block World
text:
This is my awesome command block world! Its for people who don't know how to use command blocks

This map is full of various command block creations.

# Features

• Command Block Traps
• Moon Travel
• Easy Trade
• Morphing Machine
• Elytra Challenge
• Creepers Dominion
• And much more!

* This map was created in Minecraft PE version 1.1. Some features may not work properly in lower versions.

title: Flying Modern Apartments
text:
Flying Modern Apartments is a very unique but great creation.
You can see modern apartments on this map that seem to fly above the sky!

title: Beijing
text:
This is a city map inspired by Beijing, China.

# Credit

• emperorandy01

title: Sirus - Modern Eco-Home
text:
This map features a small modern house.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD and Enhanced Vanilla Shader applied version (Recommended)
• Original version

# Creators

• Java Edition: xRoach
• Ported by SkallordHD

title: Enderdads Epic Elytra Map
text:
This map is Epic Elytra map made by enderdad.

# Story

You are in prison for a crime you didn't commit lucky.
You paid the guard to leave things to help you escape, but he said the only way out without being seen is to go through the tunnels but this will be very dangerous.
good luck :)

# Tips

• Play on easy
• To escape the prison, find the key and put it on the right wall of the door.
• There's a redstone timer that's set off once you fly into maze of tunnels with all sorts of obstacles and mobs to get in your way the redstone is so the tunnels attack you aswel. It's great fun I had loads of fun creating it I've played it loads of times and still happy to play it so I hope u like it too

title: Tiny Continents 2
text:
There are 6 continents on this map. Find wool for each continent and complete the monument.

This map is very difficult to complete. But just exploring and surviving all continents will be fun enough.

# Rules

• Play on survival
• Set difficulty to Easy or Normal
• Always play at night.

title: Elytra Challenge 2
text:
This is the second map in a series of elytra challenges map.
This map is for beginners.

# Notes

There are two versions you can download

• First is the original version
• Second is the command block version that creates an automatic checkpoint for each level

title: Thousand Sunny
text:
This map is a recreation of Thousand Sunny from One Piece. The Thousand Sunny is the second ship of the Straw Hat Pirates.

# Creators

• Original Map: Kimdrello
• Ported by: TheMrjoojo

title: Mansion of the Damned
text:
Welcome to the "Mansion of the Damned"! an original horror map by nore.

# Brief story about the map

"- In 1936, in this exact mansion, a gruesome murder and slaughter took place. The owner of this mansion, who suffered of schizophrenia, killed, tortured and kept the remains of is own family, until one day, he committed suicide by hanging.
You came here with your paranormal investigation team to try to find any paranormal activity, but all of a sudden, a loud bang was heard. Lights out. Screams followed as you where becoming unconscious.
You woke up in a small room, find a way out."

# Rules

• You are not allowed to place or break any cubes, unless there is a hint for you to do it. (Exemple: "These bookshelfs look old and rusty...").
• You may only craft ladders.
• If a creeper explodes, please avoid any holes, don't leave the mansion or it will be considered cheating.
• No mods, whatsoever...
• You may break and place torches.
• Do not play on peaceful.
• Do not change gamemode.
• Have fun!

# Info about the map

• This map is full mysteries, puzzles, parkour, zombies and action! A little bit of everything, in this original map!
• It also contains lots of Redstone alternatives, such as code locked doors, and many more.

title: Ender Pearl Parkour
text:
This is an epic parkour map that needs to use Ender Pearl. Each stage is designed to let you pass by throwing the Ender Pearl.

# How to play

• Just throw the ender pearl on the gold block
• Eat golden apples and heal the damage from the ender pearl.
• On the diamond block you can set the checkpoint.

title: The Temple Of Notch
text:
Fully Interactive Redstone Notch Idol.

Notch will judge you in the temple and either bless you with vast wealth :D or cast you into the bowels of the earth D:

You must place an offering into the "Well of Destiny" unlocking the temple doors to seek an audience with Notch.

# Notes

• Play in Peaceful mode or Enderman will destroy redstone wiring :(
• If you want a second judgement from notch please retrieve your offering from the well to reset the machine or you could break Notch D:

# Texture Pack

• oCd Texture Pack

This map was created by disco, and ported to PE by MCPEPorts.
Twitter: @ocddisco, @MCPEPorts

title: Jurassic Minecraft
text:
Have a sneak peek at the an upcoming map – the new Minecraft PE verison of Jurassic World coming June 22nd. A Fallen Kingdom update will be released shortly after the initial release. Explore Main Street, Jurassic Circus, T-Rex Kingdom, the Petting Zoo, Spinosaurus Paddock and more. The most recent version will not be uploaded until the release day so that there is more to explore. The final park will have forty exhibits (see park map below).

(Optional) To enjoy this park perfectly, download the Jurassic Craft Add-on and activate it on this map.

Note from the creator: I am uploading this beta version to ask for people’s feedback and improvements.

title: Herobrine Tools
text:
This map allows you to use herobrine tools using command blocks and a dedicated texture pack. Herobrine tools are just a concept and do not really exist. But it would be fun to experience new tools and armor with this map.

For more information on how to use the tools, see the YouTube video below.

title: Level Knockdown - Rainbow Edition
text:
Level Knockdown is a minigame where the participants are only allowed to use their fists or throw snowballs and eggs at their opponents to push them down through the holes spread around the floor.

The map is made out of five different levels (or floors) where in the last level the loser will fall into a pool of lava and die. By winning one level you gain one point and have to jump down to the next floor to continue on with the minigame.

# Rules

• Don’t place or break blocks
• Don’t cheat
• Have fun!

title: The Witches Curse
text: This is a survival arena map which can be played by multiple players or by yourself alone. It consists of several levels where in each you must slay a big number of monsters before moving on to the next level. It’s not the most beautifully designed map but if you are looking for a fun monster battle map then this is a great map for you.

title: Little Survival Island
text:
This map features a small island where you can test your survival skills.

# The island includes:

• Tiny mine
• Cobblestone farm
• Designed trees
• Starterpacks
• Bridge
• Old House
• Fireplace

You can choose one of three starter packs at the start.

• Knight
• Farmer
• Builder

Hope you enjoy!

title: Soul Snatchers
text: Soul Snatchers, a multiplayer minigame where the Trapped must escape the building while being hunted down by the Souls!

title: Skyblock Planet
text:
Start out on a small planet and use the resources you find to explore the rest of the galaxy and its planets. There are tens of different planets and each one look very different from the other.

The main objective is to find a way to survive for as long as possible, and if you get the chance then also explore the rest of the planets in the galaxy.

title: Zenon Mansion
text:
Welcome to Zenon Mansion!
This map was created by Z3NON

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: Seasonal Arena PvP
text:
This is a PvP map that can be played together for up to 4 players.
Your goal is to keep your emerald and get all the other players emeralds.

title: Escape Test Chamber
text:
There are 10 chambers in this map where you have to escape. This is not an ordinary escape map, but also an adventure map. Storyline can be found in the map.

# Credits

• Map by CarrtG
• Idea by CarrtG and PixelTMP

title: Find The Button by BugCore
text:
Find The Button is a puzzle map with the goal of finding a button which is hidden in each level. Once you’ve found it you need to find a way to activate it in order to open a door which leads to the next level. In this map there is a total of six levels and they gradually get more difficult as you progress throughout the map. This map is great for anyone, but especially beginners who might want to try out a puzzle map for the first time.

How to play?

In each level you have to look for a button. Sometimes it’s in a chest and other times it’s already placed in the world and you have to press it.

Rules
• Set difficulty to peaceful
• Don’t break blocks
• Play in survival mode

title: Big Ships 2.0
text: A map featuring aircraft carriers and battleships.

title: Lava Run 2
text:
Lava run is a parkour map where you have to do the parkour fast enough to beat the lava. Each level gets harder, but also has less stages to keep you from getting to mad.

# Easy Level

• easy parkour with a few moderate jumps
• 4 minutes to pass 
• 9 stages

# Medium Level
• moderate parkour with a few hard jumps
• a little under 3 minutes to pass
• 6 stages

# Hard Level

• hard parkour with a few moderate jumps
• 1:40 to pass
• 3 stages

title: Just Parkour!
text: This map includes four different levels to challenge players, want to pass all 4 this level players should have a fairly high level of parkour. In the first and second level, you may not encounter any obstacles but from the third level onwards, you will surely have to tremble. If you are a new player, complete the levels in this map is completely impossible, only those who are more experienced can do this, have fun!

title: Awakening - Adventure Map
text: Awakening has an intense storyline and a hardcore gameplay that is very fun and addicting. Try to dig through the puzzles and parkour your way up to the top! Don't let they Mysterious Being keep you away from your family!! Great map built by @lonelypandq and @_bubbucky. Support us by following us on Twitter. Thanks!

title: Dungeon Death
text:
Test your fighting skills in this mob arena!
Includes 9 different classes, each with unique abilities!

This map is extremely difficult for one player. But if you'd like to give 1player mode a try, go ahead. But I recommend playing with friends so you can enjoy this map more.

# Goal of the Map

Destroy all spawners in the arena.

# Classes

• Knight
• Assassin
• Archer
• Builder
• Wolf Tamer
• Blacksmith
• Water Wizard
• Trapper
• Blademaster

title: Puzzled Rooms
text:
Puzzled Rooms is a short but fun Minecraft Puzzle Map with 6 rooms. Each room has a secret that lets you progress to the next one. Make sure you pay close attention. This isn't too hard, but a calm and focused mind will help.

* Some of the pictures and videos below may include spoilers.

title: Batman: Arkham Knight Batcave
text: This is a creation which is based on the design of the Batcave in the Batman: Arkham Knight video game. This is the best version of the Batcave which I’ve come across for Minecraft Pocket Edition. It really looks like a cave but with a lot of high-technology stuff which you would expect to find in Batman’s headquarters. Even if you haven’t played the game (like me) it’s still really fun to explore!

title: Agent Ambers: The Murder
text: You are an invesigating agent, and there has been a murder. Mr. johnson was found dead in his dining room, you have 6 Suspects, The Witch, The Wife, The Brother, The Boss, The Cook, And The Stylist, Read their alibis, search for clues, and convict the murderer, if succesfull you will be granted your second case (Second Case Coming Soon). Good luck Agent.

title: Find the Button Original
text:
Welcome on the best map for Find the button!

This map have 12 levels and 3 difficulty.

+SURPRISE!

GOOD LUCK!

title: Amazing Castle
text:
This map is ideal for adventure maps or PVP or to just be there to look good.
As it is a big map, it tends to be laggy.

Hope you enjoy!

title: Elytra Challenge
text:
This is a challenge consisting of five levels which lets you test your flying skills using the elytra wings.
This map is for beginners

# Notes

There are two versions you can download

• First is the original version
• Second is the command block version that creates an automatic checkpoint for each level

title: The Relic of Riverwood (Fix)
text:
The Relic of Riverwood is a short (20-30 minutes long) but fun adventure map with an intriguing and easy to understand storyline. You are a lonesome traveller who by accident pass by the town of Riverwood. Little did you know but the villagers have awaited you and they got a quest for you and that is to find their stolen relic and return it.

# Rules

• Never break/place blocks unless told to so
• Play in survival mode
• Set difficulty off and then turn it on when told

# Changes

• Make powered rails to work.

title: The Prison Break
text: The Prison Break is a map inspired by the Prison Break TV series. Your brother was sent to prison after trying to rob a bank and your mission is to try to save him. Not only will you help him escape prison but you will also go through with a bank robbery and escape by helicopter. It’s one of the most clever maps I’ve tested MCPE DL and it is definitely worth playing if you enjoy some intense action, clever puzzles and an intriguing story.

title: Puzzle Map
text:
This map includes 8 different puzzles. It is most suitable for beginners (based on the difficulty of the map) who don’t have much experience with redstone and other basic features in Minecraft which most avid players should be familiar with.

# Rules

• Play in survival mode
• Make sure difficulty it set to peaceful
• Don’t break blocks

 If you spawn and it is raining then type the following text command to turn off the rain: /toggledownfall

title: Modern House on The Island
text: This is a cool new modern island house, it has a very nice cool looking garden and a freaking speedboat.

title: The Uncaged (Escape)
text: One day you wake up and for unknown reasons find yourself stuck inside a strange house. It’s completely quiet and there are just few candles lighting the way. It’s really a mystery how you got there but one thing is for certain and that is that you must find a way out of this mysterious house. The Uncaged is a short adventure map taking place in a creepy environment with a couple of jumpscares.

title: Find The Button (Story)
text: This is a Find The Button minigame map which includes 25 different levels. Each level includes a story which expands as you make your through the levels.

title: 1890's School Building
text: Big oldschool building with classrooms and some furniture. The clock tower in the middle has a big bell. made by jar9 I hope you like it.

title: Boat Races
text:
Welcome to Boat Races! It's a fun 2-3 player mini-game made by mc_innovations.
Thanks for playing! Go check out mc_innovations on Instagram!!!

title: NecroForest Dimension
text: This is a great map that will send you to the dimension of the Necro Forest. But it will not be easy to defeat monsters and conquer them. At the end you have to defeat the Necro Forest boss.

title: Medieval Castle
text: This map features a medieval castle. It is really fun to explore.

title: Akkumuna
text:
Have you ever imagined starting your adventure on a cool ship? Your dream will come true with Akkumuna.

In this map, your king will allow you to explore a great island on the ocean. You will feel tired during a long adventure and start falling asleep. However, there is a big noise wake you up. It is the sound of your wrecked ship, and you will be sent to a tropical island. Are you ready to enjoy the great adventure?

# Storyline

Christopher is a young explorer who was recruited by the King to discover a legendary island. Nobody really know where it is except that it’s somewhere in the middle of the ocean. On 23 March, 1882, Christopher went to sea.

title: New Year’s Countdown 2018
text: The new year is coming up and it’s time to celebrate and here’s a perfect map for that. It has a fully automatic 10 seconds countdown system. Once it reaches the final countdown a cool fireworks and light show will start.

title: Fireworks Tutorial
text: This map contains a walkthrough tutorial for anyone who is new to fireworks in Minecraft as it will show you exactly how they work and how to customize them. The tutorial is divided into three different lessions and they include Basic Recipes, Customization and Elytra Boosting. It’s all laid out in a very clear and obvious in-game so it’s very easy to get started.

title: Hospital (Horror!)
text: You wake up and find yourself in a hospital, but it’s soon clear that it’s not an ordinary hospital. The lights are almost completely out and it’s barely possible to see anything. But don’t worry, there’s a night vision camera in one of the chests to help you see better. But the question is, do you really want to see see the things around you? It’s going to be scary, I promise you. Jump scares are inevitable!

title: Bendy Horror Game
text:
This is a fan-made map based on Bendy and the Ink Machine (BATIM).

# How to play?

This horror map has a really simple gameplay. All you have to do to win is to find 6 bacon soups and bring them to a safe house. But it will not be easy because something will stop you.

All rules are in the map.

# What's new in this update?

• Adding hard mode and easy mode control
• Adding new secret room and new level
• No mob spawn in safe house and lobby

title: Infiltrate 2 - Military Base
text: This map features a military base. This map is ported to Bedrock Edition from another platform and may be different from the original version.

title: Christmas Theme Park
text: This map features a small Christmas-themed amusement park. It includes multiple minigames, plenty of roller coasters and everything you might need to entertain yourself during the Christmas holidays. All of the creations are very compact and small but it’s nonetheless a great theme park worth exploring.

title: Seed (hurricanetortilla) - Ruins on Land
text:
Ruins on Land & On Ocean Monument

This is the coolest survival island with an ocean monument under ice with a ruin on it and a shipwreck.

Found by ZachDaWolf

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "hurricanetortilla" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap one of the download buttons above to install it automatically.

title: Flying Zombies (v1.3)
text:
A very fun minigame that includes parkour! Run from the massive flying zombie whilst not falling down! Enjoy randomised maps and a great leveling/modes system!

# What's new in v1.3?

• Added 40 new levels!
• Lobby changes

title: The Dummy 3 (Horror!)
text:
This is the second sequel to The Dummy, and the final part of the series. It's a skillfully constructed horror adventure map with a couple of jumpscares.

# Story

You have almost reached the end and are trying to find an exit. Then you suddenly fall asleep and you wake up in a pretty nice room.

# Previous Maps

• The Dummy 1
• The Dummy 2

title: Slime Jumper
text: Slime Jumper is a map where you jump on slime blocks. There are five levels each with a different theme. The levels are not that long and the map should not take to long to beat.

title: SG Alleyway Takeover
text:
SG Alleyway Takeover is a 1v1 game where two players run at each other across an alley. As you run, the road lines below you will be colored your team color (red/blue). You must capture the whole road to win. There are two modes: 1v1 and Tournatment.

• 1v1: (2 players only, 1 round)
• Tournament: (1v1 games, infinite rounds (depending on player count), infinite players. Once one player has won they will stay in the arena and fight a random player in the queue. The game keeps going until there is only one survivor remaining.)

title: Self-Building House
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This is a really cool redstone creation that uses command blocks. In this map, a house and a bridge are automatically built by pressing a button. The process of building is also wonderful!

title: Find the Mysterious Button
text: Find the Mysterious Button is probably the most self-explanatory minigame in Minecraft. This map consists of 10 different levels and in each one there is a button which you need to find. One thing that really makes this particular map stand out is that all of the levels are very well designed. For example, in one level you’ll be at a nice cottage by a lake and in another level you’ll find yourself on the beach.

title: SG Zombies 5 (Gun PvE)
text:
SG Zombies 5 is a Gun PvE sequel of the SG Zombies map series. This map includes the guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack and the entire code for command blocks and redstone was also rewritten to provide a more lag free experience. It includes an entire new map (Towerfall by Hypixel) which has 5 different zones and some gates to unlock. There are several cool features and the waves are also more difficult. This will likely be one of the most difficult sequels to date!

# Previous Maps

• SG Zombies 1
• SG Zombies 2
• SG Zombies 3
• SG Zombies 4
• SG Zombies 6

title: Skywars: Farlysia
text:
This is a skywars map consisting of 8 islands and a big island in the middle.
Each island has a small house and a chest filled with items.
This map can be played up to 8 players.

# Creator

• Original Map: DarkOdin
• Ported by: Enchanted Minecart

title: Modern Mansion In The Forest
text:
Welcome to Modern Mansion In The Forest (Mansão moderna imoblida)

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: April Fools Creations
text:
April Fools' Day is celebrated every year on April 1 by playing practical jokes and spreading hoaxes. The jokes and their victims are called April fools. People playing April Fool jokes expose their prank by shouting April Fool.

This map contains 13 different redstone creations that can make you shout.

Enjoy the map!

title: Murder Swap
text:
This is a fun multiplayer mini game that requires at least 2 players.

# How To Play

• If You Are Survivor, You Need To Do Is Survive In 30 Seconds
• If You Are Murderer, You Need To Do Is Kill A Player In 30 Seconds
• Every 30 Seconds, Murderer Always Change. The Last Player Standing, Wins!

# What's new?

• Murderer Switching Fixed
• New System
• Added Commands

# Creator

• Twitter: @LUCKYBLOCK17o
• Youtube: LUCKYBLOCK17o

title: Hide and Seek in the Kitchen
text:
This is a fun hide-and-seek minigame taking place in a huge kitchen. Some of the hiding places include a large fridge, cupboards, a sink and an oven. It looks quite realistic and it will feel as if you are an ant in a huge world.

# How to play?

This map requires at least 2 players but can be played with as many players you want. At least one of the players has to be a seeker.

• The hiders should enter the kitchen and find a good hiding place.
• The seeker should jump into the cobweb and wait to pass through (don’t break the cobweb). Once the seeker has passed through the cobweb he or she can start looking for other players. Found players should announce in the chat that they have been found and gather back at the starting area.

There are two versions available for download.

• Portuguese version (Original)
• English version

title: Parkour Quest
text: The Parkour Quest is a very fun parkour map. Don't be angry if you die many times, but if you are expert that will be easy to you, just have fun in this map, hope you enjoy the parkour map.

title: Breakout - The Lever Quest (v2)
text:
Breakout - The Lever Quest V2 is the first version in this thrilling adventure/problem-solving Minecraft PE Map. There will be constant map updates in order to improve the quality of the game. If you have any queries or suggestions, please email extrememcpe@techie.com

# What's new in v2?

• Added parkour and quiz levels

title: CommandParkour
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

CommandParkour is an easy and short parkour map, but shows that using command blocks can make an awesome parkour map.

title: Survival Delight
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This is a huge custom terrain suitable for survival gameplay or other types of adventures. It includes several different biomes with custom trees, mountains and more. There’s a huge cavern somewhere under spawn so be careful when you start digging.

title: 6022 The New Threat - Adventure
text: A suspect is using the lab reinforcements to conquer a island. You are stuck there, and you can´t run away from this threat, so you decide to help stopping it. However, this map is totally repayable, so you can replay it!

title: Von Fatalis Castle Map
text:
This map may possibly be the best Minecraft PE Castle map that I have had the privilege of playing. This map is very large with tons of buildings that are complete inside and out. It is obvious that the creator(s) put in tons of man hours on making this masterpiece.

Texture: oCd Texture Pack

title: Answer My Riddle
text:
This is a prequel to the Answer My Riddle: Quarter Maze.
Fourteen levels with one riddle in each room.

If you enjoyed the sequel, you'll love this too.

title: 8 Biome Dropper
text:
This map contains 8 levels that you have to jump and survive. Each level has its own biome.

1. Nether Biome
2. End Biome
3. Dessert biome
4. Red Sand biome
5. Forest Flat Biome
6. Mooshroom Biome
7. Spider Web Biome
8. Snow

title: 20 Ways to Die
text:
This map is unlike most maps. The main objective is to kill yourself in order to be able to move onto the next level. In each new level you will find either a set of items in a chest and/or blocks in a room which you have to use in a way to kill yourself. It might sound kind of depressive but it’s definitely a quite fun thing to do but only in Minecraft only of course!

Here are a few of the levels which you will find in the map. Some of them include redstone puzzles which you sometimes must solve in order to enable some type of mechanism which you can use to shorten your life.

Rules
• Don’t break blocks
• No multiplayer
• Use tips if you don’t understand how to solve a puzzle

title: The Change
text:
An inspirational minecraft map that is a first at a time experience ever... 

This is a story of a person, who was being downed by his classmates and his own family...

title: Five Nights At Freddy’s Trilogy Map
text:
Hey guys, Wolfman4343 with a five nights at freddy’s map.

You played as a sercurity guard in all three fnaf games, but now you can relive these moments in minecraft pe.

This map has 3 maps in one. Each map is a 1:1 recreation of the original Five Nights at Freddy’s games by Scott Cawthon. 

I’ve hidden an easter egg animatronic in each map try to find them all

title: The Angel Castle
text: This map features a small castle built of quartz blocks. It has 2 bed rooms, a ballroom, a bathroom, a chill area and much more.

title: SpawnEgg House
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.6 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.6 or higher before downloading.

In this map, you can build a house immediately using spawn eggs.

title: SquArena Concert Hall
text: SquArena Concert Hall is a map where players can experience performing on the stage or control the lightings, just like when you attend any concert tours.

title: WWE Hell In A Cell (TD Garden)
text:
This is a 1:1 replica of TD Garden in Boston. The arena features everything the real one does. Fight, ref, watch, or even commentary on your friends matches! Don’t forget to shut the cell if being used.
Enjoy!

title: Desert Temple
text:
This map was built using the sandstone and the acacia wood combination. The build looks good during the day, but it also looks amazing at night. The map includes temple build with large dome structure, small village, custom palm trees, water features. Take a look and enjoy!
If you like this map, follow @AncientMCPE on twitter. Also be sure to check out Nebsgaming on Youtube for more great creations and lots of other MCPE content.

title: ESS Meridian
text: A huge space ship with big areas to explore, this ship is fully furnished and it also includes a enemy ship.

title: Norwegian Pearl
text:
The Norwegian Pearl is a real life Jewel class (meaning, super big and a luxurious) ship. Here is a replica of just that ship. The decks and interiors consist of everything one could dream of: swimming pools with water slides, top-notch restaurants, luxurious suites and much more.

# Creator

• PC Version: CharlesGoldBurn
• Ported by: zombiepig7705

title: Candy Cane Hills Coaster
text:
Super fun Christmas Coaster by DaphneElaine and LUCASB276!

* Tested on Minecraft PE version 1.0.7

title: TNT Maniac
text:
TNT Maniac is a minigame involving explosions and kits. It’s similar to that of Mineplex’s Bomb Lobbers where the main objective is to eliminate the other team. TNT Maniac is suitable for any amount of players and before starting each player will be able to select among one of three classes. Right now there’s just one arena (Pirate Ship) but more will be added in a future update.

# How to play?

Before actually going anywhere it’s recommended that you read the rules and guidelines in the game lobby. Once that’s done then you can enter the game and select a class.

title: Haunted - Short Horror
text: This is a short horror adventure map. If you set the volume to 100%, you will enjoy much more.

title: Penta Parkour
text: First, You Need To Do The Parkour To Find The Key For The Door. In This Time, You Should Use Your Skills In This Parkour Map.

title: Parkour Biomes
text: Parkour Biomes is a parkour map with 16 different levels. If you are a beginner at parkour this might be suitable for you because the actual parkour isn’t that difficult.

title: Moonscape (Updated)
text:
# What's in this update?

• Added support for 1.2

This is an enclosed area/arena of approximately 225 x 225 blocks (+/-50,000 blocks) which makes it fractionally smaller than an old style world (256 x 256 blocks).

The build is simply a 1 block deep ‘skin’ of stone blocks (placed one by one) over pre-existing terrain. The build features a number of randomly placed craters of varying size. 

The boundry slopes/hills are hollow, so mining into them isn’t an option.

The build doesn’t contain any NASA (or other space agency hardware) and is supplied as a ‘blank canvas’ that others can build their own creations on.

If you use this on a build you make public, please credit me as the terrain creator as I have put a lot of time/work into this.

Thank you and enjoy

• Astronaut skin was created by IsabellaLovesPie

title: Boat Drift Racing 2
text:
This map is a small boat race circuit made to test your rowing skills in mcpe.  

More information can be found on the YouTube video below.

title: Zombie Apocalypse: Bow Edition
text:
Play this game to improve your archery skills. Equip yourself with a bow and arrow to kill zombies and gain points. You can then spend the points in a shop to purchase new items or upgrade existing ones.

To start the minigame you’ll need to find your way into a room titled “Jugar” or something like that. Step on the pressure plate to start it and enter into the minigame.

title: Mini Town - Mini City Texture
text:
Explore one of the greatest (and at the same time smallest) cities of all time in Minecraft Pocket Edition. Mini Town uses the Mini City Texture Pack which converts some of the blocks in-game to miniature skyscrapers and similar which then can be used as building blocks for creating mini cities.

This map was created by Ishetsannie using the Mini City Texture Pack.
Mini City Texture Pack was created by Asl00 and ported to PE by David Kauerhof.

title: RYU - Ultra Modern House
text:
This map features a beautiful modern beach mansion.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD (32x) applied version
• Original version

title: Hello Neighbor Alpha
text:
This is a adwenture map. You need to find keys to enter areas in Mr. Wilson house. Remember don't get catch by him!

Have fun and rate map.

Mayby i make 2nd part.

Thanks for dowloanding and playing

Also you can check my channel on youtube https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCxmiKjTl6mC4rkhnpwR_UqQ (Tap on the name of the creator above.)

# Credits

• Map by XScrolerX
• Addons by Cheete

title: Flood Escape: The Remake Update
text:
This is a parkour minigame where your objective is to get to the top of each floor, complete parkour challenges and solve puzzles to avoid the flood at all costs. It’s a real intense minigame where you’ll experience a constant struggle for time. 

• Lapis Blocks: Places a block that will help you advanced through the floor
• Emerald Blocks: Opens a locked gate on an exit door

# Credits

• Map By McMCPE1234
• Original Concept and Inspiration from CrazyBlox's Roblox Flood Escape

# What's new?

• The Lobby and the Factory level have been remade from scratch
• Added a Game Over system (if all players are dead then the game ends)
• Removed spectator rooms

title: Water Park 19
text: Water Park 19 is a a big water park with more than six different water rides. To ride any of the water rides we highly suggest to use a boat. It’s a good mix of rides suitable for all ages – some more scary than other ones. Besides the water slides there are also some boat racing tracks which you can use to compete in boat racing with your friends.

title: Airplane Travel
text: Do you want to travel on an airplane? If so, try this map.

title: Valentines Banners
text:
This map includes 7 really cute banners which are perfect to use for Valentine’s Day.

# Creator

• Twitter: @PastelRose97, @omltianna

title: MegaBlock SkyBlock Survival (v0.2)
text:
This is a variant of SkyBlock, an extreme survival map that aims to survive only within a total of 9 floating islands.

There are no specific challenges to this map, but exploring all 9 islands is the best way to enjoy this map. Also, there are some hidden places in this map, so it is fun to find them.

title: Prison Break III
text: You are in prison. Use your brain to solve puzzles, and escape using your parkour skills!

title: Dropper IB 5
text: Dropper IB 5 is the fifth map in a popular ongoing map series. It features 23 different levels where the objective is to jump off a ledge and then safely fall into the water, preferably avoiding being hurt (or die) due to the many obstacles which you have to steer clear off. It’s a really fun minigame and you can expect at least 30 minutes of gameplay but it mostly depends on your own skill level.

title: Pistomatic Minigame
text: This is an easy and fun mini-game map made up of puzzle, maze, parkour, and more.

title: The Burning House
text:
Welcome to Burning House

This map is a survival minigame that you have to survive in a burning house for a long time.
You need 2 or more players you must survive the lava the person that last to die wins.

This map was created by Bloodwing803 and Rafael546

# Rules

• No cheating
• Don't go outside
• PvP not allowed

Don't stay on Glass panes!!!

# Note

• You can download the McTemplate of this map. So you can easily reset the world.

title: Soccer Game
text:
Do you like soccer? Then you really have to give this map a try but don’t forget to bring a friend as it requires at least two players (but preferably more). The map includes an addon which turns the zombie into a soccer ball. The entire map has been designed to make it really easy to play and I can assure you that it’s really fun!

Flip a coin to decide which team should start. Then make a countdown from 10.

The objective is simply to use knockback item which you were given when selecting a team to hit the ball in the goal.

Once a team has scored then meet back at the center of the field and let the other team which didn’t make the score begin.

title: WildFire CTM
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This is the Complete the Monument (CTM) map. The final goal of this map is to collect five colored wool. You must complete different missions to collect each wool.

There are many signs written in Spanish on this map. The others are not important, but you have to follow these two rules.

• Do not cheats
• Do not change the difficulty (It will change automatically)

# Creators

If you want to record video on this map, please leave credits for the creators.

YouTube Channels:

• DragonLordAaron
• MewthoYT

title: Oasis of the Seas PE
text:
This is the Oasis of the Seas! This is a cruise ship basically really huge and is so cool.
It was originally built by littlesteelo. This is heavily, heavily, heavily redone ship. Very few parts untouched, like very few.
This map was designed for PC, and ported to PE by GodzilaX1225.

# Dimensions

• 362 Blocks/meters long
• 47 Blocks/meters wide
• 18 Decks
• 16 Passenger Decks
• 73 Blocks/meters Tall
• 5400 min Passenger capacity
• 6292 max Passenger capacity

# Texture Pack used in the screenshots

• Cloudless Skies (Resource Pack 1) by keithross39

title: One Night At Frankies
text:
One Night At Frankie’s is a fangame which takes some of the game elements which exist in the Five Nights At Freddie’s video games and brings them to Minecraft as a map. It’s not something for the fainthearted since there are multiple jumpscares which might freak you out. The combination of custom sounds, command blocks and redstone create an exciting and well worth playing map.

# How to play?

The game mechanics are kind of similar to Five Nights At Freddie’s which is a popular horror video game. But since it’s Minecraft, there are obviously some differences.

• Wooden button = Camera
• Stone button behind you = Generator
• Stone button in front of you is the hall lights
•  Levers = Door locks

You must avoid Golden Frankie by using the camera (wooden button).

title: Rainbow Escape
text: You are in a 5x5 room and you have to escape each one! There are also 3 endings for the map!

title: CrackedSky - MiniCTM
text:
This is a hardcore mini CTM (Complete The Monument) map.
Your goal is to find the two wool to complete the monument.

# Rules

• Play on Hard.
• Do not cheat.
• Survive in any way you can think of.
• One life per attempt, if you die, recreate the map to play again.
• Do not craft the wool of the monument.

* If you don't understand how to play the map, check out the playthrough video at the bottom.

title: The Perfect Cross
text:
This map features a fully customized world terrain which has been imported to a normal world. The map includes areas such as frozen rivers, pyramid deserts and even a Nether world in the Overworld.

# Features

• Stone spikes
• Frozen rivers
• Desert
• The End (Overworld)
• Nether (Overworld) with a volcano

title: Gravity Runner 3
text:
Welcome to Gravity Runner 3 The Academy
Gravity Runner 3 The Academy is a speed parkour map that its objective is to test your skills and swiftness on parkour. Your objectives are to pass all 9 levels to unlock level 10. If you pass level 10, you finish all your training and you are now a Gravity Runner Master. You will have to run 10 different courses made of sand/gravel and while you are trying to complete the courses, the sand/gravel will be automatically falling from behind you. You can now play all 9 levels without having to reset the map. No Rules, you can make them up. Thanks You Enjoy :D

• You can just download the McWorld.
• or if you download the McTemplate, you can reset your world by using it.

title: Explorer’s Ruins
text:
In the map you play as a person who have for years been searching for a legendary temple and now seems to be the time when you have found it. The map consists of a mysterious adventure where you have to do parkour, find your way through mazes and fight zombies, skeletons and spiders to get through the different obstacles.

# Story

After traveling the world and spending countless of days searching for a legendary temple you have walked into a trap and found yourself surrounded by a huge man-made structure of stones.

Your gut tells you that this is the temple you have been looking for and maybe you will find the treasure that lies in the deep center of the temple.

title: Survival Spawn
text: Have you ever wanted to make a survival world, but then you think "Ehhh creative is more fun"? Well this is a survival spawn that has you set up to earn achievements and swap between creative and survival... IF you find the switch. (DO NOT SWITCH GAMEMODES, UNLESS ITS WITH THE HIDDEN COMMAND BLOCK!!) Find us in instagram @Venom_Ace_Gaming & @MC_Innovations!

title: Zombie Arena
text: This map contains mobs that you need to defeat it. And then the loot of the monster must be traded into gold and use gold to trade it for some kits until you will reach the final kit.

title: Dungeon-Craft Diamond Edition
text: Play both Dungeon-Craft and New Dungeon-Craft in ONE map! Replay the maps over again, or play 40 new bonus missions. Compete in time trial, and discover several unlockable secrets!

title: Hotel Atlantis Dubai
text: This map features a beautiful hotel in Dubai.

title: Modern Mansion Island
text: This map has a big modern mansion built into the side of a mountain, and a whole island that belongs to the mansion owner! There is a really fancy minecart track that is used to get around the island, and the house looks epic!

title: Jungle Temple Escape
text: This is a minigame which takes place in an ancient jungle temple. There are several small challenges and plentiful of deadly traps which you have to complete in order to escape. Most of the dangers (such as traps) are automated by redstone and command blocks.

title: Command Block Escalator
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map shows the escalator using the command blocks.

Tap the picture below to preview how it works.

title: Volcanic Parkour
text:

title: Cops N Robbers PE
text:
Cops N Robbers is a fun minigame suitable for multiplayer. It takes place in a prison where a bunch of locked up criminals (players) decides to break out of the prison. It’s the warden’s job to keep everyone inside and kill anyone who tries to escape. It’s really exciting to play as you have to somehow find a way out of the cell and then a way out of the prison, preferably without being seen.

How to play?

This map requires at least two players but preferably more than that. There are two teams in the map:

• Robbers (minimum 1 player): Break out of their cells and escape the prison
• Warden (in charge of the prison) (max 1 player): Guard the cells and kill anyone who is escaping the prison

Begin by deciding which teams each player should be on. Then step on the correct pressure plate to be led to the starting area.

As soon as it begins the robbers will have to try and find a way out of prison. There are some instructions in the map for the most part players have to come up with their own solutions.

Rules
• Don’t break blocks
• Warden is not allowed to climb down the shaft.
• Max 1 warden!

• Use the blocks and your weapons wisely to patrol all planets.

The story in the map is slightly confusing at times. But just read it carefully and you should probably be able to figure it out.

It includes horrific scares and other potentially disturbing elements so it’s not really recommended for anyone who easily get scared or want to avoid getting nightmares. You’ve been warned! You’ll start out on the parking lot at your apartment complex and from there it only gets worse.

# Storyline

You return home after a long day at work and all you want is just a good night of sleep. As you arrive at your apartment you hear a loud scream from upstairs.

title: Tundra Collapse Run
text:
The snowy cold tundra has come and has started to collapse. While you and your friends struggle to survive the collapsing floor. You have been given the chance to live by being the last player standing.

# Goal

Avoid falling to the void. Survive as the last player standing. Kill everyone, start by digging the snow off, and shooting snowballs to knockoff everyone.

# Features

• 2 player, 3 player, 4 player games.
• Choose your color from Red, Orange, Yellow, and Green.
• Information & Rules button.
• Reset map button.
• World template.

# Tips

• Please let the world chunks load by looking around 360° till the chunks is loaded.
• Please pull the levers 1 at a time. I don't guarantee it will not jumble the processes.
• If the world broke after your first game, feel free to recreate the world as it is a world template.

title: State of Democratia
text:
The State of Democratia was formed on March 28th, 2015. It is formed by the City of Democratia and the City of Hollywoodenplank.

The State of Democratia consists of three cities:

1. The City of Democratia, est. since January 14th 2014, is the most urbanized city within the state. It has almost everything that exist in real life: from hospitals to schools, universities, government offices, airports, TV Broadcast, stock exchange and many more. In this update, nearly half of the city was demolished and rebuilt with a more modern, and realistic style.

2. The City of Hollywoodenplank, est. since November 5th, 2014, is a located in a mesa biome on an island several hundred meters away from Democratia. Hollywoodenplank consists of an industrial area that exports cactus, crops, and tools, a Suburban area that consists of lots of little houses, and an Uptown area, with lots and lots of residential buildings.

3. The City of Queensland, est. since June 19th 2015, when Oasis Bridge has been established in update v3.6. The City of Queensland was formerly known as Oasis, and was founded mainly due to the discovery of Queensland Village, formerly Oasis Town, a naturally generated double-village. In the last update, urbanization in Downtown Queensland allowed the creation of realistic elements of an actual city, for instance, hospitals, railway stations, a Federal Building, an embassy and more to come.

# Creator

• Twitter: @PeacelandGov
• Facebook Page: @PeacelandGov

There are 11 different islands and they are each separated by a void of air so it requires that you build bridges between them.

This map was designed for desktop version, and ported into PE. Some features may have been lost.

It includes the guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack and most of the command blocks and redstone programming has been rewritten to offer a more seamless experience. It also includes a new map called Library (originall by Hypixel) and it has 5 different zones and some gates that you need to unlock. It’s very likely it will be one of the most difficult ones released so far!

# How to play?

You must survive all 15 waves of zombies. Gain coins by killing zombies. Use the coins to unlock gates and to buy the items you will need to survive more waves.

# Previous Maps

title: Thimble (v2.0)
text:
Thimble is a really fun multiplayer minigame where players take turns jumping of tall structures and try to safely fall into the water while also placing a block. As time goes by the pool of water will be getting smaller and players will eventually accidentally fall on the blocks and die. It’s a really clever and enjoyable minigame and somewhat similar to droppers.

# How to play?

This is a multiplayer map which requires at 2 – 8 players. Once everyone have joined the server then it’s time to configure the game. Begin by letting each player select an unique block. None is better than the other. Once that’s done then you’ll need to select a map (Nether or Forest).

# Rules

1. Choose who will jump the first
2. Climb to the top of the platform
3. Jump in the water then place blocks where you fall
4. If you fall on blocks, you will die
5. The winner is the last who didn't died

# What's new in v2.0?

• Fully automated
• New level (Cave)

title: World in a Box
text:
In this map you have some challenges to complete in this vastly small box world. The world includes a nether and an over-world which you need to get to to complete all the challenges.

# Survival Goals 

• Collect some wood. 
• Craft some torches.
• Expand your house. 
• Make a bed and set your new spawn. 
• Make a little farm for Wheat, Sugar Canes, Pumpkins and Melons. 
• Find and mine Coal, Iron, Gold, Redstone, LapisLazuli, Emerald and Diamons. (Ores) 
• Craft an item using diamonds. 
• Craft an iron armor (At least one part). 
• Find a Dungeon. 
• Make some Bookshelves (2+) 
• Beat the Silverfish Horde 
• Visit the Nether (The nether in the box). 
• Find and mine Glowstone. 
• Brew some potions. 

# Rules

• Play only in the Box, do not break the Glass or Wool 
• Difficulty should be normal or hard 

# Creators

• Original Map: Nefashus
• Ported by: ySrPaumDoce_

title: SG CraftBros - Kit PvP
text: SG CraftBros is a minigame inspired by one of Hypixel’s popular games called Smash Heroes. Players choose a hero class and then fight each other in five different arenas. The arenas are fairly small and thus it’s most suitable for maybe 2-4 players, but there’s really no limit. If you are looking for a simple, but fun PvP minigame then this is a great choice.

title: Capture It
text:
Capture It is a fun multiplayer minigame in which the team that captured more beacons than the opponent wins.
This minigame can be played from 2 to 4 players

# How to play

• When you press the start button, the team will be automatically selected. (Red or Blue)
• When the game starts, you should capture as many beacons as possible in 5 minutes.
• To capture beacons, just step on the glass. It will automatically change to your team color.
• Protect your beacon base so they can't get double points.
• The team that captured more beacons wins.

More information can be found in the map.

# Creator

• Twitter: @LUCKYBLOCK17o
• YouTube: L17

title: RMS Queen Mary 2
text:
RMS Queen Mary 2 (also referred to as the QM2) is a transatlantic ocean liner. She is the only major ocean liner built for Cunard Line since Queen Elizabeth 2 in 1969, the vessel she succeeded as flagship of the Cunard Line.

The ship is complete inside and out (12 decks, public rooms only - no engine rooms at this time), is fun to explore with thousands of rooms.

This was created for PC version by Apple Bruce, and port to PE by GodzilaX1225

There are actually many caves and dungeons down there. Explore them.

title: The Awakening
text:
