title: Simple Sky Adventure
text: Simple Sky Adventure is a challenging map to explore the sky. Your goal is to explore and survive all 10 other islands.

title: Bean's Story: Chapter I
text:
Bean's Story-Chapter I (Fear The Walking Dead Map)

It is Friday, and Spring Break has begun. It would have been a happy time... but the apocalypse had other plans in mind...
Be prepared for sequels and prequels to come!

It’s an open world adventure map with lots of areas to explore and challenges to get through.

title: PAMA
text:
Prototype: Autonomous Management Agent, shortened as PAMA, is a character in Minecraft: Story Mode and the main antagonist in the episode "Access Denied". It has the ability to mind control townspeople and mobs in Crown Mesa.

This map implements some faces of pama and includes a special texture pack for it.

For more information, see the YouTube video below.

title: McDonald Mystery
text:
McDonald Mystery is an adventure map taking place in a small city. You’re a detective and you need to solve the mystery happening at a McDonald’s restaurant. This map consists out of three different chapters (each explained further down on this page). Ronald McDonald is the main protagonist in this map.

# Chapters

• Chapter 1: Dark Street: Investigate the way to McDonald’s
• Chapter 2: The Passage: Investigate Ronald’s secret passage under the McDonald’s restaurant
• Chapter 3: Creepy Forest: Escape Ronald’s secret cave and find the way out to the forst ot enter MineVille.

# What's new?

• You are now not able to hurt Bob.
• Updated Ronald’s texture and behavior
• New Ronald sound effects.
• Skeletons and Strays are replaced by chairs with 2 different colors( red and yellow ) and you can sit on it too.
• Added Ronald jumpscare at McDonald’s.
• Witches are replaced by trays and you can also eat meals on it.
• McDonald’s storage room is changed to manager’s office.
• Fixed Ronald’s speed on the forest (on other devices).
• Slowness effect is changed to talking effect.
• Added burgers, french fries and cokes
• And more!

title: 10 Ways To Die
text: You must find a way to die in each room with the material in. There’re 10 rooms so 10 differents ways to die.

title: Plane Crash - Adventure Map
text:
Plane crash is a short adventure map that anyone can enjoy easily.

# Story

Your plane has crash landed and you appear to be the only surviver. You don't know where you are and you must find a shelter. You think you see a small hut across the beach but you should check the storage on the plane first.

# Rules

• Play on peaceful
• If you can, play on the highest render distance
• Don't break any blocks except for glass
• You can collect pumpkins as extra score

Have fun!

title: Skyner’s Mob Arena
text:
This is a monster battle arena which can be played by 1-4 players. It’s a great map to play if you want to improve on your teamwork skills as it requires you to work effeciently in order to kill the monsters and complete the map.

# Rules

• Set difficulty to normal
• Don’t break blocks (except for glass)

title: 14 Modern House Design Ideas
text: This map showcases 14 designs of modern houses.

title: Os 20 Parkour
text:
This map is a simple parkour map. There are 25 different levels in this map, but none are particularly hard to complete.
It is a good map for beginners to practice parkour.

title: Ancient Human Skull
text: It’s an incredibly big skull located out in the desert. It looks extremely realistic and very spooky when the night falls.

title: Toadstool Castle (Update 4)
text:
Toadstool Castle is a famous building in the Super Mario universe. It has been featured in several different Super Mario game titles but personally I first came across it in Super Mario 64. This creation is largely inspired by the castle but it is by no means a replica. However, the exterior looks astonishingly similar and it even includes many of the rooms which you will recognize from the games.

# What's new in update 4?

• Redid the upstairs rooms
• Redid the lobby to mimic the File Select screen
• Added a minimap version of the world accessable from the lobby
• Added lobby access to command blocks for viewing pleasure
• Added aquatic features to the lake and the Jolly Roger Bay room
• Completed 2nd course: Whomp’s Fortress
• Added a more natural barrier around the front of the castle
• Improved exterior terrain and added two towers to the rear of the castle for similarity
• Fixed a command bug involving Chain Chomp’s post
• Added the “Infinite” Staircase
• Implemented time manipulation in the Clock Tower Room
• Added Hazy Maze Cave Room
• Implemented elements to help development
• Adjusted some textures to load properly and other bug fixes

title: Genesis
text: It’s some years in the future and artificial super-intelligence has reached an advancement where it’s thousands times more advanced than a human brain. Mankind have managed to almost reach self-destruction due to nuclear warfare but you are one of the few survivors in your region after a nuclear blast. You have now been put in a facility to go through a series of tests and one day hopefully save humanity from self-descrution.

title: Shearwater Hills
text:
Shearwater Hills - Mountain Village Map

Includes a mountaintop village with lots of houses/buildings to explore.

title: Scenic Manor
text: This map features a two-story mansion in a beautiful location with a flowered hill and a beach. There is a swimming pool on the roof that overlooks the sea.

title: Bedroom Hide N Seek
text:
It's A Hide N Seek In A Bedroom. The bedroom is messy :v

# Rules

• Don't cheat
• Don't break blocks
• Play with 3-5 players
• Have fun!

title: Chest Parkour V1
text: This map is about a chest. You have to try to escape this chest by doing parkour. There will be 3 level of Parkour under ground. I hope you all will try to download and try it out. Please like this map.

title: Mechanics Apocalypse
text:
Wake up to a world where intelligent machines are one step closer to world domination. You’ve been sent on a mission to a science facility which has been invaded by the machines and it’s your job to take it back. But as you get there you notice that things are worse than anyone expected. Most scientists have been drugged (or possibly killed) and it’s up to you to wipe out the machines and bring some order to this world.

There are lots and lots of Cities to Own and to Pay for.

This map Requires 1 Dice, 2 players and 1 Banker and a Maximum of 2 Dice, 8 players and 8 Bankers.

title: RS Smart Modern House
text:
RS Smart Modern House Super Ultra

This map features a relatively small house but with much more to show. There are over 60 redstone creations and together they use more than 500 command blocks.

title: System Unknown
text:
System Unknown (Subtitle: Don't download this map)

The game begins in the darkness. If you jump down in that darkness, someone will tell you.

# Storyline

You join a map where the map creator hasn't assigned the system to to anything!

title: Infinite Custom Flats (Updated)
text:
Infinite Custom Super Flats

This custom flat world map pack includes seven different worlds and all of them are infinite. There is everything from a completely empty world (with just air and some stone blocks) to an infinite flat world made out of wool blocks.

# What's new?

• Added Nether biome, End biome

title: Find the Lever
text:
This map is about finding a lever that is in a room to move to the next, there are 10 rooms on 2 levels, that is, 20 rooms in total... (Or it maybe 21 rooms...)
You will also find secret places.

Can you find the lever? Can you overcome the 2 levels?

title: Custom Worlds: Void
text:
The first of 7 customized worlds perfect for make test, create games and useful for showing buildings, tutorial maps and more your imagination is the limit!!

This void world has more than 3258000 blocks replaced with air!!! perfect for elytra maps, skywars and more.

# Creator

• Twitter: @In_Nova01

title: Lava Parkour
text: There are nine parkour courses on this map. Most of the levels are made up of challenges to bring gold ingots without falling into the lava.

title: PFP Series
text:
This map contains three minigames, Parkour, Find The Button, and Puzzle.
Each minigame consists of three levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard.
Each level also has several parts.

# Creator

• Twitter: @M7MoGameR
• Google+: M7MoGameR
• XBox Live: M7MoGameR

title: New Portal to the Sun
text: This is a new sun portal in Minecraft PE that goes to the sun dimension! Enjoy!

title: Piston Dirt Hut
text:
Piston Dirt Hut in Minecraft PE made by SsEluxX

Once inside the hut, put a dirt on the chest in the middle and see what happens.

title: Santa Claus House
text: This map features the house of Santa Claus. There are gift boxes and Christmas tree around the house. This map will soon be upgraded to Santa Village by adding houses around.

title: Minigames City
text: The Minigames City is a an amusement park with more than 15 different minigames you and your friends can enjoy. We highly recommend playing this map with other players seeing as most minigames require at least two players to be enjoyable. There are everything from archery games to boat races. You can expect at least one hour worth of gameplay here.

title: Invisible Parkour 2
text:
This map is a parkour map called Invisible Parkour 2

# How To Play

There will in invisible blown either above or below you and you have to follow the slab.

title: ArenaSphere Elite - PvP
text: This is a PvP map which means it should be played with and against other players. It’s a big arena surrounded by walls and there are many areas to be explored such as jungles, forests and even mazes. Secrets both in terms of rooms and chests are scattered around the map so there is always a useful thing to be out exploring.

title: Fallout PE
text: Fallout PE is an open world survival map based on the popular post-apocalyptic Fallout games. The map is set in a world 200 years after a nuclear war which caused much of the world to collapse in some way or another. The environment is a destructible wasteland but with many interesting places to discover.

title: Simpsons Adventure Map
text:
The Simpsons in Minecraft Adventure Map is about ZOMBIES taking over springfield and its your job to stop them!

# Prologue

You're Homer J. Simpson
Reciently you stopped Mr. Burns from releasing a deadly virus into the city!
But then you realized that you didn't really do anything...
Now Mr. Burns has a huge army of zombies taking over the city.
And once again you have to stop him.

# Rules

• Read all the sign
• Only go into the buildings when the signs say!
• You can only place sand blocks when the signs say!
• You can't break any type of block or item.
• Use levers to open iron doors.
• Play in easy or a higher difficulty!
• Do what the signs say!

This map was created for desktop version by Mjhurtado, and ported to PE by SpiderMau0744.

Enjoy it!

title: SG Zombies 2 (Gun PvE)
text:
SG Zombies 2 is a PvE sequel of SG Zombies. In this map we have added guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack plus re-wrote the whole code so there is way less lag. It has also been created on an entire new map with 6 different zones and loads of gates to unlock. There are more cool features and the waves are also a whole lot harder!

Hey Cloudies! We now have a 1.4 Survival server!

Join for some awesome aquatic anarchy fun! bedrock.pig.sg

# Other Maps

• SG Zombies 1
• SG Zombies 3
• SG Zombies 4
• SG Zombies 5
• SG Zombies 6

title: Big Modern Mansion
text: This map features a big modern mansion with some small redstone mechanisms.

title: Mr Porco: The Rescue
text: This is a unique type of minigame where you need to save Mr Porco (which is the name of a pig) through a series of obstacle courses. You (and the pig) will be separated on two different platforms and together you will have to find a way to complete each level.

title: The 10 Challenges
text: There are 10 different challenges in this map. Challenges include parkour, puzzle, shooting, maze, find the button, and more.

title: Modern Mountain House
text:
This map includes a beautiful modern house built on the mountain.

There are two versions available for download.

• BPPE (Blue Power) Shader applied version
• Original version

title: SkyWars Minigame
text: SkyWars Minigame is a PvP map for up to 8 players. There are a total of 16 floating islands where 8 of them are meant as the start point for each player. On the island in the center there is a temple which should be the objective of every player to access as there are plenty of great gear in chests there.

title: 10 Things for A Horror Map
text: This map includes lots of inspiration, tips and ideas for anyone who wants to make a scary and at the same time interesting horror map. Creating an adventure is mostly about making it as immersive as possible. There are multiple ways this can be done but some examples include implementing a well thought out storyline, creating custom sounds and adding jumpscares.

title: Elondrian Village
text: Elondrian Village is a steampunk village situated deep into the forest. There are a lot of different structures to be explored and as it’s built in a forest there are lots of area which can be used to expand the size of the village.

title: Modern Futuristic House
text:
The house on this map was inspired by the YouTube Video from JazzGhost.
The creator of this map recommends using texture packs with transparent glass on this map.

There are two versions available for download.

• SenseCraft Texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: Amusement Park Creation
text: This is a map that recreates amusement park into the Minecraft world. There is no attractions to enjoy with minecart or boat, but it is a map that gives you great satisfaction just by exploring.

title: Temple Run PE
text:
Temple Run PE is a timed parkour map where the ground behind you will get pulled away by pistons as you continue through the map. Every two checkpoints you will get 10 seconds added to the clock but it’s never enough time to rest. You constantly have to be on your move if you want to complete this map.

Storyline
You work as an archaelogist and currently you find yourself in a temple. As you reach out to grab a golden idol you can hear a rumbling sound and the ground beneath you starts shaking. Even though you are terrified you decide to make a run for it. Every 30 seconds or so the ground behind you is being pulled away and you constantly have to jump from one block to another to stay alive.

Rules
• Never place or break blocks
• Play on peaceful in survival mode

title: The Minigames
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map contains several minigames. Some minigames are not yet complete.
Most minigames are easy and short. However, all playable minigames are built using command blocks, and they are very interesting.
I hope other mini games will be completed soon.

# Features

• Parkour (3 levels)
• Maze
• Elytra Challenge
• Pig Race (Multiplayer game)

In the case of the elytra challenge, the pressure plate does not seem to work at the end. Coordinates for return: /tp 2 9 2

title: Monster Factory
text:
This is a wave based PvE map with six normal waves of monsters to conquer. There’s also a special seventh wave as a master challenge. Everywhere in the map I’ve hidden little funny things. Don’t be shy, search for them.

While the monsters are spawning there might will happen some lag so make sure, you’re safe as much as possible after flicking the levers starting the waves.

You can play with up to sixteen friends.

title: Blocks Angeles
text:
Blocks Angeles is one of the best Minecraft Pocket Edition maps created for your enjoyment.  Created in the October of 2014, Blocks Angeles is one of the fastest growing MCPE maps

Version 1.2

title: Who's Your Daddy?
text:
Who’s Your Daddy? is a minigame based on the popular PC game which have been played by several popular YouTubers such as PewDiePie. In this minigame you will need at least two players. One who will act as the baby and the other who will act as the clueless father trying to do his best to keep his baby alive for as long as possible.

How to play?

To be able to play the minigame you will need at least two players. Here are the objectives for each player:

• Baby : Try to kill yourself (yes, it sounds horrific but it’s just a fun game, don’t take it too seriously!)
• Daddy : Keep your baby alive! Basically keep it from danger.
Once both players have read the rules and instructions of the map and entered the house then the minigame begins.

There are multiple dangers scattered around the entire inside and outside of the house. Take for example this dangerous staircase.

And you don’t want your baby getting his (or her) hands on any of these items. Make sure to remove those quickly before it’s too late!

Our suggestion is to set a 10-15 minutes timer before the game ends. If the baby is still alive and well by then then the daddy has been successful.

Rules
• Set difficulty to peaceful
• Don’t break blocks unless told to do so

title: The Arabian Village
text:
This map consists of a large Arabian temple and small houses which belong to village surrounding it. Everything in the map is built as one would imagine an old Arabian village located in the desert would look like. It’s especially beautiful during the night as every single build has been decorated with torches and glowstones to make them emit beautiful lights.
(Map name in-game: Desert Build)

title: Modern Mansion Near Village
text:
This map features a modern mansion near a village. This mansion has a unique tree house and a pond on the rooftop. Inside the mansion is a café and a farm.

Note: The original name of this map is Super Mansion.

title: Missing Color
text: Missing Color is a parkour map taking place in a colorless environment. It’s as if the colors have been absorbed by an unknown force and it’s your objective to find a way out from this foreign place. But it’s not going to be easy because the only colors you will be able to see are black and white.

title: Achievement World (Challenge)
text:
This map was created to allow you to get all of the achievements in Minecraft PE except for just one which is the Adventuring Time Achievement. The reason for that is because it’s set in a flat world.
But other than that you will be able to get 78 out of 79 achievements!

# How does it work?

Make sure that you are signed in to your Xbox Live (Microsoft) account. Then enter the world.

title: Maze of Amaze
text:
This map features 10 small mazes and each maze is different and challenging in its own way.

# What's new?

• Added roofs to all levels
• Command block teleportation fixes
• Bug fixes

title: Atlantis Map
text:
Atlantis appears to be some sort of spawn which can be used on servers. But it’s also worth a download just to experience the many magnificent builds. You will spawn in the center of the big palace deep underground. There are some ladders which lead up to the surface. Surrounding the palace are several smaller houses, boats and a huge wall of water. It should be noted though that it appears to be a ported map which means it was originally created for the PC version of Minecraft.

Texture: John Smith Legacy

title: Find The Button Biomes 2
text:
This is a find the button map where you have to find a button to move to the next level for each level.
There are 6 levels in total, each level has its own theme.

title: The Adventures Islands
text:
You get in the middle of several beautiful islands, but you’re not alone. Monsters, animals, witches… A portal to the Nether surrounds you. You get to visit all the Islands? You will stay alive for a long time?

• Maximum number of player possible: 5 players
• Support language: French / English
• Game time: 4-8 hours

title: Glass Tower
text:
Glass Tower is a minigame spleef map which requires at least two players (but preferably more) to be enjoyable to play. An addon is included to enable some new explosive items and other tweaks to make the minigame as smooth as possible to play.

The glass towers consists of 7 different floor levels. On each each level you can obtain explosive eggs or explosive snowballs. The objective is to throw these explosives at the floor to make other players fall down. Due to an addon, you will no longer take attack damage or fall damage.

The winner is the one who is the last man or woman standing in the last level of the tower.

# Creator

• Cleverlike & SnakeyeZZ

title: VerseCrafter: Eternal Envy
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

VerseCrafter: Eternal Envy is the third map in a series of adventure and puzzle maps where you as a player will go on a journey through your own memories and try to unlock the forgotten. By completing the previous two maps you’ve successfully passed two memory gates but you’re not done yet. The next challenge requires you to conquer the emotion of “Greed”. As a whole, it’s a fun and experimental adventure with an intriguing storyline.

# Storyline

Ren Harrow is a man whom has lost all of his memories, and must now pass seven gates each one being an emotional aspect, to reach the Hall of Memories to find himself again..

title: Batcave 1.0
text: The Ultimate Batcave made with tons of redstone mechanisms and greatly made with creative designing. Completed with a hidden entrance.

title: Hide and Seek: Gumball
text:
This is a fun hide-and-seek minigame based on The Amazing World of Gumball. It has some very cool hiding places.

The Amazing World of Gumball is an animated television series created by Ben Bocquelet for Cartoon Network.

# How to play?

This map requires at least 2 players but can be played with as many players you want. At least one of the players has to be a seeker.

• The hiders should jump down and find a good hiding place.
• The seeker spend some time in the cobweb by pressing a button. Once the seeker has passed through the cobweb he or she can start looking for other players.

title: Spleef by AutoGrind
text:
Spleef is a fun multiplayer minigame for Minecraft. As a player you’ll get a shovel which you can use to break the ground underneath other players to make them fall into the lava. This is the first spleef map (for Pocket Edition) with an automatic reset button in-game. But since it uses command blocks it’s only available for version 1.0.5 (or higher) for Minecraft PE.
Have fun!

title: ASLEEP
text: This map contains various dreams that you sleep in one night.

title: Andrej’s Brain Game
text:
Andrej’s Brain Game is another puzzle map by AndrejHQ.
This one has 6 levels based on version 1.0.0 or 0.17.0 features!

Hope you have fun!

title: Simple Starter House
text: This map was created by TDB. It's a suburban house designed by Keralis.

title: Kidsource PVP Arena
text: This is a medium sized PvP area with lots of weapons, levels, ladders and staircases – the fun never ends! Enjoy a rousing battle with your friends, or maybe an intense game of hide and seek. It’ a great map to use for a local game party or your Realms server, and Kidsource gives you full rights to use it as you like as long you leave their credits sign in-game.

title: Working Nintendo Game Boy
text:
This is a recreation of the original Game Boy which was released by Nintendo back in 1989. It includes many cool features such as having the ability to load 6 different types of cartridges and many other things as well.

For more information, check out the YouTube video below.

title: SG Tetris Dodge
text: This is a fun and sometimes extremely intense minigame with game mechanics somewhat similar to Tetris. Your objective is basically to climb to the top of the arena with the help of some falling blocks, but all the time you have to keep clear of the anvils which have the potential to crush you if you’re unlucky.

title: Lost in Time
text:
Welcome to Lost in Time! An adventure Map that will bring you all throughout the world that the humans have created!

# Storyline & Rules

• All located within the map so go have fun!

# Backstory

This was an idea I came up with two years ago on a team called Team Flame. It was originally going to be our first major project, but like most small teams back then, it fell apart and no one really had the drive to work on it. It took me a little while to get back into it, but when I did I went hard. Basically in the time that I really went hard on building, I built the majority of the actual map. Then I got busy with school this past year and I had to put this on hold. Then when you gained the ability to change from creative mode to survival mode, plus plug PE was created I was finally able to fill the chests effectively. Then more recently this summer I did all of the busy work and built walls, the sky, and tested the map multiple times. Now finally after three years I have finished the mega project that has been through so many ups and downs! And you guys can go play it yourself!

# Notes

• You can just download the McWorld.
• or if you download the McTemplate, you can reset your world by using it.

title: Cubic Parkour 4x4x4
text: 64 levels of parkour in a big cube, thank u for playing, have fun!!!!!!!

title: Patrician House
text: Patrician House: Kawaii Version

title: Apple Store
text:
Apple Store is a chain of retail stores owned and operated by Apple Inc., dealing with computers and consumer electronics.

This map has recreated the Apple Store on a Minecraft map. It is made up of three floors, with tables and chairs that can display Apple products on each floor.

title: The Command Block Bunker
text:
The Command Block bunker Made by FormalJek14

A bunker fully powered by command blocks with secret places and defenses. Hope you enjoy it!

title: Structure Animation
text: This creation can be used as a base to build your own animation or to play a preset animation. It uses lots of redstone and command blocks in order to enable this process to happen. It provides a great tutorial for anyone who would want to build and implement something similar in their own worlds.

title: The Monster Arena 2.0
text:
The Monster Arena 2.0 is a PvE map featuring various monsters, shops, and a deserted arena. This map has been upgraded in many ways, including armor, monsters, and a better arena than in the previous version.

# How to play?

Talk to the villagers in the map to learn how to play this map.

Previous Map: The Monster Arena 1

* If you talk to villagers but don't know how to get into the arena, it might be helpful to tap on the bottom picture and watch a short video.

title: SG InfiniRun (Infinite Parkour)
text:
SG InfiniRun is an endless parkour map which automatically add on new levels as you progress in the game.

# How to play?

• In the bottom center of the screen there is a timer which counts down your current time left for that round.
• You can extend your time by picking up the dropped items from the ground.
• If you miss a jump and fall down a platform then it’s game over.

title: The Ruins: Chapter I
text:
The Ruins: Chapter I is a multiplayer minigame in which the objective is to try to find 32 diamonds. The diamonds can be found hidden in a numerous of chests scattered around in a town of ruins. It’s a non-competitive map which can be played by friends who want to go on a little adventure in a cool world.

# Tip

Watch out for traps!!

# Rules

• Play on survival/peaceful
• Breaking blocks and building are allowed
• Up to two players can play

title: Cloud Quest
text:
Cloud Quest is a survival challenge where you first will spawn high up in the sky on one of the islands. From there you have to gather resources and survive to one day find a way over to the other islands and collect their resources.

On each island there are quests which you can complete. The quests help guide you in your gameplay for a longer chance of surviving. It’s definitely a fun map which can bring many hours of fun. It’s especially recommended to play together with friends.

# Rules

• You are only allowed to connect to other islands using stone bricks
• Complete all quests on each island
• Survive for as long you can without dying and respawning

# Creators

• BaconCake, embryo

title: Five Nights at Freddy’s 4 - House
text:
Five Night’s at Freddy’s 4 - House is a hide-and-seek minigame which can be played by up to four players. One of the players should be a seeker and the rest should try to find a good hiding place. It is allowed to place torches but if you want to make it even more difficult and a little bit more scary then don’t allow any torches.

# Rules

• Don’t break blocks
• Don’t place any blocks except for torches
• Only one is allowed to be a seeker
• 2-4 players

title: The Floor Kills
text:
The Floor kills is a multiplayer minigame where you have to do quite simple parkour in order to complete an obstacle course.
In the obstacle course you will come across a few different blocks which give different boost effects (and sometimes bad ones):

• Green (Jump Boost)
• Blue (Speed Boost)
• Yellow (Checkpoint)
• Light Blue (Slowness)
• Dark Blue (Invisibility)
• Black (Blindness)

title: Modern Town 2
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft version 1.4.0 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft version is 1.4.0 or higher before downloading.

This map includes a modern town full of unique design houses.

title: Egg Wars (Demo)
text:
Enjoy a good offline game of egg wars with your friends.

This game contains special features like:

• Main lobby 
• Three teams to play
• Customized trading with villagers
• Customized dispensers in each island
• Your own dragon egg
• Special room with all the mechanisms
• Restart button (it doesn't work yet)

If you want to play again, simply re-create the map using the template (McTemplate).
This map is still a work in progress.

# Creator

• Twitter: @In_Nova01
• YouTube: in nova games
• Facebook: Innova Gyt

title: The Rain
text: This map is based on a Netflix original show called The Rain. You’ll spawn inside a bunker which is in need of Energy Rods. A more thorough gameplay guide will be presented to you as you’re playing the game.

title: Mind Your Foot!
text: This is a redstone minigame which you need to beware from falling down. The corresponding redstone lamp will turn on if that block is going to pulled by piston. You must get to other blocks, otherwise you will fall into lava and game over.

title: Japanese Castle
text: It was build for creation. Have fun and explore the wonderful history of Japan!

title: BeatCrafter (v1.1)
text:
BeatCrafter is an advanced redstone machine which lets you create your own music within Minecraft. It’s basically a machine/sequencer/controller all-in-one for making all kinds of beats. It’s highly recommended to watch the video tutorial further down on this page to learn more about making your own music.

# What's new in v1.1?

• All sounds can be heard by all players in the same map
• The gain of sounds have been adjusted for more flexibility
• Changed the position of each sound (for fixed the gain when you create a pattern, more useless for adjust the pan)

title: Police Force Command Blocks
text:
Let's face it. Cops are amazing! In this command block creation, you can simulate the job of a cop!

# Creator

• YouTube: ScopedInGaming

title: The Evil Octopus
text:
An evil octopus has surfaced from the water and for unknown reasons she hates the Minecraft universe and wants to destroy it all. It’s up to you to protect this world from total demolition. Find a way to its head and pull the lever to blow it up.

It's a short parkour map, but it's well designed so it's fun to play.

title: Easy Skyblock Challenge
text:
Not just any old skyblock map here.....this one has a Kidsource twist! You'll start the challenge with some great basic items. Start the day rocking, with an existing cobblestone generator! Yep, this bad boy pumps out all the cobblestone you will ever need.....so build if you must (looks off into the distance)....build if you must!

Oh, and let's not forget, you will also start with a house, bed, crafting table, chest, furnace, fully grown garden, and an endless water supply. So don't sweat the little things, bust out the challenges. Oh yes, there are two challenges to tempt all the true gamers out there.

# First challenge

Build your way across the sky to all of the islands. What....wait....islands....plural?! Yep. There are four islands total, the starter island and three bonus islands. With the cobblestone generator and your mad skills, this is considered the "easy challenge."

# Second challenge

Build an entire skyblock city. An entire skyblock city.....can you do that?  Yes.....yes you can.  The whole team at Kidsource believes in you. It's not going to be easy, but it's going to be fun...so this one is the "epic challenge."

# About creator

Enjoy the map and be sure to check out the Kidsource channel on YouTube. You can follow us on Twitter @1Kidsource1 and on Facebook at kidsourceminecraft.

title: The Horror Attraction (FNAF 3)
text: The Horror Attraction is a part of the popular Pocket Nightmare map series. It’s a hide-and-seek minigame with the intention to bring the look and feel of Five Nights at Freddy’s video game to Minecraft PE. This map is a replica of the location where Five Nights at Freddy’s 3 takes place.

title: DeathCore I: Wonderground
text: This is the first map in the DeathCore CTM (Complete the Monument) map series. The main objective is to do whatever necessary to survive and find the blocks to complete a monument. It takes place in an underground world where there are plenty of monsters and other obstacles to make things more difficult for you (and your friends if you choose to player it in multiplayer). The map is recommended for 1-4 players.

title: Circuit Friends (v2.1)
text:
Circuit Friends is the sequel to Circuit Scramble. This map requires two players who must work together to find the solution to challenging logic puzzles.

There are 16 different levels and they include a few hidden surprises here and there.

# What's new in v2.1?

• Fixedn not being able to progress past the first 5 levels
• Removed Herobrine

# Creator

• AgentCPU0, TheGamingCyclone

title: The Ravine House TNC
text:
This map features a two-story house hanging over the top of the ravine. There is a village on the ravine, which helps to survive.

Why do not you start a new adventure from this house?

title: Parkour IB 1

This is a parkour map that contains 5 levels of unique themes.
This map is very enjoyable, and it is well made for each level, so it makes your eyes happy.

title: AM Land Amusement Park (Updated)
text:
AM Land is an amusement park with lots of things to enjoy. It includes the following amusement facilities.

• The Volcano Rollercoaster
• Orbit Rollercoaster
• Creeper Maze
• Racetrack Ride
• Waterslides
• Tube Ride

and a little more.

Almost every attraction found in the amusement park can be experienced.

# Notes

• We have repaired the rollercoasters and racetracks.
• If the rollercoaster stops, it will work again when you go forward.

title: Journal 3
text:
Journal 3 is an epic adventure map taking place in the kingdom of Atbash. You are a known hero in your kingdom and the king wants you to go on an adventure to find the third Magi. Journey through epic winter landscapes, ancient forests and into the depth of the Nether to stay true to your duty, find the Magi and save the kingdom from being doomed.

# Storyline

You are a known hero in the kingdom of Atbash and you’ve been awarded titles and rewards for your achievements in the army. The king has called you to his chamber to stand before an audience but it doesn’t strike you as an oddity as it’s something you do almost every day. But today, it appears, isn’t any day and you are soon set out on an adventure to save the kingdom from being doomed for all eternity.

title: Small Stream Cottage
text: Ever dreamt of a small cottage situated on a small island next to a river or a lake in a summer landscape? Everything about that dream can become true (at least in Minecraft) with this small stream cottage. Even though everything about it is small and tidy it looks so cozy. The details is incredible like the smoke coming from the chimney and the cute windmill.

title: GCS Battle Grounds (OP Kit PvP)
text:
GCS Battle Grounds is a PvP minigame featuring three separate maps in one world as well as 10 unique kits!
This is basically a free-for-all (never-ending) PvP game which lets you pick a class of your choice and then instantly teleports you to the battlegrounds.

title: Espial - A Puzzle And Escape Map
text:
Espial is a Puzzle/Escape map based on The Code from MC:PC. Espial takes the ideas of puzzles, mind tricks, illusion, and wisdom, and brings them to Minecraft: Pocket Edition. Over 30 puzzles and 1+ hours of gameplay, Espial is sure to deliver a mind-blowing experience.

The Code on PC was built on the grounds of the quartz block. Although the majority of Espial is quartz, important sections of the map change. Pay attention to these changes. The map is not straight-forward, therefore the player has to have a keen eye and notice small details to progress through the map. Yes, every puzzle can be completed.

# Storyline

This is simply for you to discover.

# Rules

• Do not place or break blocks unless told to. Or neccessary.
• Cheating is in no way acceptable.
• Signs are your guide.
• Do not stray to other parts of the map.

title: Rainbow Parkour
text:
This is a fun parkour map with 10 levels, each based on a different color.

# How To Play

You must complete each challenging parkour course. There are some blocks in levels, such as ice, magma, etc., that make the course even more difficult. This can be played in either singleplayer or multiplayer, but it is more fun competing with your friends. Play in adventure mode, peaceful difficulty, and render distance 5 chunks. Have fun!

title: Texture Pack Review Map
text: This map is useful for showcasing texture packs as it includes most of the existing blocks and items for Minecraft. A great part about this map is that the blocks haven’t just be lined up in a row but instead they have been used to create some cool structures. You don’t necessarily need to showcase something for YouTube to use this map. It’s really great for anyone who just want a better overview of a pack they’re using.

title: Mega Dropper XMAS
text: Mega Dropper XMAS is an amazing dropper map with six unique levels somehow relating to the colors of Christmas. Santa is kept in captivity and to save him you need six keys to unlock a door which can be obtained by completing all dropper levels. Christmas is only a few days ahead, or maybe it is Christmas Day on the day you are reading this, either way it’s a suitable map to play during the holidays.

But there are loads of monsters down there so make sure you’re well prepared. Once you’ve completed this little quest you can continue on your own adventure.

text: This map features a fully automated racing system with sounds, music and even position detection at the end! In addition to that, you can check out all the other vehicles in the Vanilla Vehicles Addon has by opening the Vehicles Garage found within the world.

title: Sand Scrambler
text:
Sand Scrambler is a minigame where each player is given a flint & steel and then have to enter a room made out of mostly wood. The players are allowed to set the ceiling on fire and after a while sand will fall down. The last player standing who hasn’t yet been suffocated by the sand is the winner. This is the first time we have posted such a map on the website and I gotta say it’s a pretty fun minigame!

# How to play?
Take a flint & steel each from the chest. Then enter the arena and wait for all players to join. (Do not use the flint and steel yet.)

As soon as everyone have entered the arena then spread out inside the arena and start a countdown from 5. Once it has started you are supposed to set the birch wood (ceiling) on fire using the flint & steel. I recommend that you set a use limit per user otherwise it will end too quickly.

The objective is to avoid getting suffocated by the sand which will come falling down from the ceiling.

title: Snowy Hell 2
text:
This map is a Mini CTM harcore high difficulty map, excellent for entertaining experienced players.

But ... what is a CTM ?, a CTM or complete the monument is a survival map that consists of placing certain blocks in a monument, but ... you must be thinking that that is very easy, well ... no Because each block is in a zone guarded by dozens of monsters, so it is not an easy task.

 In this map I have put into practice new construction techniques that I have acquired over time, which means that this could be the best map I have ever made; The decor of the map is very beautiful and impressive, with large and imposing landscapes that provide a long but not so pleasant XD play time

Thanks to ElmerTech for being the beta map tester: Twitter: @Elmertech23

# Information

• Difficulty
• Mini CTM harcore
• 4 Wool
• This map demands a powerful processor.
• One player
• The rules are on the map

If you like this map, follow @jobetyk on Twitter.

Can you complete the challenge?

title: Dead by Daylight PE
text:
Dead by Daylight PE is a multiplayer survival minigame based on a video game with the same name. The map features a 100 x 100 blocks game area where survivors have to activate 5 different generators to be able to open a gate and escape.

# How to play?

This map is recommended for 2-5 players. Wait in the lobby for everyone to spawn before assigning everyone a role. The most fair option is to randomize the killer.

• Survivor – Your mission is to activate the generators and the ultimately escape out of the gate.
• Killer – You’re equipped with a scythe and your task is to slay the other players before they escape. Do not let them activate the generators!

title: Find The Items: GSE (v6)

Find The Items: Generated Structures Edition (v6)

# What's new in v6?

• Added 3 new levels
• Bug fixes

Find The Items is a new minigame not that different from Find The Button. Each level includes a structure which normally relate to some type of biome in Minecraft. However, in this minigame you will need to search through the structure (and the surrounding area) to find items. The items are hidden in normal chests and shulker chests and are basically keys for accessing the next level.

title: SG Lake Lunge
text:
Lake Lunge is a fun dropper style minigame where the struggle gets progressivly harder! Dodge the lilypads!
