Jump into the pond to start to start the game. Then avoid the lily pads and try to land into the water. The goal is to survive as many falls as possible.

Tap on the picture below to preview how to play.

title: Island Paradise
text:
This map was originally made for a building contest, UBO August. Also, this was submitted for Nebs top 5 season 3. If this gives you inspiration sure!

# Creator

• Twitter: @TrollofMCPE

title: Hospital 2 (Horror!)
text: Waking up you find yourself inside an abandoned hospital. Let’s just say that everything that can go wrong does exactly that. As there’s no electricity all of the lights are out. However, you’ve got a night vision camera! As much as it’s useful it also adds an whole other level of creepiness to the experience. Search for a way out and find out if you’re really alone..

title: The Mystic Dragon Kingdom
text: It’s another amazingly epic map created by TitanX. In the map you will find the most marvelous and creative creations you probably haven’t set your eyes on in a long time.

title: Thunder High
text: This is an edited version of a very popular high school. It is called Thunder High and is edited to have a hot tub, dorms, cafe, park, water slide, gym, and other edited rooms.

title: Keralis Modern House 8
text: This is the keralid modern house 8, ported by themrjoojo

title: Haunted Manor - PvP
text: Haunted Manor is an epic creative map. It can be use for PvP and also for Kingdom Roleplay. The build is quite big so there's lots of room to run around in.

title: Titans Tower Mini
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

Titans Tower is a fictional building in the DC Comics universe. Its various incarnations have been home to the superhero team called the Titans.

This map features a small-sized version of the Titans Tower.

title: Weather Parkour
text:
The climate will change for each stage.
Cloudy, rainy, snowy, such as climate, there are floods.

The total stage is 20 steps.
The first part is easy, but is very difficult second half.

title: Redstone Wooden House
text: This map features a small wooden house with lots of redstone creations.

title: SG Questful (Demo) - Fix
text:
SG Questful is a fun adventure for anyone who enjoy questing. You’ll start out in one part of these vast lands and from there you will go on a great journey to complete a series of quests. Most quests relate to obtaining specific items and then bring them to other characters in the adventure.

# What has been fixed?

• Fixed a missing command in chapter 4 which stopped the game!

title: Capture The Sheep
text: This game requires at least four players to start. Each team’s objective is to capture a sheep and somehow bring it back to their base to score points. You can also upgrade your items by getting new items from the villager at your base.

title: Sun Life Stadium
text:
Sun Life Stadium is an american football stadium in Florida. It is the home of two american football teams called Miami Dolphins National Football League and University of Miami Hurricanes. It can hold up to 80000 people in the audience so as you can probably imagine it is a really big stadium.

Here we’ve got an almost replica of the stadium. The similarities are many just by comparing the Minecraft version with the real one through images. It’s definitely one of the better stadiums out there created for Pocket Edition.

title: Mini Cities - Mini City Texture
text:
This is a map that includes four mini-cities.
The mini-cities included in this map were created by Tpops using the Mini City Texture Pack.

Mini City Texture Pack was created by Asl00 and ported to PE by David Kauerhof.

# Twitter

• David Kauerhof (@david_kauerhof)
• Tpops (@tpops2015)

title: Archery Adventure
text:
This is an adventure map. Your objective is to complete the map but your only weapon is bow.
This map tests your skills with bow and also your parkour skills.

# This map includes

• Target practice
• Parkour
• Rollercoasters
• Lots of unique levels
• Redstone alternatives
• Zombie pigmen fights

title: ElytraElite: Carnival
text:
This is an elytra map with creations inspired by the Brazilian Carnival.

There are four levels included in the map and each level consists of enough challenges to make them both exciting and enjoyable to play.

title: Entity_505 The Return
text:
This is my second map but now is the story of all this crazy adventure this time the things are different and he is back....and another want to destroy the world you must stop him Enjoy

Previous Map: Entity_505 The New Terror

title: Parkour Lab
text:
Welcome to the Amphyps Parkour Lab! Practice and test your skills in 3 different parkour courses! Courses include:

• Blocks and Fences
• Ladders
• Speedrun

# Features

• Auto teleportation when you fall

title: Antidropper (v2)
text:
The Antidropper is similar to the ordinary dropper in that sense that you need obstacles in order to complete a level. However, there’s one major difference. Instead of falling down, you’ll levitate up towards the sky! It can be a quite infuriating feeling to fail, but that’s also what makes it a fun and challenging minigame.

# What's new in v2?

• Added 5 new levels!

title: Lighthouse
text: This map features an island with a lighthouse and a small farm.

title: Mini Egg Wars
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.1 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.1 or higher before downloading.

Egg Wars is a really fun multiplayer map where the main objective is to protect a sacred egg against the attacking team. But since it does involve PvP (meaning, killing other players) you will need to find other players who are willing to participate. By looking at the size of the map I think somewhere between 2-8 players are suitable for playing this map.

title: Sky Jump
text:
This is a Parkour map consisting of a total of 10 stages in the sky.
You will be able to clear all stages even if you are a beginner because each stage has a checkpoint.

There are some special blocks in this parkour map.

• Black: kill the player
• Gray: give the player a levitation effect for a few seconds
• Light Blue: give the player a speed boost for a few seconds.

* Because the creator is Indonesian, there will be some spelling mistakes in the game. But it is enough to understand the game.

# Creator

• YouTube: TypoName YT

title: Josef Tower
text:
This tower is from Redstoneworld of Thejocraft. It's not over yet and the Redstone are not yet functional. But it is in progress.

It will be worth exploring not only the beautiful exterior but also the well-decorated interior of each floor.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: Sky Adventure
text:
This is an extreme survival map similar to the SkyBlock, with command blocks and a special texture pack added that make it even more fun to play than the original SkyBlock.

IMPORTANT: In this map, you need to use a custom crafting table. To do so, you need to change the UI Profile to Classic. (Settings> Video> UI Profile> Classic)

You can learn more about how to play the game by watching the showcase video below.

title: Ideas for Missile
text:
This map has 7 missiles. Each of them are very different from each other.
Some causes huge distraction, some bounces off TNT launched from cannon, some creates huge stairs, and much more... To launch off those missiles, you simply just need to push the wooden button on the piston, which can be found under the missile.

title: Hardcore Runner II
text: Hardcore Runner II is a speedrun minigame. Use Speed III effect to increase your speed and then try to complete all three levels.

title: TYKingdom
text: This is a creative map featuring a medieval castle and a village.

title: PVP Wars - The Obelisk
text:
This Minigame needs 4-6 players for 2 vs 2 or 3 vs 3. There's 2 teams, red team and blue team, and each team have to defend called "Obelisk" (Look at the picture below for what it looks like).

You only have 3 objectives and they are:

1. Defend
2. Attack
3. Gear up

• You need to Defend your obelisk so that the enemy can't destroy it.
• You need to Attack the enemy's obelisk to claim your Victory.
• You need to Gear up like getting iron blocks, and craft it as your sword and armor so your enemy will have hard time with you.

title: Entity_303 Boss Battle (v2)
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This map includes the great challenge of fighting Entity_303 in an epic boss battle.

# Storyline

You are the protector of the Overworld (Entity_505) and your greatest enemy is Entity_303 (replaces blaze). He is an evil villain whose main goal is to destroy the Overworld but so far his attempts have been unsuccessful. It’s up to you to once and for all defeat Entity_303 and at last exterminate him from this world.

# Entity_303’s Abilities

• Shoots fireballs
• Summons minions (wither skeletons)
• Summons lightning
• Drops anvils on you
• Poisonous attack

# Retextured Items

• Corrupted Sword (Iron Sword)
• Photon Sniper (Bow)
• Photon (Arrow)
• Elixir Flask (Golden Apple)
• Entity_505 Custome (Diamond Armor)

# What's new in v2

• Added Entity 303’s voice (heard at the beginning of a round)
• Two new options inthe lobby: Behind the scenes and Entity 303’s words
• Battle is now harder and it takes longer to finish
• Boss health has been increased to 250 full hearts from 100
• Improved the multiplayer compatibility
• Anvils disappear when a round is finished

title: Music Maker
text: This is a really cool map which you can use to compose your own music using a huge instrument somewhat similar to a piano. You can add your own notes to a track and then listen to your own music.

title: SG Bed Wars (Updated)
text:
This is a fully functional BedWars minigame which which can be played by loads of players at the same time. It features one arena called the Desert Destroyers and it also includes a fully automated shop. You will be able to collect items in-game and then trade them for other items and it’s all done with a very simple chest user interface.

# How to play?

This is a PvP minigame which supports a lot of players. Use the stone shovel (which you retrieve upon spawning) to destroy the beds. Make sure to use the dyed armors to remember who is on which team.

# How to exchange items?

There is also a chest with two hoppers. Place the items you want to exchange in the slot between the hoppers
To do this, you need to change the UI Profile as shown below.

• Settings > General > Video > UI Profile> Classic

title: Parkour Snake Adventure
text:
Parkour Snake Adventure is quite a unique parkour map.
In this map you have to find the weapons and items in the village and kill the giant snakes. In order to kill a giant snake you must have parkour skills and accurate shooting skills.

* Be sure to take the bow and arrow in the chest in the village!

title: Beautiful Paradise
text: There are two houses, a fishing hood, a little farm and a sea. It's perfect for playing together, for roleplay and for hide and seek. You can play there in survival too.

title: The Fleet
text: The map is called The Fleet of Air Ships. In the map you will find multiple floating ships and other unusual vehicles such as vehicles looking like a mixture between houses and helicopters.

title: iZi Parkour
text:
This is a classic parkour map. It is made up of 3 stages: Easy, Medium and Difficult. Each stage has its own theme, Overworld, Underground and Nether.

# Creators

• Platino_8K, troco40

title: Surgeon Simulator 2
text: Surgeon Simulator is a clever and fun minigame where you need to successfully complete operation on eight different patients to complete the map. Each person has his or her own problem which you need to figure out and try to solve in order to save her or his life. It’s a stressful job to work as a surgeon but nonetheless one of the most important ones in the world.

title: Steamshire Island
text:
This is a beautiful steampunk island map. Though it isn’t an adventure map or a survival, it’s still very much worth the download, simply for the fun of walking through it and seeing what can be done with a bunch of stacked blocks.

There are two versions available for download.

• CSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

# Creators

• Java Edition: LinchYinc
• Ported by: TheMrJooJo

title: Home Sweet Home (Horror)
text: This is a horror adventure which comes with two different endings based on your actions in the adventure. One ending is a horribly bad, so please try to avoid that. It’s a very sad story which you’ll learn all about while playing the adventure. The main concept of the map is that you’ll never know when you’re dreaming or when you’re awake. Keep in mind that there are multiple jumpscares, so be careful.

title: Snow Spleef
text:
This is a fun multiplayer minigame map. When the game starts, you will receive a shovel that will break the floor (snow) where the other players are standing. The player who has not fallen to the end wins.

This map is all done automatically by command blocks.

• At the end of the game, the map is automatically reset.
• Even if both players fall at the same time, you can see immediately who won.

# Creators

• kingryianv, mc3z0

title: Finn VS Jake
text:
This is a Lucky Block Race mini-game with the theme of Finn and Jake in Adventure Time.
2 players are required to play this mini-game, one for Finn's course and the other for Jake's course.

The objective is simple. Run through the course and destroy any lucky block which you come across. When you destroy one then something random happens.

# McWorld Version

Lucky blocks are already in place and you can play right away.

# McTemplate Version

The same thing always happens to a Lucky Block once it is placed. So, to avoid them, you always need to place new Lucky blocks before the start of the race.
In this version, you need to do the following before starting the game.

• Switch to Creative mode
• Place Lucky Blocks (Pig) where golden blocks are.
• Switch to Adventure mode

* This map contains the lucky block add-on (v2.0) created by Sprintermax.

title: Endless Tunnel (Remaster)
text: It’s basically a 2000 blocks long tunnel with more than 10 different stages which you’ll have to complete in order to finish it. This is actually a remaster (which totally deserves a new post) for the previous Endless Tunnel map.

title: Ultimate Survival Base
text: This map features a great survival base with multiple redstone creations which produce most necessities you need to be kept alive for a long time

title: Ultimate Slime Parkour
text: This is a hard parkour map. Sure, there are only four levels but each of them offers a good deal of challenges. In each level there are some normal blocks and a couple of slime blocks. The slime blocks act like trampolines and you will have to use that effect to get onto the next block in the parkour track.

title: Herobrine’s Terror (Horror)
text: Herobrine’s Terror is a short but really good horror map which takes place in a haunted house. You’ll be walking around in dark and quiet hallways. But occasionally, just to keep you on your toes, something scary will happen. It’s a great way to start Halloween. And if you think you’ve got nerves of steel now.. you’ll probably have to rethink that after playing the map!

title: One Shot One Kill
text:
This map is almost 5 years old and originally from the xbox 360 version of Minecraft. It is now on the mcpe version of the game. It's been updated with custom spawns and a spawning randomizer.

The objective is to kill all enemy players in the arena either by using a bow and arrow or a sword.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia (v4.1)
text:
Step inside the magical wardrobe and enter the world of Narnia where an epic adventure awaits. In this adventure map you will start out in the real world (in Minecraft) and then from there venture into the unknown lands of Narnia.

# Instructions

There is a consistent storyline (read all signs) all throughout the map which will keep you entertained while introducing you to many of the famous places in Narnia, such as the Cair Paravel (castle).

title: Metro 3.0
text:
This map includes more than 8 different subway stations, a fully automatic system for departure and other processes to keep things moving smoothly and without interruptions. There is also a custom texture pack which adds signs such as arrows and similar to make it a more seamless and enjoyable experience. Redstone is an essential part of this build which automates nearly everything.

# What's new in 3.0?

• New depart system
• New map
• New eight stations
• New design
• New UI

title: Welcome To Arendelle
text:
Welcome To A Disney Frozen Arendelle Map Where You Can See Arendelle Castle And Elsa's Ice Castle

This map is surrounded by huge mountains and ice.

title: The Core: The Forgotten Ruins
text:
The Forgotten Ruins is a very short adventure map that uses Redstone Alternatives.

After several months at sea you finally arrive at the place where the almighty Core is located. Travel underground in a long abandoned and forgotten temple to retrieve the object you have been longing to see for a very long time.

• If you tap the pictures below, spoilers may appear.

title: The Parkour Christmas
text:
The Christmas Parkour is the ultimate parkour map for the holidays. Delicious-looking (and huge) candy canes, beautiful Christmas trees and an imaginary terrain surrounding the creators make an excellent experience and definitely puts you in a Christmassy feel.
It’s a fun map with lots of challenges to be tackled. The map can be played alone or with friends – it’s completely up to you.

title: Gingerbread House
text: This map features a nice little gingerbread house in a beautiful winter landscape. If you’re looking for a new and more Christmassy home then this house is a great option.

title: Super Steampunk Village
text:
This is an amazing Steampunk Village map for Minecraft PE! It has an airship, a tavern, a windmill and much more!

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: The Rift
text:
The Rift is a custom made command block boss fight. The boss is basically a zombie, but unlike normal ones. This zombie is way stronger and can carry out multiple different attacks. Everything is powered by command blocks. It’s also programmed to track your movement and carry out special passive attacks (see about section). This map uses no special addons. Everything is vanilla based. There are 4 difficulties. Each difficulty decides the power-up spawn rate and the type of kit that you receive.

# What's new?

• Pufferfish Party: If you melee too much he’ll release a pack of pufferfish to haunt you.
• The boss now holds a trident (slight damage increase)
• Fixed the bug where it says “You Win” when you clearly lost
• Bows now added to the insane kit
• Pedestals are marked by cobblestone walls with wooden fences on top
• Now it’s easier to access the slime blocks
• Other minor changes

title: Connect 4
text: This map is a fully automatic minigame called Connect 4 in which players take turn to drop sand blocks (by pressing buttons) into a huge a grid. The first player to line up four cubes wins and you can easily restart the map by pressing a restart button in the lobby. It’s very easy to get started!

title: Parkour GO
text: In this map you will have to go through several diffrent parkuor challenges. There are no special rules. Just run and jump!

title: BedWars 1v1
text:
This is a BedWars map where you can enjoy one-on-one with your friend.

This map has a shop where items can be exchanged using command blocks and supports an iron block that can be infinitely mined.
The goal is to break the opponent's bed.

This map was created by Pulvi and edited by DivineDaBeast. You can check their channels on YouTube.

title: The Islands of Khanta
text: The Islands of Khanta features several large islands situated somewhere far out in the ocean. On each island you will find a different biome and this makes it a quite interesting and enjoyable map to explore.

title: My High School Map
text: This map features a small village with high school and mansions.

title: Ghost Run
text:
This is a short escape map that escapes the maze without being killed by the Ghost.

# How to play?

• Tap the button to start game.
• If the exit room is open, use compass and follow the arrow of compass to find the exit room.
• If you got NetherStar, you can kill the Ghost, If not, stay alive!

# Creator

• Builder: GBalajediong
• Add-on: CrazyGamer

title: Zueira School
text:
This map has a medium sized school with the following facilities.

• Classrooms
• Library
• Cafeteria
• Computer Lab
• Football Stadium
• Fountain

And lots more

title: Medieval TNT Wars
text: TNT Wars is a type of multiplayer player vs. player minigame where you need to build TNT cannons to take down the other team. To win you either have to kill all of the opposite team members or destroy their base and knock them off the sky island. It’s a quite time-consuming challenge but nonetheless very fun!

title: Piston House
text:
Piston House (More than 20 redstone creations)

This is an redstone house with pistons.

title: Dimension Jumper
text:
You are an adventurer and like to travel everywhere, every place in minecraft world. 
Discover the new dimensions and every dimension has a mission to accomplish.

title: TSA Basketball Stadium
text:
This is a basketball stadium map designed by Tsahimnet.
It was originally made for PC version and ported to PE by TheMrjoojo.

title: Futuristic City
text: This map was created by TheVoxelBox and was the first map used in the Minecraft Marathon which is a gamers event. The map is a futuristic city and consists of skillful designs of buildings as well as interiors. Inside some buildings there are parkour maps which you can give a try.

title: Find The Button: School Edition
text:
This Find The Button map features 10 levels, each based on something found in a school. They include classrooms, cafeterias, and much more. 

# How to play

Your goal is to find the hidden button in each level. The buttons may blend in with surrounding blocks. When you find the button, click it, and you'll be teleported to the next level. Play in survival and peaceful. You can play by yourself or with friends. Have fun!

title: Forest Village
text: The map includes a mysterious village located in the center of a dense forest. It got no inhabitants so it’s perfect if you are looking for an inspirational area to start off from in an adventurous survival jouney.

title: Super Mario Galaxy
text:
Super Mario Galaxy was the third game in the Super Mario series and as its predecessors caught immediate popularity. Here we have that game implemented in Minecraft PE. Similar to the original console version we’ve got small planets with different objectives on each.

Currently there is a total of 7 planets and on each a different mission you have to accomplish to get a star (or as in Minecraft PE a gold block). Once you’ve got them all the main objective is to repower the grand star.

title: Bow Wars (Red vs Blue)
text:
Bow Wars is a PvP map where you can play against your opponent with bow and various arrows.
This map can be played up to 8 players.

title: Lights Out - Puzzle Minigame
text: Lights Out is a new type of puzzle in which you have to stand on different pressure plates to ultimately disable all of the lights.

title: Zelda: Twilight Princess
text:
The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD is an action-adventure game in Nintendo's The Legend of Zelda series for the Wii U home video game console.

This is only Zelda Twilight Princess, Nothing else.

# This map includes

• Hyrule Castle, Market Town, North Field 
• South Field
• East Field 
• West Field 
• Bridge of Eldin 
• Great Bridge of Hylia 
• Lake Hylia 
• Kakriko Gorge 
• Kakriko Village 
• Kakriko Graveyard 
• Goron Springs 
• Goron Mines 
• Fire Temple 
• Ordon Village 
• Ordon Ranch 
• Ordon Spring 
• Faron Woods 
• Faron Spring 
• Forest Temple 
• Temple of Time 
• Lake Hylia 
• Zoras Domain 
• Snow Peak Mountain 
• Snow Peak Ruins 
• Gerudo Desert 
• Bulbin Fortress 
• Arbiters Grounds 
• Twilight Realm 

# Notes

• It was created for desktop version by Kezsonaj, and ported to PE version.
• Depending on the performance of your device, you may experience some lag.

# Updates

• Fixed an issue that could not be saved.
• Fixed the problem of cutting higher than clouds.

title: Redstone Neighborhood
text:
This map features one large house built in a flat plains landscape with lots of beautiful terrain surrounding it. Most parts of the house include some type of redstone mechanisms.

# Note

• By default, this map has the oCd texture pack applied.
• oCd texture pack was created by disco

title: The 30 Trivia Questions
text:
There are 30 rooms (and questions) in total and in each on you will be presented with one question with three possible answers. Press either of the buttons to select your answer.

If you are wrong you will be sent away.. and die!

title: The Assassin's Creed Origin
text:
The Assassin's Creed Origin map is a great adventure primarily focused on parkour. There are many things to be explored within the map such as great chests and secret rooms. It's no clear storyline to follow but instead a freeroaming adventure in what looks to be a very well created city as seen in the original PC game.

Consider installing "Hunter Weapon Addon" above as well.

title: Jungle Tree House (Keralis) - Fix
text:
This map shows Keralis' Jungle Tree House in Minecraft Pocket Edition.
This is an 99% exact replica of his PC world. So here are some of the Bonus Features:

• Tall Grass included!
• Full Complete Caves.
• Modifications to Double-Chest Spaces
• Exact Replica
• Survival Bonus Chests

This map is suitable both for creative and survival.

There are two versions available for download.

• SSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: 17 Redstone Traps
text:
This map contains 17 different redstone traps.

* If you do not want spoilers, you should not tap on the pictures below.

title: Modern House with Helipad
text: This map features a two-story modern house with a helicopter landing area. The inside of the house, a garden, the swimming pool and a garage are also well decorated.

title: Solar System Survival (v1.2)
text:
A map with detailed planets for each one in our own solar system, the uncharted Planet X, and with the End customization.

You spawn on earth and must build over to other planets to survive and thrive.

# Rules

• Mainly, Have fun
• Play on at least easy difficulty for best experience with the map
• Conquer all planets and make them safe

# Challenges

There are challenges you have to complete on this map.

• Complete List of Challenges

# Creators

• Original Map: muskatard
• Ported by: Noyan

title: Custom Crafting Recipes
text:
These maps show you how to make your own custom crafting recipes. These maps are made up of three versions, and each version introduces different recipes. Unfortunately, some recipes do not work, but most of them work correctly. Try it from the first version, and download other versions if it is fun.

For more information on how to use them, see the YouTube videos below.

title: Witch Boss Fight
text:
SerperiorCraft proudly presents over a month of hard work and determination, and tons of inspiration from Hypixel and my wonderful fans who are so supportive of my maps. I really hope you enjoy this map and have tons of fun!

# Storyline

You are an agent of the MBI (Minecraft Bureau of Investigation). You have received word from travelers in the swamplands that Agatha the Witch, a client of Herobrine, is stirring up a potion that will wipe out nearby villages. You must find her and stop her and her cauldron before it’s too late!

* If you do not want a spoiler, do not scroll down.

title: The Walls PE (Fix)
text:
You are waiting for the long time to play the Walls PE from PC. No time to wait because I created this for 3 days.

# Rules

1. No breaking blocks
2. Play in peaceful
3. Do not break the walls if other players are not ready.
4. There are 4 chests hidden in the arena so find them. (Hint: in the lava...)
5. There is a side that had redstone dust in the grass block. If you saw it you are allowed to find the button. The button allows you to bring all the walls down.
6. Ask the players first if they are ready. And push the button to bring the walls fun.
7. Have fun!

title: Marriotts Ridge High School
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft version 1.4.0 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft version is 1.4.0 or higher before downloading.

This map is a recreation of a high school of 1,600 students in the Minecraft world.

Build Stats: 

• Interior Space: ~24,000 Blocks/Square Meters 
• Building Footprint: ~13,000 Blocks/Square Meters 

# Creators

• Java Edition: Gator1380
• Ported by: Caspian 2.0

title: Seed (990748179) - Survival Island
text:
* This seed only works with Minecraft version 1.4.0 or later.

Amazing Aquatics Update Survival Island Seed

This seed is useful for exploring new underwater structures and terrains in Update Aquatic (1.4.0+).

To get a clearer view of the ocean, you can use the command below.

• /effect @p night_vision 9999 1 true

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "990748179" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap the download button above to install it automatically.

title: Parkour Colors
text:
Welcome to Parkour Colors!

This is a very simple parkour map with five levels.

• Level 1. Easy
• Level 2. Medium
• Level 3. Hard
• Level 4. Hard
• Level 5. Very Hard

If you just want to simply enjoy parkour courses, try this map!

title: The City of Romna
text: This map is a small but beautiful city in the suburbs.

title: The Most Secure Door
text: This is one of the most secured doors which you can build in Minecraft PE.

title: Infinite Parkour
text:
Infinite Parkour is a quick parkour map lasting somewhere around 5–10 minutes depending on your current parkour skills. The parkour course includes special blocks which give players special effects when standing on them.

# Special Blocks

• Lapis Lazuli – Speed Effect
• Emerald – Jump Effect
• Coal – Levitation
• Diamond – Teleportation
• Iron – Removes Effects

# Rules

• Gamemode: Adventure
• Difficulty: Normal
• Max Players: 4

title: The Dead (Short Horror)
text: This is a short horror adventure map. Best played with headphones.

title: Skyblock Challenge Roll Pick
text:
A New Gameplay Of Skyblock!!
No more Waiting For Tree grow and Make A Stone Generator.

2 Way To Recieve an Item!!!

• Old Way
• Use Roll Box 

You can read more info in the game!

title: Seed (2034182504) - Ravine, Cavern
text:
In this seed you will spawn between two rivers. As you cross the river in the west you will immediately see a tremendous depth and breadth of ravine.

It is recommended for extreme survival players who enjoy adventure in rugged terrain. But it's also a good experience to explore giant caves in creative mode.

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "2034182504" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap one of the download buttons above to install it automatically.

# Ravine

Ravines are a new type of randomly generated terrain which can occur mostly everywhere. This time it has been generated very close to the ocean.

# What are seeds?

Minecraft seeds are values made up of character(s) (including negative or positive integers) that are used as the basis for generating every Minecraft world.

title: The Dropper - Remastered
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.
* This map was created for PC version by Bigre, and ported to PE by BlazingBeast451.

The Dropper is one the most popular maps for Minecraft. This map contains several levels that you have to jump and survive. Each level has its own theme.

Let's jump!

# Updates

This is a remastered version which includes command blocks.

title: DeadRunner: Classic
text:
DeadRunner is a fun minigame which you can play together with some friends. Most of you will be runners, but one of you will be the zombie.

• Runner: Hide from the zombie!
• Zombie: Find the runners and kill them before the sun rises!

title: Blu’s Redstone House
text:
This map consists of a fairly decent house filled with simple to more complicated redstone contraptions.

# Features

• Redstone contraptions ranging from simple to complicated ones
• Secret rooms
• Unique redstone designs
• Almost all redstone wires are flushed in the ground.

title: MiniTee - Mini Golf
text: MiniTee is a miniature golf course consisting of 18 holes with an increasing difficulty. You can either play it all by yourself or compete against friends. Take turns and keep track of the score for each player to be able to select a winner by the end of the game. It uses simple redstone mechanisms to ensure nobody cheats (like tripwires) and holes are actually hopper which collect the balls (or rather snowballs).

title: Farlands
text: Farlands is not like the ordinary maps you download. In fact is that the entire map is what once was a world generation glitch in one of the earlier versions of Minecraft for PC. Because of its weird but incredibly cool terrain it has gained a lot of traction and was quite soon released as a map for the PC version of Minecraft and later on ported to Minecraft Pocket Edition.

title: How To Parkour
text:
There are 15 different levels on this map with each level increasing in difficulty. This map can hopefully teach people more about parkour and still be fun for experts.

The original map was made by Supertrinity. This map is a re-created version of Pocket Edition.

title: SkyBlock
text:
SkyBlock is one of the most popular minecraft maps ever created. The concept behind the map is very simple; you spawn on a floating island and must survive and complete challenges with the resources available to you.

There are several different versions of SkyBlock already existing for Bedrock Edition, but this map appears to be one of the first real ports of the original map. It spawns you on a tiny island in a world with nothing but endless void around you. On the island you’ll find a chest, a tree and some other basic blocks to get your started on this survival challenge.

# Challenges

• Build a Cobble Stone generator.
• Build a house.
• Expand the island.
• Make a melon farm.
• Make a pumpkin farm.
• Make a reed/sugarcane farm.
• Make a wheat farm.
• Make a giant red mushroom.
• Craft a bed.

Tap here to see a full list of challenges.

# Credits

• Original creator: Noobcrew
• Ported by: skylord_wars

title: Epic Monster Tower Run
text: This is an adventure map with a Halloween theme. The concept is easy. Save your wife from the old and scary Pumpkin Monster!

title: UnfairPE: Aqua Edition
text:
This is the second addition to the UnfairPE map series. UnfairPE Aqua Edition is a multistaged puzzle map that will test everything you know about the basics of Minecraft. In this map you may not stand on cobble walls or cheat.

Previous Map: UnfairPE 1

title: Modern Cliff Mansion
text:
Explore a secluded billionaire’s paradise cut into a cliff on a private island. Accessible via bridge, boat or helicopter. Detox from the outside world in this resort sized house. At this current time, the majority of the exterior, other than the gold course, have been completed. However, the entire east wing (where sports facilities, forty seat threatre and four bedrooms are located) lacks an interior. The main complex of the house has a full interior.

# What's new in the update (June 2018)?

• Theatre extension
• Spa
• Indoor pool
• Gym
• Changing facilities
• Underground bunker
• Garage extension one
• And more!

title: Boat Racing
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This is a boat racing minigame which takes place on the ice and is in that sense not that different from bobsledding. The friction on ice is much less than on water and this makes it possible for the boat to reach a much greater speed. But the faster you go the more difficult it gets to control the boat. It’s a really fun and intense minigame to play in multiplayer.

title: The Cube Parkour
text: This map is remake of popular map of pc minecraft called "Infinite Cube". Your mission is complete 6 levels. Have Fun!

title: Mountain View House
text:
This map features a modern house with stunning mountain views.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: Granyland
text: Granyland is just an exploration-themed world with countless buildings, towers and detailed interiors to explore. Many advanced one-of-a-kind redstone contraptions can also be found scattered around. Please enjoy my world, hope you too have many hours of fun exploring.

title: Dream - The Rollercoaster
text: Dream is an amazing rollercoaster map made by Hungryas. It has a ton of awesome scares and optical illusions.

title: Kawaii Mansion
text:
This map features a mansion built in the Kawaii style.
Kawaii is the culture of cuteness in Japan.
This map uses the Kawaii World texture pack created by Mariiecx.

title: Ice Hockey Arena
text: This map features an ice hockey arena. All the interiors have been decorated to try to emulate a busy and crowded atmosphere, so there are a lot of different things to explore.

title: Hardcore Buttonz
text:
Hardcore Buttonz (Find The Button)

This is a sort of Find The Button map with 10 different levels, and two bonus levels.
This map is not recommended for beginners (This map is very difficult).
Good Luck!

title: 5 Secret Entrances
text:
This is a really useful map if you are looking for solutions for hiding certain parts of your base or creating some type of secret room. The map includes five different redstone creations. Examine the builds and try to replicate them in your own worlds. You might need to remove some of the blocks in the map in order to better understand the redstone structure though.

Make sure to read the signs in the lobby before looking at the redstone creations. The most important part is the following blocks as they will let you know how to enable the hidden entrance.

• Iron = Press a button
• Emerald = Place a redstone torch
• Gold = Drop 1 item

Secret Piston Entrance: Drop an item on the gold block and then wait for the entrance to open.

Hidden Waterfall Entrance: Press the button to gain access to the hidden room.

Enchanted Hidden Entrance: Drop an item on an enchantment table to open the entrance.

There are two more creations but those I will let you explore by yourself in-game!

title: The Jungle
text: The Jungle is a great map to use for your next survival adventures. The base includes five different homes (some of which are in the trees), lots of livestock and a mine.

title: Lava Escape 2 (Updated)
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.1 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.1 or higher before downloading.

Lava Escape 2 is a really intense minigame and parkour map which is suitable for parkour beginners. In each level the main challenge is to quickly complete the obstacle course. If you are successful then you will be able to move on to the next level. However, if you are too slow then you’ll soon notice lava dripping down your forehead and kill you.

# Updates

• fixed auto reset and some other bugs

title: Block Party (Updated)
text:
Block Party is a minigame which takes place on a platform which looks like a dance floor. Every new level you will retrieve a random colored block in your inventory. You then have less than 10 seconds to find a block on the platform with that same color or else die. It’s a really fun and sometimes intense multiplayer minigame!

# What's new in this update?

• Bug fixes

title: SG MC Parkour 2
text:
This is the sequel to MC Parkour which includes a great variety of parkour challenges. Different blocks determine different obstacles. For example, by coming in contact with one block you will get a speed boost and with another you will levitate for a few seconds.

Previous Map: MC Parkour 1

title: Tomb Crafter 4
text: Tomb Crafter 4 illuminati. The story takes place in illuminati stronghold. Your mission is to find the magical illuminati clothes. Bonus mission: On the map are hidden 12 secret gold. Each includes a code. To create the code you need to find a secret room.

title: E-Land
text:
E-Land is a small sized city but packed with many different types of buildings, mostly ones with weird shapes but at at the same time they look realistic and artistic. It’s a really colorful city which makes use of wool and other types of colorful blocks to bring a happy feel to what otherwise probably would be a quite boring city.

# Creator

• Made by Si-vle
• Ported by Gamerington

title: Parkour - Rapido
text: This map includes mostly challenges related to parkour but also a couple of archery levels. It’s suitable for anyone who is a parkour beginner.

title: WATER - Modern Resort House
text:
This map features 2 modern houses and a village on the beach.

# Creators

• Original Map: pigonge
• Ported by: JVitorCraft

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD and CSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: Custom Island
text: This map features a small survival island with lots of trees and a big, flat area on the beach for building a base of some sort. It was created with WorldPainter on Java and then ported over to Bedrock Edition. It’s a perfect little island if you’re looking for a new survival island adventure as there are plenty of trees and other resources you’d need for building.

title: Simple PvP
text:
This is a simple PvP map where you can enjoy PvP with other players in a small garden.

You can choose between three human classes and three mob classes.

# Human

• Assassin, Archer, Paladin

# Mob

• Enderman, Stray, Zombie Pigman

Different PvP kits and effects are given to you depending on the class you choose.

# Creator

• YouTube: Tameron_937

title: The Fall of Heaven
text:
The Fall of Heaven is one of those maps which makes you question whether this can really be Minecraft. It’s an amazing creation featuring a huge citadel, a majestic statue and an infernal and vicious dragon. The map was originally created for the PC version of Minecraft and took well over 100 hours to build. It has now been ported to Pocket Edition and can be played either as an adventure map (with quests) or as a creation map to just marvel at.

# Creator

• PC Version: LordGuntaz
• Ported by: SmashPE

title: Arena Pernambuco
text:
Itaipava Arena Pernambuco is a multi-use stadium in the western suburbs of the Recife metropolitan area, in São Lourenço da Mata, Brazil. It is used mostly for soccer matches and was used to host matches during the 2014 FIFA World Cup.
This map is a replica of the stadium with Minecraft PE version.

There are two versions available for download.

• Night Vision Shaders applied version (Recommended)
• Original version

title: Pyramid of Traps
text:
This is a short adventure map in a huge pyramid.

# Story

One day you heard two people talking about a pyramid with a big treasure in it. Because you are bored of working every day you decide to travel to this pyramid and get rich. But that won't be easy...there are some deadly traps awaiting you...

title: FS Treasure Hunt
text: Dig your way through the dig site looking for buried treasure! Once you find some use your coins to upgrade your shovel and purchase exclusives, pets, and items. The deeper you go the more valuable the treasure.

title: Biosphere Survival
text:
This is a fun survival map with challenges to explore different biospheres with only a limited set of resources.

# Spheres

• Plain, Nether, Snowy, Obsidian, Clay, Forest, Glowstone, Water, Desert, Butter(Gold), Mushroom, Mining, Swamp

# Challenges

• Make a cobblestone generator
• Collect 50 Cacti
• Collect 25 Red Mushrooms
• Collect 25 Brown Mushrooms
• Make 50 Bookshelves
• Make At Least 1 Of Each Possible Kind Of Farm(Animal And Plant)
• Visit all Biospheres
• Make A House In 5 Biosphere's
• Make a 3 Story Mob-Grinder. Use Water)
• Get A Chest Full Of All The Different Mob Drops, (Easy After making the mob grinder.)
• Go To The Nether Reactor At Least 2 times
• Don't Kill Yourself For Health!
• Make An Unlimited Water Source
• Make all Possible Wools and Dyes
• Make A Village(At Least 7 Buildings,Library,Blacksmith,Residential,Watch Tower)
• Have Fun!
• If Doing For YouTube, Aim to beat it in less then 25 episodes.

# Bonus

• Don't Die
• Go To The Nether 5 Times (Takes Extreme Skill)
• Never Get Hit By A Mob
• Make A Gigantic Hotel
• Decorate All Your Houses With Paintings, Chairs, Chests, And Windows
• Make A Your Houses Out Of Different Materials

title: Earthbending in Vanilla
text:
This is a command block creation which have a couple similar features to some of the world edit mods.
There are three different tools which include the abilities to spawn blocks as well as destroying existing blocks in your world. And it’s all done by the use of spawn eggs which once placed down on the ground alters the space.

Tap the pictures below to preview how it works

title: Find The Button Mini Biomes
text:
Find the button mini biomes, the levels are inspired by the biomes that you can find in any survival world.
There are 14 different biomes.

title: Lotus - An Adventure, Puzzle Map
text:
Lotus is an adventure/puzzle map

# Storyline

An evil computer called Lotus submits you to multiple challenges wich include, multiple parkour courses, a huge maze, a trivia and, if you manage to complete all those rooms, you get to fight Lotus !

Rules and additional info are in the map, good luck!

title: BedWars PvP
text:
Play in good mini game – BedWars.
You must break opponents beds to win. This mini game is very fun becouse you have many chests.

Made by MrSettler and Falkasor

title: Null: Shadow Return
text:
Entity 303 Saving an unknown power can awaken all the shadows, Null who knows it then kills Entity 303 And then tries to Make War Back, You Have to Stop it before it's too late.

Previous Map: Entity 303 The Final Shadow

title: Redstone Fortress
text:
Most defended redstone fortress and safest redstone house!
This map is recreation of Redstone Fortress in Minecraft Pocket Edition. It is redesigned into an amazing redstone fortress and redstone defense base that will protect you from all enemies.
This map contains tons of awesome redstone creations like lava pits, security gates, arrow dispensers and more!

title: Banner Letters Tutorial
text: This is a really cool and useful tutorial map for anyone who is interested to learn how to design banners. This particular tutorial will teach you all you need to know in order to add any of the alphabetical letters to a banner (A-Z). To do that you only need to do some crafting but it can be difficult to know exactly which recipes to use, but that’s why this map was created.

title: Station Plengeh
text: This map is a creative map with many different stations connected by very long railways. There are even switches and toggles which you can use for activating different redstone mechanisms such as stop lights or the power to a train track.

title: Find The Button! 202
text:
You must find the hidden button on each level!
There are four different levels.

title: COMPACT - Modern House
text:
This map features a three-story modern house built on a mountain cliff.

# Creators

• Original Map: Ghosttae
• Ported by: JVitorCraft

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD and Simple Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: 75 Ways To Die
text:
There are 75 levels where the objectives are simple. You have to find a way to die. Once dead you will respawn in the next level.

# What's new?

• Optimized for new versions of the game
• Simplified the last level (just a little)
• Removed the update book

title: Modern Redstone House
text:
The Modern Redstone House includes every redstone feature you could wish for and it also looks very cool! In the basement you will find an armor station, a secure safe, a vending machine and a few other creations. It's a really good house to use as a base for your survival world as it includes everything to keep you safe from monsters during the night and well geared when you go out on your daily adventures.

Features

Armor Station: Use the item arrows to select the armors which you want to use. Then step inside the wardrobe and press the button. Wait 10-20 seconds for it to complete the process.

Vending Machine: Use the levers to select which items you want to receive. Collect them in the output chest. Remember to switch off the levers when you are done.

Secure Safe: The safe can be used for storing all your valuable items. It's locked by a secure code.

This is just a few examples of what the house includes. And in the future it's likely to be even more redstone creations!

title: Golden Cube Parkour
text:
Golden Cube Parkour is a relatively easy parkour map where you can practice all your MCPE skills. With Droppers, Ice Parkour, Elytra Parkour, and with AMAZING VIEWS, this map is definitely an awesome Parkour Map.

Made Especially for Unspeakable Gaming. Also made for 09Sharkboy, MooseCraft, and Preston Playz. (Sorry Cyclone)

title: Peppermint
text:
This is the first map in the series of Peppermint. It has a storyline that will be hard to find unless you pay close attention to every detail. The map is based on completing an Easter egg, like in CoD Zombies. It’s an extremely difficult to complete and as a result there will soon be a complete walkthrough available and it will be posted here and in the creator’s Twitter feed.

Peppermint is a very difficult and sometimes confusing puzzle map. That’s why it’s very important you read all information that you come across in regards to the map in-game.

title: Greenfield City
text:
This map contains a modern city full of cool high-rise buildings. Unfortunately, only part of the city seems to be ported to PE. But it's a map worth exploring.

# Creator

Made by TheJustr

title: 64 Awesome Parkour
text:
This is a simple and easy parkour map with 64 levels.

Sometimes you may want to enjoy simple parkour without complicated rules or puzzles. There is no trick or risk of dying on this map. There are only very simple parkour courses. If you are a beginner who wants to practice parkour or someone who wants to enjoy parkour which is not complicated, try this map!

title: High School PE
text: This is a High School map built by Nick96894 & Arniboy13 and has been ported to PE by Laorynas. It has complex and very creative interior, this map will great for roleplay (server).

title: BeetleJuice Rollercoaster
text:
BeetleJuice Rollercoaster is one of the most epic rollercoaster.
This is port map. It is very similar to the original version. (75% same)
Enjoy!

title: Find The Button - Houses Edition (v6)
text:
Find The Button is a type of minigame where you need to find a hidden button or lever. This minigame is multiplayer compatible but you can also play it alone by yourself. It’s a really simple game where you must search and find something to press or toggle in order to move onto the next level. Each level includes a different building style.

# What's new in v6?

• Added 5 new levels - now 23 total (with help of Carter Ryan, @CarterRyan119, Twitter)
• Bug fixes
• Updated hint book

title: Boyi Garden
text:
This is a beautiful creation map featuring a medieval town and a giant tree in the middle.

There are two versions available for download.

• Simple Shader applied version
• Original version

title: Mountain Modern House
text: This map features a beautiful mansion in the mountains. The mansion includes features such as a living room, kitchen, bedroom, bathroom and a gaming room.

title: Simple Redstone 2
text: This is a map which features somewhere around 10 different redstone machines and the best thing is that all of them are very easy to build. Get some inspiration of what kind of machines you can build in your own world. Most of the machines are explained with a brief text so make sure to read the signs in-game.

title: Suburban Traditional House
text:
Kars' Suburban Traditional House #1

Just a quick build by Kars for you all.
This is a suburban traditional house for Minecraft PE.

Enjoy the little build!

# Important

The bathroom door is locked, you can get the key(Stone Button) which is inside the cabinet nearest to the bathroom door. Just open the cabinet door and open the chest then get the key. The red carpet, which is also inside the chest, acts like a bedsheet because we have one missing carpet on the actual bed.

# Creator

• Twitter: @KarsTimesTen

title: Find The Button 2
text:
Find the button is a mini game in Minecraft where you explore new settings and try to find (obviously) a button.
There are 8 levels to this map. Enjoy!

title: Ultimate Slayer - Advanced Kit PvP
text:
Ultimate Slayer - Advanced Kit PvP!

The Ultimate advanced kit PvP for you and your friends!
With 7 kits you have a large variety of choices.

# Kits

• Barbarian
• Knight
• Archer
• Mage
• Medic
• Spy
• Necromancer
• Spectator
• More to come!

# Arenas

• Plains Biome Bridge
• Blind End
• Advanced Nether Fortress
• The Lab
• More to come!

title: SG Bow Brawl
text:
SG Bow Brawl is a multiplayer team game where you must knock the enemy players off of their flying set of beams.

# How to play?

• Shoot the enemy team with your bow and knock them off!
• Use your kit abilities to knock or kill them!
• Make sure to stay on your platform. If you fall off, You Lose!

title: Seed (-1618472320) - Shipwreck at Spawn
text:
* This seed only works with Minecraft version 1.4.0 or later.

Shipwreck at Spawn Seed

A beautiful pirate ship close the spawn with a huge coral biome around it!

To get a clearer view of the ocean, you can use the command below.

• /effect @p night_vision 9999 1 true

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "-1618472320" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap the download button above to install it automatically.

title: Everest Expedition
text:
In this map, you're gonna explore the dangers from Mount Everest.
The 8848m high mountain is the highest one in the world.
This is a parkour/survival/adventure map.

It is easy to learn. But hard to climb.
The map is based on a real experience on Mt. Everest.
Bad weather can lead to serious problems.

Made by Syken.

title: Beginner’s Guide to Commands
text: This map will teach you all the basics to all the commands. At the end of the map you’ll find a bunch of different creation which use the commands for more complex uses.

title: MurderEscape - Multiplayer Horror!
text: MurderEscape is an intense and scary multiplayer horror minigame. One of the players will be chosen as the murderer and the rest ones are runners who have to run through a forest and hopefully escape before it’s too late.

title: Ghost Blocks Parkour
text:
Welcome to Ghost Blocks Parkour Map.

This map is very popular in PC Minecraft.
15-20 minutes of playing. Have fun with this map.

# How to play

• On the right side are ghost transparent blocks
• And on the left side are normal blocks
• So, jump on transparent blocks like on left side.

# Rules

• Don't cheat or break blocks
• Don't use mods like flying mod
• You can use only sprint mod

title: Japanese Garden Arena
text: This is a japanese garden inspired pvp arena. It includes redstone score counters, death and win indicators and a viewing range for potential viewers.

title: Infernal Parkour
text:
The Infernal parkour map is exciting and a bit scary because there are multiple surprises. It’s a really creative map with multiple great builds.

The map does have a storyline which you will be able to read your way through throughout the map on the signs.

title: Kingdom of Verona
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft version 1.4.0 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft version is 1.4.0 or higher before downloading.

This is a large Medieval city, surrounded by smaller villages. And as any kingdom, it has a huge castle in the centre of the main city.There is much to see and explore, such as small mining towns, abnormally large trees, dangerous mines and even treasure! All of this comes in a custom made world, including large snow topped mountains and dense forests!

# Credits

• Java Edition: Expertise101
• Ported by: ZombieSteven
• Shader: Simple Shader

title: Hidden Memory
text:
Welcome To Hidden Memory

An Amazing Puzzle Map Featuring

• Redstone alternatives
• Mob battle
• Parkours
• Puzzles
• Boss fight 

And More

# Rules

• Play on peaceful
• 1-2 players
• Don’t break/place blocks unless told so
• Read the story before beginning (can also be found in-game)

# Story

You wake up in a room which you can’t seem to recognize. Every time you try to remember how you got there your memory is blank. It is as if somebody wiped your memory. Even though you are confused you are determined to find out how you got to the place where you are at. You start look around..

title: Awesome Farm Map
text:
This map is a very beautiful and peaceful farm. It is very small and simple. You can grow various animals and plants and enjoy nature.
Take a look at the farm, and download it.

title: SG Spleef
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

SG Spleef is a spleef map including a map selector (for four different arenas) and automatic power-ups while playing. The arenas are quite small and as a result it can sometimes get very intense and especially so if you are more than a few people playing. It’s probably recommended to be somewhere between 2-4 players to play this map.

There are four different spleef arenas and all of them are of similar sizes.

• Nether
• Farm
• End
• Castle

title: Super Sweet Suvival
text:
Super Sweet Survival is a well explored survival map with too many features to try and count. The entire map was built in survival mode by Kidsource.

There is a great cobblestone house near the main spawn point. Inside this first house, you will find tons of resources packed into chests. All of the things you need for Minecraft survival are already there! Also, there is a Nether Portal and access to a ravine.

When you are done exploring the spawn area, find the road to the village. The road is marked with a sign, and runs just around the garden of the cobblestone house. This is a long, long road...but it eventually leads to a big village. There are things to explore along the road, too. The village features an even better cobblestone mansion, outfitted with the best equipment. If you want to play survival mode in style, download this map now!

# Features

• Spawn point house with multiple packed chests.
• Road system to locate the best features.
• Multiple Nether Portals
• Big Village with lots of villagers and Iron Golems.
• Resources like food, tools, weapons, armor, and much, much more.
• Marked access to 3 ravines.
• Marked access to a mine shaft.
• Marked access to a Nether Fortress
• Built in survival mode so achievements are available.

title: Pixel Battle
text: Pixel Battle! is a multiplayer minigame where two players will compete against one another by trying to build the best possible pixel art. You’ll need at least three players in order to play this map since someone will need to be the judge and make the sometimes different call on which pixel art is the best. You can play this game multiple times since there’s an easy-to-use restart option in-game.

title: Oggy's House
text:
This is an Oggy's house for Minecraft PE.
This map was designed to match the exterior of the Oggy's House, not the interior.

Oggy is a cat and a titular character in the Oggy and the Cockroaches series. He has a light blue body, green eyes, grey tummy and white feet.

title: Castle Adventure (v7)
text:
# Background

You are a king but someone overthrew you! He is evil and is trying to destroy your kingdom! You must get your kingdom back and gain your people's trust. You need your spot as king back or else your kingdom will be devasted! You need a few tools, which you will get in this map, to save the kingdom. Listen to the signs and find the tools before it's too late!

# How To Play

You will need tools to get your spot as king back.

# How To Get Tools

1. Collect clue
2. Find location (Using clue)
3. Play minigame to unlock tools
4. Collect tool and next clue

# What's new in v7?

Added hidden emeralds and easter eggs to trade in for tools for the final battle
Bug fixes
Fixed older redstone, updated command blocks
Bug fixes
Added more decorations in the boss room, around town and in the death chamber

title: The Duel
text: It’s a really fun map which is greatly inspired by the old western gunslinger duels.

title: Run4Life - Adventure
text:
Run4Life is a zombie apocalypse adventure map taking place in a desert town and many of the surrounding areas. Your name is Wilbert and your first mission is to go find a couple of items and bring them to the weapon store. There are a lot of secret places to be explored and throughout the adventure there are several little tasks you must complete while trying to fight your way through hordes of zombies.

# Rules

• Set difficulty to hard
• Don’t break/place blocks except red sand blocks

# Storyline

Hey! My name is Gordon and I’m an officer in charge of the army. As you might know the world is turning bad. Zombie apocalypses which we thought previously only existed in movies has come to life in our real world. Your mission is to go out there and try to stop the apocalypse. Here’s some weapons..

title: Half Heart Survival
text:
This is a parkour map which uses an addon to drastically reduce your health. As a result you will notice that doing the different jumps becomes much more difficult as one wrong move and you will immediately die and have to start over. If you like parkour maps then this is well suited for you as it’s basically that but a bit more difficult.

How to play?

This map includes an addon which sets your health in survival mode to just one half heart. The half heart isn’t visible (for unknown reasons) but if you make one wrong jump you will die. This means you’ve got to act carefully when doing the parkour challenges.

It might not look as a difficult parkour map but since your health is reduced to a half heart you will quickly notice that it’s much harder than what you probably thought.

Important: An addon is included in the world downloaded. Once you’ve loaded the map go to the game settings and make sure that an add-on is enabled. It might be called five heart addon or something along those lines.

title: Super Lava Run
text:
Super Lava Run is a really fun parkour minigame where your main priority is to avoid the lava by completing different parkour jumps. At this point you will only have access to one stage called the Overworld but later on more stages will be introduced to expand on the length of the gameplay.

There are lots and lots of Cities to Own and to Pay for.

This map Requires 1 Dice, 2 players and 1 Banker and a Maximum of 2 Dice, 8 players and 8 Bankers.

title: Seed (parcat) - Stronghold, Igloo, Ice Spike
text:
Stronghold Village, Ice Spike, Igloo with Basement Combo next to spawn!

This is an incredible seed with an insane combo just behind spawn! Basically turn around at spawn and walk to find an Ice Spike biome. Walk around to the other side of the Ice Spike biome to find this combo!
In addition, there is a super rare Igloo that was swallowed up by a Ravine and a cool double Dungeon! Enjoy this sweet frosty seed! 

• Ice Spike/Stronghold Village/Basement Igloo combo: X: 920, Y: 66, Z: -320
• Portal Room: X: 940, Y: 21, Z: -350
• Dungeon 1: X: 933, Y: 54, Z: -314
• Dungeon 2: X: 916, Y: 45, Z: -305
• Igloo stuck inside a Ravine: X: 1331, Y: 60, Z: -716
• Igloo: X: 1245, Y: 70, Z: 108
• Village: X: 1400, Y: 69, Z: 360
• Double Dungeon: X: 1146, Y: 41, Z: -1119

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "parcat" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap one of the download buttons above to install it automatically.

# What are seeds?

Minecraft seeds are values made up of character(s) (including negative or positive integers) that are used as the basis for generating every Minecraft world.

title: Pixel Halloween - Parkour

title: One Night At Frankie’s 2
text:
This map is the sequel to One Night At Frankie’s which is a previously released horror map based on the popular Five Nights At Freddy’s PC game. You work as a guard at some business and tonight you have the night shift. But things aren’t as usual. The animatronics come to life at night and it’s up to you find them before they find you. Beware, there are multiple jumpscares!

# How to play?

Make sure to read the rules in-game first as it will allow you get a better grasp about the game mechanics. You’ll basically have a few different tools which you can use including cameras, lights and locks.

• Button in front of you is the lights
• Behind you is the generator
• Wooden button is the camera
• Levers are door locks

Nowadays they are usually homes of rich people, royal families or sometimes museums but before they were the safe place for lots of people.

All players of two different teams are equipped with sticks which they use to hit a ball. (Think hockey, but on floorboards.)

title: RMS Titanic
text:
This Is The RMS Titanic In Minecraft Pocket Edition

RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean in the early morning of 15 April 1912, after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton to New York City. Of the 2,224 passengers and crew aboard, more than 1,500 died, making it one of the deadliest commercial peacetime maritime disasters in modern history.

This is port version of Titanic by Deadkoalas.

# Ravine

Ravines are a new type of randomly generated terrain which can occur mostly everywhere. This time it has been generated very close to the ocean.

Minecraft seeds are values made up of character(s) (including negative or positive integers) that are used as the basis for generating every Minecraft world.

title: The Chambers - A Combat Adventure
text:
The Chambers is an MCPE original adventure map created by Geoman. It contains player vs mob combat, parkour, puzzles, and an ends with an intense boss battle. Estimate play time: 60 minutes.

# Story

You abandoned in an isolated village and forced to live with criminals after being accused for a crime that you didn't commit. You must prove yourself innocent, but to do this you must escape. You learn the only escape is The Chambers...

# Objective

To fight your way through the 4 mob filled Chambers and boss fight to escape the village and become free.

A SkyWars map of FNAF 4
Up to 4 players

The huge sphere in this map is called Death Star.

A number of fictional mobile space stations and galactic superweapons called Death Star featured in the Star Wars science-fiction franchise.

The inside of DeathStar is dark and may not be visible. It can be helpful to carry the sea lanterns or torches and place them where necessary.

In a minecart you will be traveling on rails through a town infested by zombies. Throughout the map there will be multiple houses which inside them there are zombies.
