title: King of Mid
text:
This is a minigame map where you can play up to 4 players.

# How to play?

Collect gold from the middle while trying to knock back your opponent with special knockback 5 weapons.
However charcoal is worth -1 point so be careful.

• Gold: +1 point
• Charcoal: -1 point

Player with most points win!

Have fun. Made by Jamie2004Pierre.

title: Lost Relic Adventure - DT Kingdom
text:
Lost Relic Adventure - DT Kingdom

It is an adventure map to search for the Lost 5 Relics with the powers of Earth, Sky, Water, Air, and Fire.

title: Easter Parkour 2018
text:
Easter Parkour 2018 is an Jump'n'Run world. The world has an special texturepack that makes the playing a better feeling.

There are 3 difficulies: EASY, NORMAL and HARD. Each difficulty has an own coulor. The easy level is green, the normal one is yellow and the hard level is in red coulored blocks.

At the beginning there is an tutorial to lern the working of all blocks in the levels.

# Special Blocks

There are 3 special blocks in the parkour:

• Checkpoint block which sets your spawnpoint when you are on top of it
• "over head ladder" with that you can climb at the block with the ladder at the bottom
• Finish portal that brings you back into the lobby

# New Item

There is also an new item:

When you did a left click with it, it takes you back to your spawnpoint.

The map can be played in multiplayer. But you have to know, that if a player starts a level then all other players come also in this level.

When you finished the tutorial you can play the level easy. After finishing that the button for level normal appears.

So you can only play level hard after finish all other levels!

The map is avaible in english and german. All other users are automatic playing the map in english!!

title: Boat Race Circuit (Medium)
text:
This map is a big boat race circuit made to test your rowing skills in mcpe.  

• Compete with your friend in a boat Race. The first one to reach the finish and turn on the light WINS. Try to avoid the obstacles and row through. 
• This circuit was made for two competitors, but you can add more friends and make it more challenging. 

This map is on medium difficulty. Check out the other levels (coming soon).

title: Half-A-Heart Run (Updated)
text:
Half-A-Heart Run is a minigame where players have to run through an obstacle course which includes everything from a cactus maze to parkour jumps which might at first look easy. But since your health is limited to just one half heart you have to be extremely careful.

# What's new in this update?

• Added 2 new levels (Ice Skating & Sky Parkour)
• If playing on hard mode, when you get it, you get nausea
• You’ll now get a stone sword which you can enchant to make stronger

title: Sky Sailor Wooden Roller Coaster
text:
Sky Sailor Masive Wooden Roller Coaster (Built By Galayon)

There are two versions available for download.

• SSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: Soul Town
text:
Soul Town is a map that really keeps the Minecraft style, rather than looking more real. It also adds in those realistic elements, though, making it really special.

It is sort of a town nestled in an Extreme Hills biome with originally generated floating islands. It makes the whole thing a little unreal. For now, there’s Soul Town, Spruceview Township, and Soul Town Outskirts.

title: New York City Mini
text:
The City of New York, often called New York City or simply New York, is the most populous city in the United States.
This map is a mini version of New York City.

It’s built in an old world type of Minecraft PE which means that the total size only amounts to 256×256 blocks.

This map was designed for desktop version by CreeperEye, and ported to PE version by LeetRan.

title: Multi Prism Survival
text:
Imagine a cubed universe where each biome is its own cube and within each you are faced with a problem to solve. The common problem in all the cubes is to survive and the only things you are given access to are the things which you find inside the cube or the things which you manage to create and craft on your own.

# How to play?

Each cube is setup in a natural looking way to still make it feel as if you were in a normal world of Minecraft. Once you are done with one cube, you will move onto the next on. The concept is simple but fun and new!

# Creator

Made by McStenigma and Stratesurf.

title: Island In The Sky (v1.3)
text:
Island In The Sky is basically the same as skyblock survival except that this map also contains a store where you can trade resources with villagers. It’s a really good challenge if you want to test your survival skills and see how long you can survive. You can either play it in single player mode or in multiplayer together with other players.

The objective is to survive for as long as possible.

# Rules

• Don’t break store blocks
• Don’t take objects from stores (item frame)
• Don’t kill the villagers
• Play on normal or hard
• Don’t kill yourself to regenerate health

IMPORTANT: The map includes a behavior pack and resource pack. Make sure they are enabled before entering the world.

# Recommended Guidelines

• Build the Nether portal in the back of the store
• Set brightness to maximum
• Don’t move the portal in the Nether
• Create a chest and put all of your items there from the challenges

# What's new in v1.3?

• New prices (sell and buy with the same villager)
• New items
• New skin for the villagers
• New emerald coin (Minellar)
• Rules and challenges in the book

title: Explore The Moon
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map includes a rocket to send you to the moon. When you reach the moon, you will be in zero gravity. Have fun exploring the moon!

# Notes

• McWorld + Addon includes Interstellar Space Skies and SSPE shaders packs.
• McWorld is original map

# Addons

• SSPE Shader was created by RyFol
• Interstellar Space Skies was created by MCPEAlpha

title: Useful Observer Creations
text: This map features some useful creations where an observer block is the best option for most efficiency.

title: San Francisco Map
text:
San Francisco, in northern California, is a hilly city on the tip of a peninsula surrounded by the Pacific Ocean and San Francisco Bay.

This map is a creation that brought San Francisco into the Minecraft game.

# Texture Pack used

• In this map, Faithful PE texture pack was used. (Resource Pack 1)

title: DisneyPark (Updated)
text:
Welcome to the official map of DisneyPark! Disneypark is inspired by Disneyland Paris of course and it has its own sweet rides. There are just like the real theme park different worlds: The Main Street, Enchanted Forest, DisneyLand, Frontierland and DiscoveryLand. Sorry but some buildings aren't finished yet (like the Disneyhotel and the DisneyTour) but we are planning to update it.

Have fun in this amazing park!

# Updates (v0.7)

• Adventure Land
• Pixel Art Street
• Pirates of the Caribbean
• Lion King Coaster
• Indiana Jones and the Template of Peril

and much more have been added.

title: Mortknocke Islands
text:
Mortknocke Islands is a medieval themed map. The two main attractions in the map are the medium sized fortress and the big ship. It’s a really well done map and it looks even more cool with the Conquest textures.

There are two versions available for download.

• Conquest texture pack applied version
• Original version

Conquest texture pack was created by Monsterfish_ and ported to PE by Ekza

title: The Runner Parkour
text:
This is a free runner style map which include lots of parkour challenges. All jumps have been optimized to ensure that both Pocket (e.g. Android / iOS) and computer users can make it through the levels. In the map there are a few different blocks which each give the player a different status effect (e.g. speed or levitation) when in the presence of that block.

There are lots and lots of Cities to Own and to Pay for.

This map Requires 1 Dice, 2 players and 1 Banker and a Maximum of 2 Dice, 8 players and 8 Bankers.

title: PvP Minigame
text:
PvP Minigame its like Minecraft server but more modes 6 and map the modes is massive and survive to other player And you are the WORLD PVP CHAMPION if you are great gamer.

# Modes

• PVP
• PVE
• Bow war
• Snowbal war
• Sky wars
• Survival game

title: ParkourLine (Updated)
text:
In this map you will have to do parkour, but in a different way. You will have a fishing rod in your hand and you will have to hit the "Fish" button, after that it will generate a yellow platform that will disappear after a few seconds, the map has instructions in English and Spanish. (I hope I wrote well). There are several levels where you must have strategy and think very well. At the beginning of the map there will be a tutorial on how to master a jump. It may be a little difficult for some players. On the map should only play one player otherwise it could cause bugs. One more thing, the player must be watching for the side that wants the platform to come out.

# What's new?

• Bug fixes
• New objects to make parkour easier
• Changes for some levels

* Tap the pictures below to preview how it works

title: The Exit 2
text: The objective in The Exit 2 Map is to get past 10 different levels. In each level you will in some way find yourself trapped. Most of the solutions are in some way connected to redstone.

title: Modern Apartments 5
text:
This map features modern 6-story apartments with swimming pools and playgrounds.
Some floors of the apartment are already well decorated. The remaining floors are empty so that you can decorate yourself.

title: The Dummy 2 (Horror!)
text:
This is the sequel to The Dummy, a skillfully constructed horror adventure map.

# Story

After you went into the elevator, something really strange happen. You feel nausea and see weird stuff. You keep going forward and until the end.

# Previous Maps

• The Dummy 1

# Creator

• BendytheDemon18, Utaly_SLM

title: Door Dash
text:
Run to your finest to complete this INCREDIBLY HARD map...

This map was design to be unbeatable but it's really just IMPOSSIBLE...

But maybe your confident enough of your running skill and want to be the first one to complete this map...

Well then download the map now and enjoy!.

title: AkshalCraft Minigames
text:
It is a fun map consisting of various minigames.

• TNT Run
• Maze
• Parkour
• Elytra challenge
• Find the difference
• Piston Puzzle

And more!

title: Mansion Findell (v2)
text:
The Mansion Findell is a huge mansion situated on the top of a hill in a huge forest biome. There are a lot of different activities spread out all over the map which in some cases takes the player away from the mansion and out on basic adventures.

# Activities

Here is a list of all the different activities in the map which you can spend your time doing.

• Builders: Renovate one half of the mansion and customize it to your liking
• Treasure Search: Find hints inside the mansion and then use them to find the shipwrecks
• Multiplayer contests: Parkour, boat race, PvP, hide and seek and more
• Roleplay: Just hang out and roleplay
• Explorers: Find the hidden elytras and then find a way to the roof where you take off for flight
• Survivalist: Explore the forests, caves and mines

# What's new

• Church, Tavern, Training area, Haunted house, Sphinx and Tree house
• Maze, Elytra path, Cemetry, 21 shipwrecks, Rollercoaster, Parkour track
• 15 burried treasure chests
• And lots more!

title: Mario Craft Adventure
text:
This is an adventure minigame based on the famous Super Mario video game. Various characters in Super Mario are implemented using addon, texture pack, and command blocks.
Most of the game is made up of Parkour and Mob Battle, and you can follow the in-game instructions to complete the challenges and clear the stages.

title: ROOM 20
text: ROOM 20 is a puzzle and parkour map with 20 different levels. The redstone structures are rather simple in most cases and as a result it’s not a very difficult map to complete. But there are some levels which aren’t easy.

title: Amazing Parkour
text: Amazing Parkour is a challenging parkour map with 19 different levels.

title: TimCity
text: TimCity is a large creation resembling a larger city in lets say Sweden or Norway where the extreme expensivity of super big skyscrapers yet haven’t become a thing. In TimCity you will find a mixture of buildings all including smaller skyscrapers to normal family homes made out of brick.

title: Minigame World
text:
Giginess1234's Minigame World

There will be five minigames to play through in order to unlock the prize room. Get ready on an adventure to the MINIGAMES WORLD!!!

• Boat Racing
• Spleef
• Lava Run
• Mini Golf
• Parkour

title: Dropper IB 3
text:
It's very simple and fun skydiving for Minecraft PE.
There are 14 levels and they are not very hard.

title: The Temple of Notch in MCPE
text:
The Temple of Notch is an old map which was originally created for the PC version of Minecraft but has since then been ported to Bedrock Edition. Step inside The Temple of Notch and be judged! Markus “Notch” Persson is the person who created Minecraft and then (together with other people at that time) sold it to Microsoft.

# Story

Only the chosen one can enter the Temple.
If you are the chosen one you will get a reward...
...but if you are not the chosen one you will die!

# Creator

• PC Version: FVDisco
• Ported by: Saddle Sneeze (Twitter: @saddlesneeze)

title: Alien Escape
text: It's Alien Escape! Play as a Human and find all the generators and activate them to escape or play as the Alien and kill all the humans!

title: Hunger Games Mars
text: Hunger Games Mars is an amazing looking PvP map which can be played by up to 24 players. Go to Mars and participate in a PvP survival minigame. All around the map there are hidden chests which hold everything from food, gear and weapons. It’s a necessity for your own survival to find these before anyone else does and then use them in a way to make sure you are the last man (or woman) standing on Mars.

title: Avrin City (Updated)
text:
Avrin City (The Tomorrowland, Republic of Avrin)

Avrin City includes one big city with several huge skyscrapers and other modern buildings which are fun exploring. It’s still very much a work in progress as there are many open and undeveloped areas, but hopefully those will be populated soon as well. This reason for this update is to adhere to the on-going National Referendum for the 2017 Constitution to be ratified. If you like cities, then Avrin Country has it all!

# Creator

• Twitter: @AvrinMinecraft

title: ParkourMasters 2
text:
this is a parkour map which has four levels including:

• City
• Beach
• Slimeblocks
• Cemetery. 

# Creator

• Twitter: @master_testers

title: SkyLayer Survival
text:
Looks like Skyblock, but has unique challenges!
How to stand on 4y floor? without use water?!? find it out by play this map.

# Rules

• Play on easy, normal, or hard
• Play on survival
• Up to 2 players

# Quests

• Get all sapling biome
• Clear all dungeons (Kept all concrete block color)
• Use cobblestone generator to go down
• Found gray dungeon

# Challenges

• Play without go back on the top (Hard)
• Play without dying (Hard)
• End map in 2 hours (Not too hard)
• No break blocks (Impossible)

title: Cinema - Hide And Seek
text: The map is good for playing hide and seek or whatever. Find all the levers.

title: Little Islands
text: This map features 21 small islands scattered around the ocean in an infinite world. You can either use the map as a survival world or you can use it to build an adventure of some kind.

title: Ship Design Ideas
text: Need an idea to build ships? Here's a world to give you inspiration on making one!

title: Simple Sea Settlements
text: This map is good if you are looking to set off your next survival adventure with a little bit of a story. You’ll start out on a small island with a lighthouse and from there you’ll take a boat to another island. There are few different custom made structures and some chests which will provide you the base necessities for surviving. Don’t expect too much though, it’s a fairly simple map.

title: Coldest Parkour
text: The Coldest Parkour map tests both your parkour skills and abilities to survive in harsh environments. It’s a short and intense map as you will literally be chased by monsters while doing the parkour.

title: Alice - The Horror Game
text:
This is a horror minigame where you have to find the cross and kill Alice before being killed by Alice.

More information can be found on the YouTube video below.

title: Santa Mission
text:
Santa has been locked up in a lab and is right now being used for experiments by some evil scientists. Christmas is at stake here and it’s up to you to go on an adventure to find him and release him from his imprisonment. There are still lots of presents which need to be delivered and the elves need their Santa to complete this extraordinary task!

# Storyline

It is Christmas time and Santa Claus has been delivering thousands of presents to kids all around the world. But recently some evil scientists decided to kidnap Santa and perform experiments on him and his reindeers to try to figure out why they can fly. Ultimately their goal is to implement this technology in their own rockets.

title: Hardest Maze
text:
This is a maze map, which is quite difficult.
Rage quit is required XD 

# Rules

• Do not break any blocks
• No hack, cheats
• Play in peaceful

You can play by yourself or with a friend.

title: Treetops and Temples
text:
A survival map built around a jungle temple with an extensive network of treetop platforms and walkways. The build also includes…

• A nether portal with an easily accessible fortress at the nether end.
• A nether wart farm and potion crafting area.
• Lots of chests containing mined/collected/crafted supplies.

title: Escape The Prison Part 1
text:
This is a short escape adventure map. Your mission is to escape the prison. It's short but fun!

This map was created by John and consists of a total of two parts. This map is the first part.

title: Champion Way - The Biggest Adventure Map
text:
The biggest adventure map!
Yes, this is the biggest adventure map for Minecraft PE ever!

# Features

• Long adventure 
• Some scary places 
• Hidden ways
• Similar to Console Games! (Ps2/Xbox)

# Rules

• Don't cheating 
• Don't play in peaceful mode 
• Place levers and buttons on cobblestones and don't remove them
• This map have no much signs, please read them all for best result!

title: Super Village
text:
This map features a beautiful village in the middle of a large forest.

* This map might cause lag on low-end devices.

title: My Little Farm
text: My Little Farm (Fazendenha)

title: Valentine’s Day 2018
text: This map is perfect for anyone who is looking to get into the Valentine’s Day spirit. The map includes flower-filled gardens, minigames and also the Magical Valentine Boat Ride!

title: Fireworks Map
text: This map shows four different fireworks. All you have to do is pull the lever for each stage.

title: Working Huge Furnace
text: This redstone creation works just the same as an ordinary furnace except that it’s at least hundred times bigger and entirely powered by different types of redstone mechanisms. You can insert anything from iron ores to raw fish and get back cooked fish or iron ingots. This map is really cool just to try out but it can also be used to educate yourself on redstone.

title: Lava Runner
text: Lava Runner is a type of parkour map where you get a short head start before lava starts pouring down the ceiling. Your objective is to jump from one block to another, past all of the obstacles, to finally reach the end of the track and access the next level. All of this has to be done while knowing that you are just a few blocks away from being swallowed by lava.

title: Stampys Bedroom Hunger Games
text: Stampys bedroom hunger games is a hunger games map set in the bedroom of one of the most popular youtubers “Stampylongnose”.

title: The Virus
text:
! This map has reported a problem. Do not download until it is resolved.

# Story

You are Dr. Admond, a physician.
1 week ago……
A tragic epedemia happened.
A virus,this was a unknown virus that man could not even even understand its complexity.
Symptoms of a “flu” tha-that……..

# Rules and Instructions

• Before entering the map you must already set difficulty on
• Never ever turn down difficulty, never
• You cannot break blocks except for sponges
• No mods or cheats

title: Prison For Life
text:
Prison For Life – Are You Able to Escape? 

You were arrested for a crime and put in prison for the rest of your life. But you have no intention to stay there for any longer than deemed necessary. No one has escaped from this place, but maybe you can escape for the first time.

# Rules

Here are some of the rules relating to the map. All of them can also be found in a book in-game.

• Stone can be destroyed with stone pickaxes.
• Hardened stained clay can be destroyed with golden pickaxes.
• You can place levers on emerald blocks.
• You can place buttons on gold buttons.
• You can place dynamite on quartz blocks.
• You can destroy glass blocks (not panes) with a glass cutter.
• All other things you’ll learn as you continue in the map.

* If you installed the map but can not find it, scroll down the list of worlds.

title: SkyChunk
text: SkyChunk is an extremely challenging survival map which forces you to survive on a much smaller space than anything you’ve probably experienced before. There is only water surrounding the island so you carefully have to use whatever resources you find on the island and not waste them.

title: Awesome Trap Map
text:
It's a map with some traps, little parkours and a big surprise!

the storyline will be about someone who gonna train you into a i. d. spy...

title: Christmas Coaster
text: Cool Christmas themed roller coaster made by Josh Ocelot. Have Fun!

title: Modern Stadium
text:
This map features a stunning modern stadium designed with curves.

Inside, there is a large concert hall and auditorium.

This map was made by Lymp.

title: Aether Survival
text: This is the aether survival map. It is originally a modded survival map, but unfortunately no mod is included. But this is worth exploring as a creative map. Maybe survival is possible.

title: Update Aquatic Features Review Map
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft version 1.4.0 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft version is 1.4.0 or higher before downloading.

This map was created to help you get a better understanding about the new features being added in the Update Aquatic.

title: Maximum Security
text:
This is a short puzzle/adventure map where basically you get killed by various traps.

Your objective is to steal the world's most valuable crystal, Endyum Crystal while avoiding the deadly traps!

# Rules

• No breaking / placing blocks (unless told to do so)
• Set settings to: Difficulty Hard, Brightness Minimum (moody)
• No cheating / changing gamerules (unless you're stuck because of bug, improper map design etc.)

You would die quite a lot because of the hidden traps. But remember- this is just a game. Don't get furious, relax, and Enjoy!

title: Mega MiniGames (Update 2)
text:
This map includes multiple different minigames such as Disasters, King of the Hill and Hide & Seek.
You can choose whether to play this map alone in single player or in multiplayer.

# What's new?

• List of Additions:- New Weapons, Gadgets and traps for mob seige battles.
• XP shops
• New Disaster(Instability)  in the disasters minigame
• Lunar New Year Special: Fireworks dispenser and time changer in lobby.
• New spells:- Abra-Ca-Repulse,Binding Spell, and more.
• Showdown mode in mob seige. Different showdowns for different arena
• Reworked some arenas: Dead night Arena is now the Abandoned Lab Arena.
• Fixes: Hide and Seek now works properly
• Chances of multiple Disasters occuring is now higher
• Named the usable items
• Reworked reward system
• Preparation time now reduced to 30 seconds
• Now teleports the player to the reward system after winning in 30 seconds.
• Spleef minigame should be more noticeable now
• Moved things around in lobby 1 so it is a lot cleaner.
• Now displays the GAME OVER title for all players.

title: QMS Parkour
text:
Welcome to QMS PARKOUR 

This is a parkour map.

QMS PARKOUR consins of 7 different parkour levels. 
From our experince we should grade this map easy-medium. 

# Creator

• YouTube: QUEENMES

title: GTA San Andreas (Creative)
text:
Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas is an open world action-adventure video game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. 

This map appears to be a fairly old map. It seems that Old Map is converted to Infinite. Though small in size, the buildings are beautifully built and the details inside are also excellent maps.

title: SkyWars: Biomes
text:
This is a PvP map for up to 4 players. There are a total of 9 floating islands, 4 of which are the starting points for each player. The central island has better armor and weapons.

In this map, you will choose one of the four kits at the start.

• Desert Kit
• Nether Kit
• Coguvaca Kit (Mooshroom)
• Noob Kit

The player who survives until the end wins. (The player who died once is eliminated.)

title: aVIRa - Cyber Adventure (v2)
text:
HUMANS, ANDROIDS OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT, GET RRADY FOR THE ADVENTURE!

aVIRa is a cybernetic adventure map envolving a programmer into a big computer, trying fix some errors in the machine. But, the artifficial intelligence can be really your friend? Discover this and much more downloading!

• 60+ minutes of Gameplay (depends of your parkour/puzzle skills)
• Immersive envolving storyline
• Maded with Awesome CommandBlocks

# What's new in update 2.0?

Update 2.0 featuring a new alternative ending and lots of improvements and redstone issues fixed. All locked and loaded for lots of fun and exploration on this insane map waiting you!

title: MiniCitypolis - Mini City Texture
text:
Fly around and take a look!

Theres a city area and a suburban area.
I hope you enjoy the map!

This map was created by Jerry Y using the Mini City Texture Pack.
Mini City Texture Pack was created by Asl00 and ported to PE by David Kauerhof.

# Twitter

• David Kauerhof (@david_kauerhof)
• Jerry Y (@jerry_y8860)

title: Mega Maze
text:
The Mega Maze features a whole lot of different mazes all in different shapes and colors.

All of the mazes are in fact quite small, but very complex built to make sure they aren’t too easily solved.

title: SkyWars Desert
text:
This is a kind of SkyWars map, consisting of 8 small desert islands and a big island in the middle.
You can find much better items on the big island.
This map can be played up to 8 players.

SkyWars is a multiplayer mini-game map that you have to fight against other players in the islands above the sky.

* The signs in the map are in Portuguese, but it's not much to worry about.

title: Spooky
text:
Spooky is an adventure map which uses redstone features. This map consists out of 4 parts.

1. Parkour
2. Find the lever
3. Labyrinth
4. Boss Battle

# Rules

• Don't break blocks
• Don't place blocks
• Play on peaceful

Tap on the pictures at the bottom so you may have a hint or spoiler!

Have fun!

title: Creepy Sounds for Horror Maps
text: This map is a great showcase of creepy sounds in-game which can be used for creating horror or other types of adventure maps. All sounds are vanilla so this means you won’t need any third-party resource pack or similar to load them.

title: Raffi’s Calculator 2 (v1.0.4)
text:
This is a highly advanced calculator entirely powered by redstone. It supports addition, subtraction, multiplication, division and so much more.
Make sure to read the user manual in-game to learn more about the functionalities.

# Features

• Addition
• Subtraction
• Multiplication
• Division
• 15 seven segment displays
• A beautiful operation display
• Supports negative numbers
• Maximal input of 1023 per input
• Easy to control

title: Volcano Run
text: Volcano Run is a fun TNT run based minigame which keeps players constantly moving around on a platform. If you stand still and don’t move for a bit too long then the block underneath you will disappear from under your feet and as a result you will fall into a hot bath of lava. It’s recommended for multiplayer but can also be played in single player.

title: White House
text: Want to see whats inside the White House? Let's travel inside the white house in Minecraft game!

title: Dreams - Adventure Map
text:
This is an adventure map called Dreams.

# Story

You were sleeping in your house. But you got a lot of nightmares. There will be 10 dreams

# Rules

• No cheats
• No creative
• Set brightness 0
• Play in adventure mode
• Play in easy mode

title: Modern Church
text: This map features a modern church made of quartz blocks and golden blocks.

title: Jungle Village On The Beach
text: This map features a jungle village on the beach. The default mode in this map is creative, but it is also good for enjoying the survival mode.

title: Ghost Jump
text:
Ghost Jump is hardcore parkour map that made for fans of parkour and who likes hard extreme.
This map is pretty difficult. Fortunately, there are checkpoints at each level.

title: SkyWars (v3)
text:
SkyWars is a multiplayer mini-game map where you have to fight against other players in the islands above the sky.
There are eight small islands and a big island in the middle. You can find much better items on the big island.

All you have to do is survive to the very end. Have fun!

title: The Island In The Sky
text: The island in the sky is a massive floating island hovering high above ground. The island is surrounded by water which makes it extra cool seeing as it’s in the sky.

title: Mario 3D Land
text:
Mario 3D Land is a very creative and fun adventure map. It makes use of the Super Mario texture pack. And as a result, it will feel just as playing a Super Mario game, but in Minecraft. In each level you have to collect a star (also known as a lever). The star is then used for accessing the next level.

Objective & Rules

Find and collect all stars (levels). Reach the final level and then save the princess!

• Set difficulty to max
• Beds should be used as checkpoints

At the end of each level there will be a chest containing a star (or a lever). Return to the beginning of the level and place the star on the yellow block (marked red) as seen in the image below and then use it to open the door to the next level.

title: Uganda Knux Quest
text:
This is a fun survival experience taking place in a cool environment with funny (and sometimes bitey) new creatures!
The main objective is to survive against the Uganda Knuckles group attacks then try to explore as many things that you can and collect lots of loot. There are lots of things to be explored here, and also several different endings based on how you play the adventure.

# Creator

• Map: MegaStriker (Twitter: @MegaStrikerMCPE)
• Uganda Knux Quest Add-on: CookieModder (Twitter: @CookieModder)

title: Airport PE
text:
This is a realistic airport created originally for Minecraft on PC but has now been ported to Minecraft Pocket Edition. Minecraft Airport Map includes two big terminals and all of them are connected to motorways. A train system connects the two terminals you can easily get from one to another.
The airport include everything one does in real life such as check-in desks, lounges and security with metal detectors.

# Notes

• As a result of porting, there are bugs that are not in the PC version.
• If you don't mind them, download it!

title: InBegIn: Endless (Horror)
text: InBegIn: Endless is the third map in a series of mysterious horror maps. In this part you will travel to the village of Riggemond. Soon after you arrive you will realize that something isn’t right. It’s really not much more we can tell you than that as it doesn’t offer too much of a storyline but that is exactly what makes it exciting since you will have no idea what to expect.

title: TNT Wars – Red VS Blue
text:
TNT War is a PvP minigame where the main objective is to kill all other players of the opponent team. There are two different teams and each of them have a base on a different island. Between the two islands there is a big wall which you will need to destroy by building TNT cannons and use to destroy it.

There are five different kits and during the kit selection you will put the item in your main hand which represents the kit. It will enchant if it is your turn, and you will get the selected kit.

• Helmet: Fireball Kit – Stack of fireballs to shoot at your enemy
• Boots: Jetpack Kit – In case you fall off the platform
• Sword: Baller Kit – You get a snowball that takes all the TNT lit in the game and throws it with the snowball
• Fishing Rod: Troll Kit – Egg that throws creepers

title: Snow Biome Parkour
text:
If you like snow, you must like this parkour. This is a relatively easy parkour that you can parkour while enjoy the beautiful snow view.

# Tips

• There are pressure plates in the middle to set checkpoints.
• If you have fallen down but have not died, use the /kill command.

title: Survival in The Sea Temple
text:
It is similar to the Underground survival map, but smaller than that.
Make for play as 1-6 Hours.

Rules and challenges are in the map.
There are a total of 13 challenges.

This map includes Stickman texture pack by default.

title: 8 Redstone Creations
text: This map includes 8 epic redstone creations that you can build in Minecraft Pocket Edition.

title: SkyShop
text:
This is a sort of SkyBlock survival map inspired by Dlet's same name map.

It consists of three islands in the sky, the central island where your house is located, a shop island where you can trade with villagers, and a stone island where you can build a portal to the Nether.

Original Map: Dlet
Bedrock Edition: Carlls

title: Castle Tellur
text:
This map contains an epic castle on a flying island landscape.

Original Creator: SKULLUKS

title: LG UnfairPE
text: UnfairPE has been designed in a way to drive you as insane as possible and will likely cause you to want to uninstall Minecraft forever before you’d done with it! This map has many different stages full of trolls and traps.

title: INARCH - Modern House
text:
Welcome to INARCH - Modern House!

There are two versions available for download.

• Flows HD and SEUS Shaders applied version
• Original version

The first one might cause lag on low-end devices.

title: Advanced Death Run
text:
This Death Run map is specially made for 2-30 (World limit, could go higher) people. It has automatic team systems using experience levels. A random player is selected at the start to be "Death", and all others remain "Runners." The map automatically resets after each game ends.

A game will end in one of the following circumstances;

All Runners have made it to the end (except ONE player as Death).
All Runners died a total of 20 times.
When a Runner dies, they spawn in a room where they can choose a respawn point of all checkpoints they have stepped on. This will take away a Runner Life. Once all 20 are used, Death has already won, and the game resets!

title: The Split (Horror)
text:
The Split is a horror map taking place in part inside an abandoned hospital. It’s a single player experience where you will go on an exciting and sometimes scary journey to find out how you got there. From beginning to end there is a story to always keep you engaged in the adventure. There are custom sounds and textures to really create a spooky environment and atmosphere.

# Storyline

As you slowly wake up and open your eyes you find yourself in bed inside a room with white walls. You don’t remember what happened or how you got there but you are sure of one thing and that is that you aren’t alone!

title: TDS Building
text: This map features a tall high-rise building in the middle of the sea.

title: Abandoned Theme Park
text:
This is a survival games arena located in an old abandoned theme park. It can be played by up to 12 players and offers a challenging survival experience in an amazing environment.

It’s most likely inspired by The Hunger Games movies where combatants have to compete in a deadly survival game to be the last man or woman standing.

title: Undertale v3 (Add-on)
text:
Undertale map with add-ons!

How to change the route on the map:

• Genocide

Kill all main and secondary characters without leaving anything.

• Neutral

Leave some alive and some dead.

Pacifist

Do not kill anyone and have mercy on them

title: The Speedrunner
text:
The Speedrunner - Speed Parkour

Welcome To The Speedrunner!

This map is inspired by potion effect parkour on PC!
This map will test your parkour skills and your knowledge of PC!
There is a total of 4 levels!

# Rules

• Play in creative only!

All jumps are possible! (Even 4 block jumps)

Twitter: @IronCrafter101

title: OpenBlock Elevator
text:
This elevator is a recreation in Minecraft PE of the Elevator Block which exists in a (PC) mod known as OpenBlock. It’s still an early version which lacks some of the major functionalities but an upcoming update will address that by providing a more complex (but yet easy to use) solution. Either way, it’s the ultimate elevator solution to use for your worlds or Realms.

Tap the pictures below to preview how it works

title: YLO Kit PvP (v3.0)
text: This is a Kit PvP map with four different kinds of arenas.

title: Parkour Islands (v0.1.3.2)
text:
This map features 7 levels with 3 more coming soon!
It is quite long and features quite a lot of challenging jumps and puzzles!

# What's new in v0.1.3.2?

• Renamed level 1
• Fixed a bug with the checkpoint on Island 23
• Tweaks to islands 8, 15, 16
• Fixed a bug with the snowball not spawning in the right inventory slot, due to a change in the 1.4.0 update related to the /replaceitem command and the inventory slot IDs

# Creator

• Twitter: @Examinedcat669
• Xbox Live (gamertag): Examinedcat669
• Discord: https://discord.gg/u72Mtj8

title: Lucky Block Race (Updated)
text:
Lucky Block Race is a fun multiplayer minigame where players have to run through a course and destroy lucky blocks. Every time a lucky block is destroyed anything can happen. Sometimes you will get valuable items such as an iron sword and other times a creeper or something else dangerous might spawn. There is really no way to tell what will happen other than giving it a try in-game!

How to play?

This map requires 2-4 players.

• As soon as everyone have entered the map then start a countdown from 10 before you start running.
• Every time that you come across a lucky block you must first destroy it before you are allowed to continue.
• In the end of the racing course you have to fight to death against the other survivors and the last man or woman standing is the winner.

# Updates

• Lucky Block Add-on (v2) updated

title: Modern House #52
text:
Modern House #52 (Water Villa)

This map is a small two-story modern house with a impressive garden.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD applied version
• Original version

title: Parkour Dimensional
text:
Fight (or rather do parkour) to protect your world from destruction. In this map you play as some type of God who need to complete a series of six different parkour levels in order to protect the world order. It’s basically a basic parkour map but with a storyline.

# Rules

• Play on peaceful
• Don’t break blocks
• Play in single player

# Storyline

You are the person who control the totems of all the dimensions in the world. One day all of the totem items were stolen by a thief. They have been hidden in each respective dimension and your mission is to go out there and retrieve them. You must complete the parkour to save the world!

* It should be noted that all signs are in Spanish.

title: 100 Levels of Parkour
text:
Love Parkour? Here's a few "warm up" challenges to get you started. Map includes: 

• Command Blocks
• 100 Levels of Parkour
• Something Unexpected at the end

Hope you enjoy!

title: 11 Banner Tutorials
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

Banners are decorative blocks which is one of the new features in version 1.2. This map is useful for anyone who want a better understanding of how to create banners in Minecraft. In total there are 11 different banner tutorials detailing every step required for creating each banner.

title: Working Nintendo Switch (v4.2)
text:
This map is a recreation of the Nintendo Switch in the Minecraft world.
It includes a bunch of different features such as the possibility to load several different apps.

# What's new in v4.2?

• The Switch will now work on 12 chunks of render distance
• Fixed screens for Mario Kart and Minecraft that were not fitting the screen correctly
• Made a few small adjustments

For more information, check out the YouTube video below.

title: Anubis Village
text: It's awesome village for survival and other, set on creative mode and spawn villagers if you want for survival with this awesome village.

title: The Nine Doors
text:
This is a puzzle escape map called The Nine Doors. The concept and history is a bit based on 999 for NDS.

This map has:

• Mob Arenas
• Mazes
• Parkour
• Puzzle
• And much more!

# Storyline

You were a hard working miner who had no problems with anyone. One day, you came to your house and noticed that the window was open. You decide to close it. Something that seems sleeping gas permeates your room. A person with black layer appears in front of you. With a mechanical and distorted voice, he say: You are about to participate in a game. Consider this a privilege. The [Nonary Game]. It is a game ... where you will put your life in the line. It will blight the view and you faint. You awake in a place that you ever seen. So begins a story of the [Nonary Game]

# Rules

• All the rules are in the map.

title: 12UN - Speed Run
text: 12UN is a speedrun/parkour map. This map consists of 12 very challenging levels with you having only 12 seconds to complete each one. Let's see if you can complete all 12 levels and acquire all 8 achievements. Good luck! Strictly for single player only. Please read the instructions first before starting the game by clicking on the 'HOW TO PLAY' button in the MAIN MENU. Map made by flugxe.

title: Hardcore Parkour
text: This is a great map to test your parkour skills through various stages.

title: The Haunted Tunnel (Updated)
text:
The Haunted Tunnel is a horror map where you’ve been trapped in a mineshaft and have to find your way out.

# Story

You went down to a mineshaft to gather some resources. On your way back the tunnel collapsed and trapped your inside. People have always said that the tunnel is haunted by the spirits of miners who died there in an accident which took place in the year of 1978. Your goal is to find a way out of the haunted tunnel before you reach the same horrific end as they did!

# Rules

• Gamemode: Adventure
• World cheats enabled (but don’t cheat)
• Don’t break blocks/bypass
• Avoid using other resource packs as it will bug the map’s resource pack

# Known Bugs

• Some signs might disappear when you’re importing/loading the world. (No way to fix it currently.)
• Repetitive command block scripts causing lag. (Optimized as much as possible.)
• On the lava run room, if your friend got left behind he/she must die by going onto the lava a ResetSpawn is provided on the bottom of the room, otherwise he/she will be stuck or may continue until checkpoint further ahead and miss some good stuff.

# What have been updated?

• Updated to work with Minecraft v1.2

title: Medieval Town
text:
Perfect map for players who want roleplaying in a small town.
There are structures which can also saw on any villages. BlackSmith, houses, faming area, watch tower, well, and a spooky witch hut!
It's all made from the cobblestone and spruce woods.

title: Youtuber Parkour
text:
This is a parkour map made by aardvarkplayz05. It includes levels inspired by all ur fav yts like 09sharkboy, unspeakable, moose, ryguyrocky, pr3ston playz, and sabre.

# Settings

• Gamemode: Adventure (Required)
• Render Distance: 6 chunks (Recommended)

title: SG The Ditch
text:
SG The Ditch is an open PvP arena minigame where players drop into the arena from a stump in the ground. When in the arena players gain coins EXP that they can then spend in the shop for upgrades. Coins can also purchase events which last for 1-2 minutes.

At the moment you can purchase the Deathmatch event (final player standing, no players can leave the arena or enter it) or the KOTH (King of the Ring, if you are in the center circle you gain 2 coins a second plus double kill coins (instead of 2 coins per kill you will get 4!)).

You can play this minigame on the SkyGames Realms.

title: Multiple Skyblocks
text:
Skyblock is a type of gameplay where the player has to sharpen his mind to survive the ultimate challenge of surviving on a small chunk of land far up in the sky.

In this particular map you will spawn on one out of three skyblock islands. The only materials which you will be given is what you find in the chest on the floating island as well as the resources found on the skyblock such as trees and cobblestone.

# Objective 

The ultimate mission is to survive as long as you can and ultimately explore the entire universe, or at least the two other skyblocks located close to the first skyblock you will spawn on.

title: The Survival Games 2 PE
text:
This game is based upon the movie "The Hunger Games". It's a FFA PvP arena with up to 24 players + 1 (or more) hosts. There are many hidden chests, puzzles and traps around the map, but the best items are in the center.

# Notes 

• This map was made for PC version by Team Vareide, and ported to PE by hunterktan.
• There may be some missing features.

title: The World of Colours
text:
The World of Colours is another challenge where players are tasked with the important objective of finding a button. There are five different levels and most (but not all) relate to the new color palette which was introduced in version 1.1 for Minecraft. The map is most suitable for a younger audience since the challenges aren’t too difficult to complete.

The player’s objective is to find a button which is hidden somewhere in each level.

title: Paintball 3: Sakura Swamp
text:
This is the third paintball map in a map series by Paradiscal. The following paintball arena looks a lot different from the other ones. It’s a little bit bigger and includes more hiding spots than the previous ones. It’s really useful if you are more than just two players and want some open spaces. The map includes an addon which adds paintballs and other custom items to the map.

How to play?
This map requires at least two players. Once two (or more) players have entered the map then stand on the pressure plates to open the door which leads to the paintball arena.

Before starting you will need to pick up some gear, food and weapons. Use the commands as seen on the different signs in-game to equip everyone with the correct items.

Once everyone are ready it’s time to enter the arena. Start a countdown from 10 before beginning a round.

The objective is to shoot the other players with paintballs (snowballs). There are also other custom items besides the paintballs which you can use to greatly improve your chances of winning.

title: Elytra Parkour 2
text:
Welcome to Elytra Parkour 2
This map was built by JPlaysSE

This map can be played alone or with friends.

# Creator

• YouTube: JPlaysPE
• Twitter: JPlaysPE

title: Biome Parkour
text:
Biome is a parkour map with four different levels. If you are a beginner at parkour this might be suitable for you because the actual parkour isn’t that difficult. But of course, difficulty is relative to the individual so whether you’ll think the map is easy or hard is impossible for us to say. Either way, it’s a really enjoyable experience because the surrounding creations look just amazing.

You can use the built in automatic checkpoint system (by command blocks). It adds a better flow to the gameplay.

title: Water Drop Challenge (MLG)
text: This map consists of two different challenges in which you have to place either a slime block or a bucket of water on the ground in order to safely land on the ground.

title: Estren City
text: A newbie-made city with elements of Modern, Japanese and Middle Eastern Architecture.

title: Escape - Adventure
text: You’ve been imprisoned inside one of the largest prisons in Minecraft. But you are not alone. Hundreds of villagers are also held captive here. A voice has recently started speaking to you. Either you’ve gone completely nuts or you might finally be able to escape the prison. But you need to be careful since zombie pigmen are guarding the facility both day and night.

title: City of Eleftheria
text: City of Eleftheria is an old looking city. The architectural design seems to have been inspired by ancient Greek architecture.

title: SG Mexa: Insane
text: SG Mexa is a new survival world series which include a series of different worlds created with world edit tools on Java and ported to Bedrock Edition. SG Mexa: Insane features an insane island with chunk glitches on the borders which were generated when the world was imported from Java to Bedrock.

title: Sunken Island
text:
In this map you will find yourself shipwrecked and not far from your wrecked ship you will see a big island. Surrounding the island is like a massive wall of water making it appear as if the island is sunken. As you find your way to the island and explore the island you will find hidden secrets and come across things which should make you think that there has been someone already there before you.

This map has no specific rules or objectives, but we recommend exploring the dungeon in Survival mode.

title: Dropper IB Halloween
text:
This map features 14 different levels and some of which are Halloween themed. 

The objective is the jump down and try to land in the water.

title: Bloxnite (Fortnite)
text:
This is a multiplayer PvP minigame based on Fortnite.

# Features

• Moving battle bus
• Crate system 
• Shop (small)
• Game resets 
• Working building system (restets)
• Airdrops/supply drops 
• Chests reset (whole game resets so you can play infinite times)

Join our realm for beta testing! - https://realms.gg/i-Si9fFNYJQ

# Credits

• MineClan888 (Owner/Builder)
• Byrnorthil (Dev)
• XPAdventure (Builder)
• RedSlimeTime25 (Lead developer)
• Gameboi (Tester)
• SchylTEK (Builder)
• JEBR_Gaming (Textures! Does not work with us, we’re just using his packs with permission)

Special thanks to JEBR_Gaming for letting us use his textures!

# What's new?

• NEW MODES: Explosives Mode, Classic Mode, Zombie Mode, Half v Half, and Bloxz Mode!
• New locations! Play to find out!
• New items! Jump-pad, and nether star!

* Make sure the player's mode is adventure before joining the game.
* If you would like to learn about the new updates to this map, it may be helpful to watch a second YouTube video.

title: The Wall - Parkour Map
text: With over 1 hour playtime and 30 challenges you will have really fun! They are some jumps, where you could think, that they're impossible, but trust me: all jumps are tested and possible!

title: Plain 2-Story Wooden Mansion
text:
This map features a two-story wooden house with a unique design.
It is recommended to use modern texture packs for this map.

There are two versions available for download.

• Aero Star Modern Texture Pack applied version
• Original version

title: Mega Redstone Dirt House
text:
This map has a simple dirt house but underneath it, the true form of the dirt house reveals.

Tap the picture below to preview how it works.

title: Let's Build: Redstone House
text:
This map is Redstone House introduced in "Let's Build" series.
It uses all of the Redstone Available in Minecraft PE, to create things such as Redstone Lighting, Redstone Doors, and More Redstone Creations. But, keep in mind this was built in MCPE Version 0.13.0. Where there is only Redstone Torches, and Redstone Dust. 

# Features

• Remote Redstone Door w/ Lock 
• Redstone Wall with nighttime light sensors 
• Redstone Door Bell 
• Redstone Dance Floor 
• Redstone Floor Lighting  
• Redstone Ceiling Lighting 
• Trophy Room 

Want to learn how to build anything you see on this map? Check out the "Let's Build" series in Twiistz's YouTube Channel.
Tap on the name of the creator at the top to go to that YouTube channel.

title: Lever Locator
text: Lever Locator is a minigame which consists of 10 stages and a bonus room for those who can find the secret entrance. The objective for each room is to find a hidden lever to access the next level. Somewhere in the same room there is a chest which contains a sunflower which can be dropped into a hopper to reveal a hint how to find the lever.

title: Jungle Realms
text:
Jungle Realms is a survival map where you have to fight the mobs that will spawn depending on the difficulty you have chosen.
The difficulties you can choose are easy, medium, and hard.
Rarely, a zombie can drop an iron ingot, and drop it on the hopper to get better weapons.

Hope you enjoy this map!

title: The Hungry Bot
text:
The Hungry Bot is an AI pet controlled by redstone. The original design was created by PC YouTuber Mumbo Jumbo, and this version has had a few tweaks, both major and minor. Some parts needed to be adjusted to work in PE, while a few circuits have been added that were not in the original design.

The whole point of the map is simple. Feed the bot by dropping food, one at a time, into the hopper. This will increase his hinger bars. Those bars will slowly decrease, so you need to keep feeding him to keep him happy. Only one bar per meter is needed to make him happy, and it will sometimes take more than one piece of food to increase the meters. Just try not to give him any food he doesn't want.

title: The Fog Rises
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This map is a very cool adventure map that is set in London 1666 the time of the great fire of London. In this map there is a verity of cool stuff like Parkour, Puzzles and more stuff like that.

title: SG TNT Tag
text: A very fast and fun minigame which requires 2 or more players! Slap players to tag them! Run away from the tagger whilst the tagger must tag someone before the time runs out and they explode!

title: Biome Sky Wars (Fix)
text:
SkyWars is a multiplayer mini-game map that you have to fight against other players in the islands above the sky. All you have to do is survive to the very end.

This map contains 5 different biomes.
Play up to 30 players in the map.

* Some of the signs are in Portuguese, but there will be no problem playing the game.

title: Survival Island
text:
• Never ending, fun Survival challenge.
• Fun to make.
• Made for the pleasure of others
• This game can be played with multiple people.

Creator: Sticky_Fingers (@MCPE.Sticky Twitter)

title: OP Snowballs
text:
This map allows you to use OP snowballs using command blocks.

# Features

• Pokeball Snowball
• Destructive Snowball
• Lava Snowball
• Water Snowball
• Throwing Item Snowball
• Fireball Snowball
• Explosion Snowball
• Lightning Snowball
• TNT Snowball
• Teleport Snowball

For more information on how to use them, see the YouTube video below.

title: Command Creations By WalkerTyme
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map features 9 different creations using command blocks.
Read signs carefully before you test each of the creations.
Enjoy!

# Features

• Throwable TNT
• TMT Cluster Bomb
• Arrow Rain
• Storm in a Bottle
• Infinite Railway
• Custom Potion
• Grapple Hook / Tepeport Bow 
• Instant Structure
• Creation of Unknown Name (about TNT)

title: Undertale: Free Roam (Beta)
text:
This creation includes many of the areas in the popular role-playing video game called Undertale. It’s basically a big world which you can enter and walk around in to explore several different areas of Undertale in Minecraft as well as interacting with a few puzzles. It’s probably the most enjoyable for people who have actually played the game.

# Creator

• PC Version: skywarped33
• Ported by: Cheete

title: Sonic Generations: Unleashed Project
text:
More Sonic Generations: Unleashed Project map (2.0) is here!
It is a parkour map based on the very popular video game Sonic Generations: Unleashed Project.

Hope you enjoy it!

# Notes

• Optional: If you need sonic texture pack, there will be a download button above.

title: Strange Dreams (Horror)
text: This is a short, fun and sometimes creepy horror map. The story goes as following. You keep dreaming the same dream and over again and you’re extremely confused. And for some strange reason you have to deliver a book to Dr. Johnson. Each time that you wake up you’re just getting even more crazy. It’s like an endless nightmare without an end to it. Will you ever be able to wake up from this nightmare?

title: We Will Rock You (Note Block)
text:
The map is made up of hundreds of redstones and note blocks and is designed to play We Will Rock You by Queen.
Press the button at the spawn lobby to play the song.

title: Piston War Tank
text: This is a simple and easy slimeblock war tank.

title: Ceylon City Map
text: Ceylon City map is a metropolitan area where you can find everything from fully functional casinos and sports arenas to massive apartment complexes and malls.

title: Reverse Dropper PE
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

Reverse Dropper is a map that goes up instead of going down, unlike a normal dropper map. This is made possible by the combination of the levitation effect and the command block.

If it is too dark to be seen, use a pressure plate that gives a Night Vision effect. This also uses the command block.

title: Super Mansion
text: The Super Mansion is a modern home which features lots of redstone creations. For example, the entrance of the house requires a secret passcode to enter. There are several hidden storage rooms all throughout the mansion. Basically everything which can be used for something requires some type of redstone mechanism to be enabled and accessed.

title: 2017 Parkour
text: This map is made up of various parkour courses. Command blocks and redstones were used for each course. This map also has a custom texture pack to help you enjoy the map.

title: Kozork
text:
This map is an impressive creation featuring medieval structures and huge dragons flying above them.

Although the map is still under construction, it is still good enough at this stage.

title: King Of The Ladder PE
text:
This map is a direct port of the PC Minecraft Minigame King of the Ladder!

# Rules

1. No Breaking Ladders
2. Get only one item from each chest per life
3. You only have 3 lives
4. Sleep in the beds in each base to set your spawn
5. First to the top wins!

title: SG Micro Board
text: SG Micro Board is a small puzzle game where you must turn on all of the lights to win the game.

title: FNAF 3
text: Experience the terror again in FNAF 3 the 3rd FNAF map from Awsomegaming64's series of maps that are meant to be as simalar to the real game as possible. Note that this map is only 2 player unlike the others in the series. Also check out FNAF 1 & FNAF 2.

title: Bendy Game Horror 3
text:
This is a horror adventure map called Bendy Game Horror 3. This map is based on famous horror games BATIM (Bendy and the Ink Machine) chapter 4.

# Story

The Angel had tricked you, and put you into abyss. She needs a thing inside your friend to make herself beautiful again.

Your mission is to save your friend while he is alive. Let's find out.

# What’s new in this update?

• Added cut scene
• Fixed bugs
• Boss fight upgrade
• Added throwable bacon soup
• Build a little bit more
• Make it easier to solve the puzzle

# Previous Maps

• Bendy Game Horror 1
• Bendy Game Horror 2

title: Killer Clown (Horror)
text:
Killer Clown is a short scary escape minigame map. This map uses the killer crown add-ons created by CN Games and SirZeus.
The main goal is very simple. You must escape the maze without being killed by the killer crown.

title: Lava Jumps
text:
Lava Jumps is a map containing 40 challenges mostly related to parkour. Most levels are fairly easy to complete and they are for the most past not too long either. There are some dropper levels which is a challenge where you need to drop down into a tunnel, avoid possible obstacles and try to land safely on the ground either on slime blocks, cobweb or water. It’s a really great map with lots of fun levels!

# Rules

• Set difficulty to max
• Don’t break blocks

# Creator

• Dplo_Gaming, Gamingmcpe, ProMinerBuildz

title: Chester City
text:
Chester Craft / Chester city

This is chester city hope you enjoy the map.

title: PvP Minigames (3-in-1)
text:
In this map you can enjoy 3 different PvP minigames with your friends.

• Skywars: 4 teams battle for the center loot
• Perkwars: 2 teams try to destroy their opponents sea lantern
• Red VS Blue: 2 Teams pvp (or Free For All)

title: 10 Second Trivia Two
text: 10 Second Trivia Two lets you test your knowledge by answering 20 different Minecraft PE trivia questions. But since there’s a 10 second timer you’ve got to be quick with the answers to be able to move on to the next level. It’s a really fun challenge which at times gets very intense since you’re always running against the clock!

title: MineChess
text: A chess board where you can ride mobs like horses to move your pieces (mobs). You use an armor stand to capture a piece. Reset the board is one button away. Loads of fun for you and a friend!

title: Ultra Puzzle
text:
This is the first map of the Ultra puzzle map series. You need to find a way to pass 5 levels and 3 bonus levels in this map. (It is not difficult.)
All the rules and information are inside the map. Hope you enjoy it!

title: Futuristic Platform
text: This map features a futuristic platform with underground houses, data towers, reactors and many other facilities.

title: Food Wars
text:
Food Wars is a fun multiplayer minigame where you have to make more food than your opponent in a limited amount of time.
This minigame requires at least two players.

# How to play

• Pick a team
• Touch the button to start the game. (You can see the button at the middle of the map)
• Collect the resources and craft them to make food.
• Press the button on your team side to exchange food for emeralds.
• Each team is equally given 5 minutes. A team with more emeralds wins.

More information can be found in the map.

# Creator

• Twitter: @LUCKYBLOCK17o
• YouTube: L17

title: Redstone Jungle Temple
text:
If ordinary jungle temples were bored, try exploring the temple on this map!

On the overall look it looks like a regular jungle temple but trust me it just is not a jungle temple it is jampacked with all trusty Redstone related stuff.

title: Island on Void
text: Discover new islands and build your own.

title: The Jumper
text:
Welcome to The Jumper!

# Story

After completing all the tests in The Speedrunner, you still had to test the jump boost effect. You decide that you cannot keep doing tests forever so you escape with a robot known as Wheatly! The storyline of this map is based off of Portal 2! Chapter 2 will come out soon!

# Rules

• Creative mode only!
• No mods!
• Play the speedrunner first!

Have fun!

title: MC Parkour
text: This is a custom parkour map which includes a great variety of parkour challenges. Different blocks determine different obstacles. For example, by coming in contact with one block you will get a speed boost and with another you will levitate for a few seconds. At some times it’s quite similar to a puzzle map in that sense you have to carefully plan your jumps.

title: Futuristic Modern City
text:
A giant futuristic/modern city is out. In this city, you'll found the central island, with giant building, skyscrapers, and at the 4 sides, north, south ... etc, you'll found a University, a Stadium, and a Residential area, all on different island.

# Creators

• Creator: MCFRArchitect
• Ported by: GerardBotse

title: The Infinity Stone (v1.1)
text:
The map premise is simple, just keep mining the stone...
There is an ending to the map but i will let you guys discover it on your own

title: Save Valentine’s Day!
text:
Find The Button: Save Valentine’s Day! 

This map has 11 different levels. You can move to the next level by finding and pressing the button for each level. There is a hint book that helps when you are in trouble.
All levels have to be completed before 12 o’clock, or else the evil spirit will take over this otherwise loving and joyous day.

If you are playing multiplayer, you'd need to download the Resource Pack (set in Global Resources, required for all players in multiplayer only)

title: The End Add-on
text: The End is another dimension in Minecraft which doesn’t exist in the official version of Pocket Edition (until now). The End Add-on changes that as it let’s you explore a world which looks very similar to The End and even includes an epic boss known as the Ender Dragon. If you’ve always wanted to fight the Ender Dragon then you definitely have to give this add-on a try!

title: Puzzle Adventure
text: This is a puzzle map made up of 15 different mini-games such as Parkour, Find The Button, and Maze. Parkour, Find The Button, Quiz, Dropper, Reverse Dropper, and Maze.

title: Toy Story 2 (Fix)
text:
* Missing parts in the map have been fixed. (v1.2)

Toy Story is a American computer-animated buddy comedy adventure film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

This is an adventure map based on the movie Toy Story 2.
Made for 1-4 Players.

All the instructions for the game are on signs inside the game.
Enjoy!

# How to play

• You will find many quests on this map. 
• Try to collect as many watermelons as possible. 
• Each room you will find rex. 
• He will have a quest for you.

title: Spleef And TNT Run
text:
This is a multiplayer minigame map called Spleef and TNT Run.
In this map, you can enjoy two fun minigames with your friends.

Both minigames are automatically reset by command blocks so you can enjoy unlimited play.

# Spleef

Spleef is a competitive minigame played within Minecraft. When playing spleef, players will destroy blocks below other players, allowing them to fall off the playing field and into a pit. The object of the game is to be the last player on the field.

# TNT Run

As soon as you step on the block it will fall down immediately. So you have to keep running through the other blocks to survive. In this minigame, a player who survives to the end wins.

title: Extreme Safe House
text: This map features an extreme safe house which will keep you well protected from most dangers in Minecraft. The main feature of the map is the modern mansion which is powered by more than 350 command blocks, 3 different safety modes and much more.

There are tons of new things to explore (mostly textures though) and we highly recommend you to download it yourself to fully immerse yourself in this crazy experiment!

title: HighBlock State
text:
# What is this about?

Is a complete Minecraft Bedrock Ed. State Project, which started a year ago, on July 1st 2017.
As a really big Project, it isn't even at 30% of total development.
This is a base release, due the notable points that are not fully worked.

# What does it have?

The project at the moment is composed of the city of Amundsen, the capital of this state, which in turn has 4 parts; the financial center, the oak zone, the outskirts of Amundsen and finally the north of Amundsen.

# What does amundsen city has?

• Starting from the most striking part of the capital, it has a wide variety of modern buildings made of glass, also going through some not so modern but at the same time as impressive. It has a great variety of details and places to see the pure quality of Minecraft nowadays.
• Continuing with the oak zone, is a not so luxurious area, a neighborhood like any other, a few residential buildings, a bus stop, and a few points of commerce, ah and also the building of the IAMA organization.

# Future Plans

• Develop Amundsen at a 100%
• Begin the other cities of the state (Currently 2 planned) La Candelaria and Cartade City. All from HighBlock State.
• Add more detail and modern buildings a 100% useful.
• Reach and get over the d/loads of Soutade City (2015-2016) and Grand Shine City (2014-2015)

2nd Floor has large Master Bedroom w/huge Bathroom, his and hers sinks with Gravel Tile. this floor also includes 2 Bedrooms with a Jack and Jill stye Bathroom. And a Kick Butt Entertainment Center with Projector TV.

Backyard includes a Outside Entertaining Bar, Quartz Pool and Spa w/Oak Plank Deck and Diving Board, Flowing Water Seating Feature made with Dorite and a Manicured Seating Area.

title: Brookfield (Mini City) - v1.1
text:
Brookfield is a miniature city which started its construction in mid-2016. It’s the biggest miniature city currently available (for Bedrock Edition). It includes tens of skyscrapers and loads of different areas worth exploring. The city is very well planned with a great variety of different districts. Have fun exploring!

# What's new in v1.1?

• A sprawling network of roads within present city boundaries (as illustrated by the wall map)
• Added freeway interchanges
• Modified hundreds of buildings (albeit slightly)
• Changed the roof texture of many buildings (as by the ‘Green Roofs Initiative’ buildings covered in lighter colours absorbs less heat, reducing the urban heat island effect, green roofs provide life and possibly food for its residents.)
• Added dispensers to the spires of skyscrapers, containing fireworks for a display!
• Expanded parks and converted roads into pedestrian paths to curb pollution and vehicular traffic

# Credits

• Mini City Texture Pack: Asl00, David Kauerhof
• Tiny Player Addon: RyFol

title: Last Day on Earth
text:
Last Day on Earth is a survival and adventure map which is inspired by the popular game with the same name. You play as a character who is one of the few survivors after World War X. The lucky ones already left for a journey to Mars. But some people, like yourself, were left on Earth and now have to struggle for their continual survival. It’s tough surviving in a world with barely any food and infectious diseases which turn humans into zombies. The ultimate question stands: will you make it?

# How to play?

The main objective is to collect the materials required for repairing the broken spacecraft and then escape off to space. But it’s going to be difficult. First off you need to figure out a way to survive in these barren lands and don’t fall a victim to the zombies, stray dogs or other creatures lurking the dark. Your best bet is the broken down spacecraft.. you better get started!

# What's new?

• Bug fixes relating to command blocks
• Extended storyline
• New Easter eggs and events

# Important Notes

• You HAVE to read ALL the books. The Maintenance report is the most important. It will explain the whole point of the map.
• There are shulker boxes with important items with a plank-like texture. Many people seemed to completely miss those.
• Crafting items is not allowed. Changing to peaceful is also not allowed.
• There is a mini bunker/room at the spacecraft crash site,somewhat hidden, with important items to progress through. Be sure to check that out!

title: Aircraft - Assassins
text:
This map is designed to allow role play on the plane.

# How to play?

Before boarding an airplane, you will select your class by pressing the randomizer button.
Press the randomizer button to determine your class.

• Detectives

If you are a detective, take a sword or bow and arrow from the item chest.
Find and kill the assassins before the bomb explodes. but should not kill innocent.

• Assassins

If you are an assassin, take redstone dusts and press the Invisibility button to hide from the detectives.
You have to blow up the bombs on the airplane wing without getting killed by the detectives.
You can break and place the wool blocks to reach the bombs.
The Redstone Torch in the Armor Stand can only be taken by assassins.

• Innocent

If you are an innocent, take a flower from the item chest.
Do not get killed by detectives or assassins.

Maybe the game is not great. But even if you do not play the game, you will agree that the plane on this map is very impressive.

# Creator

• RyanGabriel, DanTheOficial

The Ender is incredibly fast and also extremely dangerous. When he gets really angry he’ll summon some Endermen who will do his bidding for them.

# Wither Boss (3rd)

The Wither Boss is similar to the default boss. He’s basically just as dangerous.

# Null (4th and Final)

Null is an evil demon soul which has been incarnated as a humanoid and his powers are immense. (Health: 500 hearts, Attack damage: 20, Wither effect)

title: The Dungeon Tower
text:
The Dungeon Tower is by far one of the best arena maps I’ve ever come across for Minecraft Pocket Edition. It contains six beautifully designed levels (especially so if you’ve got the optional texture pack applied) and the redstone mechanisms seem to work flawlessly. It’s a perfect map for anyone who enjoy monster battles or just want to improve their fighting skills. Also, it can be played by up to three players!

# Classes
As soon as you’ve entered the map and read all of the rules it’s time to pick a class. Each class is different from the other so think carefully before picking one to make sure it suits your preferred fighting style.

• Archer: High damage, long range, low armor
• Blade Master: High damage, medium armor
• Paladin: High armor, high knockback, low damage

# Shop
Next, go to the shop to see all the different things you can buy. Before being able to buy any of these items you will need to slay some monsters. The loot from monsters is used as the currency for the shop.

# Arena
Before entering the arena make sure to create a checkpoint either by sleeping or by using the /spawnpoint text command.

Each level has five monsters waves. To start one press the button on the emerald block. Then press it again after you’ve completed one wave to start the next one.

Look at the redstone lamps on the wall to keep track of how many waves you’ve completed.

You have to complete six different floor battles before finally reaching the top of the tower where a boss is waiting for you.

Don’t forget to visit the shop to upgrade your gear and weapons!

# Rules
• 1 – 3 players
• Play on easy, medium or hard (not peaceful!)
• Lagging? Turn off fancy graphics, set render distance to minimum
• Don’t steal items from item frames in the shop

How to play?

Start a countdown from five and then start riding.

The horse track includes multiple different parkour challenges. Be careful! It’s gets very hard sometimes and on certain levels failing is not an option!

title: A354’s Hide and Seek
text:

# How to Play?:

• Hider: Hiders have 40 seconds to hide from the Seekers and must survive the game to win.
• Seeker: Seekers must need to kill all Hiders to win the game.

# How to win

Each round takes 5 minutes. Hiders win the game if the Seekers fail to kill them. If the Seekers successfully kill all the Hiders, Seekers win the game.

title: Redstone Eco-House
text:
This map features a unique house with grassy roofs on the beach.
This house features a few redstone contraptions, such as...

• Door Blockade: Puts a block in front of the door to keep mobs out.
• Glass Door: Push the buttons to open and close the door to step into your balcony.
• Fridge: Dispenses good for you!
• Hidden Chest: Place a mine cart on the stove next to the wall to open a secret compartment.
• Secret Basement: Go through the painting by the table and press the button, a secret door will open.
• Auto Armor Dispenser: Equips armor automatically.
• Auto Harvesting Farm: Automatically harvests your crops and puts them into a chest.
• Enchanting Bookshelves: Allows you to add or remove bookshelves for different enchantment levels.
• Auto Furnaces: Out your fuel and items to be smelter in the designated chests and they will be smelter automatically.
• Passcode Safe: Turn the redstone torches in the item frames to the right pattern to open another secret chest.
• Slime Block Elevator: Press a button to be launched back to the surface.

title: Do You Know The MCPE 0.1?
text: This is a minigame that has 20 challenging questions based on one of Minecraft Pocket Edition’s first update, update 0.1. Even old school Minecraft players may be challenged as these questions can be quite difficult. There are 5 choices to choose from in each question. Choose the correct answer. Play in adventure mode and in peaceful. You can also play in multiplayer if you want. Have fun!

title: SG CTF (Capture The Flag)
text:
SG CTF is a capture the flag minigame for up to 10 players and there are two possible teams (red vs blue).

# How to Win

One of the main objectives is to capture the other team’s flag. Fight your way through the other team’s defense, or be stealthy and sneak your way up to the flag before stealing it. You can take the flag by destroying it with your shears item.

If you drop the block then you will automatically die. This was implemented to stop a major glitch. If you die with the flag in your inventory it will be returned to your enemy’s base. Once back at your castle go back up the stairs and place it on your podium.

# How to Defend

Another objective is to keep your own flag safe and making sure it isn’t captured by the other team. The best position is in a tower to get the best view over your flag. But this comes with the disadvantage that it’s slightly more difficult to reach the flag if someone comes and tries to steal it.

# How to Gather

Gathering resources is essential for your team’s survival. This is most noticeable if you have more than two players per team. The resources are found in caves and they include things such as coal, iron, gold, and diamond ore. Use your sword to destroy the cobweb.

When the message "PvP Enabled!" appears, the survival game starts. The player who survives until the end wins.
