text:
This map has lottery machine and stations that converts tickets into emeralds. No command block is used in those machines, which means these can be built in survival mode!
Each ticket cost one emerald. 4 stacks of emeralds are given to you.

There's three types of tickets: losing ticket(nether brick), winning ticket1(gold ingot) and winning ticket2(diamond).

4 losing tickets can be converted to an emerald. One winning ticket1 for two emeralds, and one winning ticket2 for 4 emeralds!
If you put item in a wrong chest, don't worry - It will come back.

Note - DON'T STEAL ITEM FROM THE MACHINES!

title: Find The Button (Small)
text:
This is a mini-game where you have to find and press the button to move to the next level.

The first three levels of this map are well designed and may be quite difficult. But the last two levels are very simple, so you can clear them quickly.

title: Gold Crafter PvP Transformers
text:
This is a really cool map which features two gigantic robots which can be enabled to fight one another. I highly recommend to play this map with at least one other player seeing as you need to enter the robots to enable their main weapons which are basically TNT launchers. There is very little you can do to impact the outcome of the fight other than be the quickest one to pull the levers.

How to play?
To play this map you will need at least two players. Follow the path of the red carpets to find the way up to the robot control tower.

Start a countdown from 5 and then toggle the levers to start the robot duel. After you’ve pulled the levers there is really not much else you can do other than to pray to Notch and hope for his blessings.

In this case it looks as if the blue robot won. The main reason for that is because I had to enable the levers for the yellow robot a little bit after I enabled them for the blue robot.

If you want to restart the map make sure to download the template download.

title: The End TNT Wars
text: TNT Wars is a minigame where you need to construct TNT cannons which you then have to use to destroy the other team’s base. You will be split up on two separate islands which are divided by a huge wall. It’s a really fun type of minigame which I highly recommend to play with at least a couple of other players. Teamwork is essential here so make sure to communicate with the other team members!

title: Rainbow Village
text: This is a rainbow village map. It looks pretty cool. Also there is a big rainbow above the village.

title: Simple Adventure (Updated)
text:
Kidsource Simple Adventure (Updated)

You are Breck, the bravest warrior in all of Diamond Village. Last night an angry group of mobs kidnapped the village Elder. The entire village is counting on you to save him!

To complete your adventure, you will need to obtain the best armor and weapons around. That’s where the villagers can really help you!

# Map features:

• Easy to follow storyline
• 3 custom gaming areas including Diamond Village, The Mountain Cave, and the Mob Tower
• A simple series of quests leading up to an epic boss fight
• Sweet custom armor and weapons….including a hidden sword that is so epic I can’t even speak of it without weeping (wipes a single tear off my cheek)

# What's new?

• Changed the position of the pressure plate at the entry to prevent spamming
• Fixed a bug which occured on some versions where no wool would drop, provided shears to harvest wool
• Fixed chest plucking bug
• Added town book store interior and the Legend of Big John
• Fixed boss fight bug, added bedrock to east wall of black tower

title: Rustic House
text:
In this map you can start out owning a large house which is nicely situated in front of a lake.

Belonging to the big house is also a little wheat field. The house is decorated with all types of furnitures you may need. Beds, crafting tables and furnaces just to mention a few. All in all it’s a great house to start out with for your next survival adventure.

title: Darkness Descending
text:
This is the second map in the After Darkness map series. Instead of trying to kill yourself in this map, the goal is to stay alive in the scenario presented while playing. It’s an adventure combined with parkour and puzzle map.

Previous Map: After Darkness

title: Simple Medieval House
text:
This map features a nice little cottage situated on a hill overlooking a large swamp. It’s suitable for survival adventures if you don’t consider yourself a great builder or if you want a home right from start. The design of the house looks absolute the best by using the John Smith Legacy texture pack and that’s the pack which we used when getting the screenshots.

The interior of the house includes no furniture. It’s like moving into a new house. Decide yourself how you want to furnish your home.

The porch overlooks a large swamp. Sit down here and relax here after a long day’s hard work.

Here’s an overview of the entire property and the surrounding terrain and biomes.

title: Halloween Land
text:
Spook your boots off with this brand new adventure map experience. We’re just a few days away from Halloween. It’s that time of the year when the moon rises, ghosts awakens and monsters rule the night. This is a really neat map which is perfectly suitable for Halloween. It includes many secrets and lots of other different things to see. Explore the horrors and attractions of Halloween Land today!

# Storyline

For every 30 years (yes, not 27 (IT reference)) a fearsome entity visits to devour the lives of many and only you can stop it. It is your quest to stop and kill this creature and obtain glory.

title: Ares-I - Mission to Mars
text:
This map simulates a Mars mission in Minecraft!

This is the sequel to Apollo 18, Return to the Moon! This time you’re going to an entire different planet known as Mars.

title: SG Cube Capture
text:
SG Cube Capture is a very unique and fun minigame! Play on Red or Blue team and fight it out to capture all the cubes! Build with your wool that refills at your base! Enjoy our amazing fun minigame!

* Please note that the scoring system isn't perfect and we are working on it!

title: Simple Minecraft House
text: This map shows a small but beautiful suburban house and garden.

title: Custom Worlds: Mixed Biomes
text:
The second map of 7 worlds, but now this is survival!!!
Take a trip around this beautiful landscape

• Spawn in a nice island near to a huge ocean
• then go to the next island marked in the picture
• you will find

- A nice desert
- Epic cliffs
- Little sabana
- Dark forest
- Meadow
- A river crossing the landscape

* There's a treasure somewhere near to the river...

# Creator

• Twitter: @In_Nova01

title: Wizard of Aaz
text:
This adventure map by Kidsource is based on that famous movie. You will start out as a young farm hand who is swept away to a magical land. Your adventure begins in Little Village, and it will take you all the way to Diamond City!

There is plenty of adventure along the way, including parkour, mob battles, hidden secrets, a giant maze, and much, much more.  You must make your way down the golden block road, completing tasks along the way. In the end, a mysterious wizard might help you find your way home....but at what price?

title: BM Redstone House
text:
BM Redstone House in this map is full of redstone features you want.

# Features

• Passcode door
• Automatic door
• Automatic Elevator
• Automatic Cooking Machine
• Automatic Trash Bin
• Working Shower & Bath
• Working Water Foundtain
• Swimming Pool With Lights
• Spring Diving Board
• Hideable Sunbeds
• Automatic Farm

Are many other things.

title: Volcanic Crafter PvP
text:
A PVP map made by BlazeCrafter420 with a small parkour section in the volcano.

# How to use the McTemplate

• Create New > Choose "Volcanic Crafter" > Play

title: 25 Ways To Die (Part 2)
text:
This is the second part of 25 Ways To Die. You have to find a way to die as that’s the only way to respawn in the next level.

Previous Map: 25 Ways To Die - Part 1

title: SG Hide and Seek
text: This is a really well made hide and seek minigame with several cool features to make it a unique and enjoyable experience.

title: Sroren - Adventure
text:
Sroren is a new adventure map series where in the first chapter you have to break out of a dungeon you’ve been locked up in. It’s a magical themed map where you play as the leader of a group of people who have been fighting Koratz demons for ages. More of the story and background of yourself will be known to you as you progress through the map.

# Story

For a long time have you waited for this moment to come. Actually, not that long ago you were the leader of the Dorens. The group of people that got rid of the Koratz, a type of demon. In the process of killing Koratzs you were infected by their virus which led to other people’s deaths. As a result you were thrown in a dungeon, to keep you isolated.

Visions came to you that your fellowship would break you out, and now it looks as if they have done that.. now you need to escape..

# Rules

• Never break blocks unless told so
• Killing is only allowed with pickaxes, swords and bows
• Explore the hidden portals
• Play on hard mode

title: Mountain House
text: Cool mountain house! There is also a dog house and a vendor! hope you guys like my creation!! (its not done yet tho, but its great)

title: Modern House by Jaredixir
text: This map features a two-story modern house with garage, tennis court and pool. It’s a small house but it is decorated well both outside and inside.

title: The House from Up
text:
This map is inspired by the Pixar movie Up, featuring the iconic flying house with balloons.

Up is a 2009 American 3D computer-animated comedy-drama adventure film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

# Creators

• Original Map: PalandriaMC
• Ported by: dakonblackrose

There are two versions available for download.

• Simple Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: TNT Stuff - Redstone Creations
text:
A TNT Redstone Map (v1.7)

Download the map to see what is inside!
Some of the best things in this map are the Player Launchers and the TNT Fireworks!

title: Self Building House by Blu
text:
This map allows you to see all the processes that automatically build the house.

# Features

• Self Building with tons of block animations (e.g. rolling logs)
• Build and dismantle the house with the press of a button
• An Easter egg (it’s a gadget)
• Interior of house included.

# Rules

• Do not press the build button more than once
• You can use creative mode for better view

# What's new in this update?

• Fixed a rare case in which some animations failed to complete.
• Easter egg is more noticeable now
• Now teleports the player facing the proper direction so that they do not miss the first animation.
• Removed Hall of Fame
• Other minor fixes

title: Escape From Jail
text:
This is a short escape map called Escape From Jail.

It consists of various mini games like puzzle, parkour, maze, and mob battle. The main objective is to escape from jail as in the title.

# Rules

• Play on survival
• Don't break anything
• You can play on multiplayer
• Difficulty: Normal

# Creator

• Ghostangel00, ObsessionKK1

title: Redstone PvP
text: Bring together some friends and fight for glory in this amazing Redstone PvP arena. There are two competing teams and the obvious goal is to kill all other players on the other team. It could definitely be a fun map to play but to really get the most out of it see if you can get together at least four players.

title: 5 Simple Redstone Creations
text: This map contains five simple but useful redstone creations. This is a good map to learn about the redstone mechanism, as there is a corresponding tutorial across each of the creations.

title: Ping Pong
text: This is a minigame which brings the world-famous sport of ping pong, also known as table tennis, to Minecraft. Rackets, ping pong balls and even a really cool table tennis table have been added. You can play the game with up to four friends (and minimum 2 players) and it works surprisingly well.

title: Persian City Alamut
text:
This city includes a big town made of sandstone and wood.
Surrounded by beautiful nature and desert.

# Creators

• Java Edition: LegionaerCrafting
• Ported by: TheMrjoojo

title: SG SkyWars (15 Maps!)
text: SG SkyWars is one of the best SkyWars maps for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition with a total of 15 different maps and 5 upcoming mega mode maps. All aspects of the game are of course automated with redstone and command blocks, so all you need to do to get started is just to press the button in the lobby. It’s recommended for 2 – 4 players.

title: Modern Architecture Design Ideas
text:
This map shows various modern architectural designs. There are different buildings such as apartments, shopping malls, mansions, and office buildings, and most of the buildings are designed with a beautiful and unique appearance.

If you are going to create a modern building, this map might be a good inspiration for you.

title: Serenity Independence
text: Serenity Independence is one of the largest and most detailed cruise ships ever created for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition. The size dimensions are as following: 330 blocks long, 45 blocks wide and 15 decks tall. All rooms have complete interiors on the inside and on the very top of the ship you’ll find water slides and other structures for entertainment.

title: Armor Stand Creations
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This map features a quick armor stand tutorial, it shows off all of the armor stand poses as well as giving five clever creations of ways you can use them in-game. The armor stands primary use are to hold and display wearable items and it’s really the most convenient way to store you gear rather than keeping it hidden (and easily forgotten) in chests.

title: The Ultra Maze Run
text:
TheUltraMazeRun is probably one of the largest mazes built for Minecraft Pocket Edition. The maze is a majestic build created out of lots of quartz pillar blocks which give the maze the feel of ancient Greek architecture.

# How to play?

The map can be played by up to four players and the main objective in the map is to find all 10 keys (also known as gravel blocks). It’s only when you’ve got at least five keys that you can get to the second half of the maze and continue to the finish line.

title: Bendy and the Ink Machine RP (Chapter 1)
text:
Bendy and the Ink Machine RP (Chapter 1)

Bendy and the Ink Machine is an episodic survival horror video game developed and published by TheMeatly Games.

This is a recreation of the Bendy and the Ink Machine in Minecraft. This map is not a game with some goals. But it can be used for roleplaying or explored and enjoyed as a creation.

# Credits

• Map by FREDNADO
• Texture pack by FREDNADO
• Idea and Game by TheMeatly
• Map layout idea by Draggyy on ROBLOX

title: The Legend of Zelda
text:
The Legend of Zelda - Adventure Map

The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD is an action-adventure game in Nintendo's The Legend of Zelda series for the Wii U home video game console.

Since we all love Zelda so much I thought a mix of all the Zelda games would have a unique touch to Minecraft. Mazes, mob battles, parkour, boss battles...you name it! It's all here! Explore the vast creations of this map, plow your way through mobs, and complete the exciting story!! There are a bunch of things you can do in this action packed Zelda map! Who can defeat the evil Ganondorf? Hope you all enjoy this map. Share it with your friends!!

title: 10 Sofa Ideas
text:
Here are a bunch of awesome sofa designs which should provide you some great inspiration when designing one of your houses in Minecraft.

• Most ideas by DaphneElaine
• Map by jhomes

title: Fancy Invaders - PvP
text:
Fancy Invaders is a small and fun PvP map for up to four players. It works much similar to hunger games maps but the size is much smaller. Not only does the map look really cool but it also got some hidden surprises like the three imprisoned ghasts which can be set free by players.

There are two versions available for download.

• Original version
• Fixed version (Only summon ghasts when you press the button.)

In the original version, ghasts may be released when the map starts.

title: SG Murder Mystery (v3.2)
text:
Murder Mystery is an exciting minigame for 5 players or more. (But now you can also set the mode for less than 5 players.) As soon as the game has started one of the players will be selected as the murderer. Their goal is to eliminate all other players in the game preferably without being detected. The other players have to avoid the murderer at all cost, or obtain a bow to take down the murderer themselves.

# Credits

• SkyGames: Pack Maker, Coder, Feature Designer, and Tester

# What's new in v3.2?

• New lobby (Hypixel)
• AFK player bypass
• Spectator mode
• New player count method
• Under 5 player mode
• Shows alive player name
• Tweaked the commands, made the map less laggy

title: Ravine House
text:
This map features a small three-storey house hanging over the top of the ravine.

It would be fun to start a new adventure from this house...

title: BATTLEFRONT 1914 - PvP
text:
World War came! Are you ready for the fight? Capture enemy bases and win the war!

# Objective

• The team (red vs blue) that captures A and B first wins.

title: Skyblox Survival
text:
This is a kind of skyblock survival map where you have to survive on three islands floating above the sky.

The main goal of this map is to go to the end dimension and kill the dragon.

title: Bikini Bottom (SpongeBob)
text: Bikini Bottom is the city and main setting for the SpongeBob SquarePants animated TV series. This map includes everything from SpongeBob’s own pineapple house to the Bikini Bottom Mall. If you’ve ever watched it on TV then we can guarantee you will find many similarities to this Minecraft Pocket Edition map.  To really get in a SpongeBob mood we recommend that you download a SpongeBob skin!

title: Run Away
text:
Run Away is a minigame where you are in a constant battle for time. The floor under you will disappear as you move through the obstacles.

Your objective is to get to the end of the obstacle course. You can step on the gold blocks to get a checkpoint.

title: Lucky Blocks Race (v4)
text:
Lucky Blocks Race is a fun minigame where up to 4 players can race together.
You must break the lucky blocks on the track before moving further down the track. 
Whenever you destroy Lucky blocks, you will see unexpected events.
You can reset the game from within the world after playing a round.

# What’s new in v4?

• You can now change the gamemode to Creative in the command blocks area.
• Bug fixes

# Creator

• Twitter: @Effecto

title: 6 Levels Parkour
text:
This is a simple parkour minigame map where you can test your parkour skills through 6 courses in the abandoned caves.
Each course is not very difficult on average, so it is suitable for beginners.

title: Gold Rush - An Archery Adventure
text: Gold Rush is an archery minigame created by Geoman. The overall goal of the map is to transport a minecart with gold through the mine to the town bank. To do this the player must complete all 15 archery levels that include a variety of archery targets and challenges.

title: Paradise Survival Home
text:
It is a well-decorated survival base map. Happy Survival!

# Features

• Trap is installed at the main gate.
• Animal Farm
• Wheat, carrot farm
• Big dog house
• Wooden house
• Nether Portal
• And more!

title: Evasion (Updated)
text:
Evasion is an adventure puzzle map which takes place in a maximum security prison. You were sent there after you got a little overconfident and decided to rob the National Bank of Minecraft. The objective at hand is to solve puzzles and make trades with other inmates to one day be able to escape the prison and reunite with your old gang on the outside. It’s definitely a fun experience and it’s supposedly based off a popular game called The Escapist.

# What have been updated?

• Added more toothbrushes to fix bug where you can’t teleport to water pipes puzzle
• Prisoner / guard name tags have been fixed
• Storage key card not popping out has been fixed.
• Gamemode changed to survival mode

# Creators

• GameFreak101YT, De Coolerd, captainfour4

title: KeepJumping
text: To survive this map there is just one thing you have to remember and that is to Keep Jumping! To get from start to finish you need to jump on pressure plates. Once you’ve stood on a pressure plate it will make the block beneath it disappear. This means you’ve always gotta keep moving. It’s a perfect map for anyone who’s up for a hard and intense challenge.

title: Black Ops 3: Fringe
text: This is a recreation in Minecraft of Fringe which is a popular multiplayer map in Call of Duty: Black Ops III. It features an old and forgotten town located next to a space launch facility, supposedly somewhere in Southern California. You can use this for pretty much anything, but it would probably be most suitable for PvP.

title: Hello Neighbor Map
text: This map is a recreation of the horror game hello neighbor.

title: FNAF
text: Welcome to the best Five Nights at Freddy's map ever made for Minecraft Bedrock engines. This is a 5 player map that can be played with 3 or 4. 1 player is the security guard and the others are animatronics, security guard watches animatronics on cameras and shut the doors to his room if they get too close. Survive, use doors as little as possible and Have Fun.

title: Apollo 18, Return to the Moon!
text: This is a short adventure map in which you’ll play as an astronaut who will be going on a short journey to the International Space Station (ISS), explore the Moon and then return back to Earth.

title: Rainbow Road (4.5)
text:
This is a very famous roller coaster map, Rainbow Road 4.5.
There are so many roller coaster tracks, and beautiful colors for each track make your eyes happy.

Don't miss a hidden track!

title: Herobrine Mansion PE
text:
Herobrine is the subject of a community-made creepypasta. He is one of the major community icons of Minecraft. Herobrine has not been present in any version of Minecraft.
This map was created for the PC version and ported to PE version by Ailtongn.
Unfortunately, the adventure game story is not available in PE version.
Just enjoy it as a creation.

title: Land Of Asuna
text: Land of Asuna map is a small town in Japan. On the map you will find the magnificent city in the Japanese style, all the buildings are made very carefully and realistically.

title: Parkour In A Rubix's Cube
text: In this map you have to parkour inside of a Rubix's Cube

title: Lost Forest Hide and Seek
text: This is an informal hide and seek map from Kidsource. It features an automatic counter and custom team armor. There are also tons of hiding spots to choose from.

title: 1v1 Parkour
text:
This is a fun parkour map that you can compete with your friend.

This map has a total of 7 levels all of them get progressively more difficult and longer.

• Rainbow (Easy)
• Wood (Easy)
• Ores (Medium)
• Ice (Medium)
• End (Hard)
• Nether (Hard)
• Quartz (Very Hard)

title: Hidden Buttons
text:
Hidden Buttons / Find the Button is a popular, fun and challenging mini game wherein you need to find a button per level to complete the level and the map itself. This map has 8 levels and uses command blocks. You must be on version 1.1.0

Hope you enjoy :)

title: TNT Run: Smooth Edition
text:
Play TNT Run with one of your friends or make a championship battle with this map since it is a World Template, you can restart the map infinitely!

# Features

• Changeable player side color(Red, Green, Blue, Yellow)
• Ready and Cancel buttons
• User friendly
• 67x67 to run in

# Requirements

• Maximum chunk view settings
• Minecraft PE 1.1

title: Effects Parkour
text: Effects Parkour is a fun and challenging parkour map where you get a different status effect depending on what block you stand on.

title: Igloo Village
text: This map was created as a concept for the idea to add a new type of snow village consisting of igloos and ice temples to Minecraft Pocket Edition. It’s by no means an official feature but it’s nonetheless a really good idea, especially if there was some inuit people inhabiting the village. Not only is it a cool idea but it’s also a great map which can be used for your next survival adventure.

title: Best Parkour
text: This is a map called Best Parkour with 25 levels.

title: Steampunk Moving City
text:
This map features a steampunk-ish city that looks like it can be moved with its legs.

There are two versions available for download.

• CSPE Shaders applied version
• Flat map version

# Creators

• Original Map: PixelGamePL
• Ported by: TheMrjoojo

title: SkyWars: 4 Different Maps
text:
SkyWars World: 4 Different Maps!

This map contains four different SkyWare maps.

• TNTs
• Ships
• Stones
• Air balloons

title: Modern Shopping Mall
text:
This amazing shopping mall, which the main wing was ported from Kerelis, is huge. I expanded the IKEA, giving it a warehouse. I also added a subway system, a Mc. Donalds drive thru, expanded the underground and above ground parking, added a new wing (to the back left), a back parking lot, a two level outdoor shopping building (sorta like an outlet shopping center; its not connected to the mall but it is on the west of the parking lot), and removed trees that took up too much space.
There are 100+ stores!

# Texture Pack used in screenshots

• Flow's HD (32x32)

# Choose one of the following and download it.

• McWorld + Texture : McWorld with Flow's HD texture pack applied
• McWorld : Original Map

title: Los Dangeles
text:
Los Dangeles is an amazing Minecraft city created by a popular YouTuber by the name of Dan Lags. It’s one of those few cities which would literally take days to fully explore because of the incredible amount of details. Each building is really a masterpiece and that’s why it isn’t that surprising it took him nearly four years to build.

# Creator

• XBox Version: Dan Lags
• Ported by: ModzCraft101

title: Elegant Elevator
text: Compared to other command blocks or piston elevators, it works with very smooth animations.

title: Mushroom Village
text: In this map you can experience how a mushroom village might look like.

title: Stages of Minecraft
text: This is a unique and fun parkour map. The parkour courses of this map are made up of the stages that most players experience in Survival mode in Minecraft.

title: Hobbit Hole
text:
Hobbit-hole is the common word for the homes in the Shire where the hobbits live in The Lord of the Rings. They are holes which are dug into the hill side and are easily recognizable because of their rounded entrance doors.

In this map you will experience as close as you can get to a Minecraft version of a hobbit-hole. It looks very cozy and can serve as the perfect place to start out in your next adventures in Minecraft.

Texture: Paper Cut-Out Texture Pack

title: Party Games Minigames
text:
Party Games Minigames

• Includes over 15 innovative and fun minigames
• Recommended number of players: 2-6
• Includes Turf Wars, Parkour, Hurdles, Boat Racing, Sand Pit.....
• A must to play my other minigame map if you enjoyed this one. It is twice bigger and better XD

title: Buoyzure - Adventure Map
text:
Buoyzure is a huge and epic adventure map where you play as Griffin Engel who lives in a land of which community you wish to save from a deadly curse which has taken over almost completely.

The only left to save them are you. Are you going to let your family, relatives and friends down or will you fight until you can no longer stand to make sure the curse is gone?

The map is designed for one person but if you want it can be played with 2 players too, but that’s considered a maximum. When you start the map you will first and foremost be able to see all the rules.

title: LD TNT Escape
text: This is an exciting minigame map where you have to escape from the exploding TNT that are summoned to where you are and run to the destination point.

title: Oakwood High School
text:
Welcome to Oakwood High School!

This school is not finished yet. When finished it will have: 

• 58 Furnished Classrooms For All Subjects(8 Science Labs) 
• Gym 
• Library/Media Center 
• 2 Courtyards 
• 3 Floors 

The world also has a town house and an unfinished house.

Note: There may be a huge lack depending on your device.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: SG Snowball Brawl
text:
Snowball Brawl is a minigame similar to Turf Wars where two competing teams throw snowballs at each other to gain turf space.

# How to play?

Find and press the Play button to start the Snowball Brawl minigame. (Or have some fun searching for the 4 hidden levers somewhere in the lobby.)
Dig up snowballs and throw them at the other team to gain points which also results in your team’s turf expanding.

title: Parkour Ekstremal
text: This is a parkour map consisting of 12 short stages with unique themes.

title: Monopoly
text:
This is a map based on the Board Game called “Monopoly”.

There are lots and lots of Cities to Own and to Pay for.

This map Requires 1 Dice, 2 players and 1 Banker and a Maximum of 2 Dice (in real life), 8 players and 8 Bankers.

title: Pokémon Stadium
text:
This is a Pokémon Stadium based on the popular media franchise "Pokémon".

It can be used for PvP, or it is better suited for use with the Pokemon add-on.

title: Everyone Run
text:
Everyone Run is a minigame speed run map which can be played by as many players you want. The obstacles would be impossible if it wasn’t because of the speed and jump potion effects so make sure you’ve got those enabled either through potions or mods. For example, you can switch the world to creative and then add a chest filled with the necessary potion bottles.

# How to play?

This map requires at least two players (unless you want to compete against yourself of course). Once all players have spawned in the world make sure all of you got the following potion effects active: Speed V, Jump Boost V.

Then one of you should press on the button at the redstone lamp to begin the countdown. It’s entirely powered by redstone so all you have to do is just for a few seconds before starting to run.

title: Skyfall PvP
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This is a multiplayer Player vs. Player map that should move the islands in the sky to survive.
In this map, you can move between islands using the Elytra wings, Ender Pearl, and command block teleporation. There are useful items on each island so make good use of it.
If all the other players die and you survive, you win.

title: SumoPE - PvP
text:
SumoPE is a PvP minigame where there are some extra effects which help influence the gameplay. Before starting you can choose between several different effects which can either prove detrimental or helpful for your survival. This game is best played with at least two players, but preferably more.

# How to play?

Your objective is to knock your opponents off a platform. You can’t cause any major damage to your opponent. The only way to win over them is to knock them off the platform.

# Rules

• Everyone must have at least the following weapons: Stone Sword (Knockback 2, Unbreaking 3), Bow (Punch 2, Infinity 1, Unbreaking 3)
• Don’t start the game until everyone are inside the arena
• Don’t PvP in the lobby
• Read all signs for rules

title: Command Block Train
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map contains working train that you can drive. It was created using command blocks.

# How does it work?

To drive the train, you need to enter the engine room. Then step on the pressure plate on the command block. After you do that, the train will move a little bit forward. Then replace the stone pressure plate on the command block with a new one.
You will need to continue to step on the pressure plate to make it continue moving forward.

I do not know why, but sometimes it does not work.
If so, follow these steps as an alternative:

1. Remove the stone pressure plate above the command block.
2. Connect the front pressure plate and command block with redstone.
3. Now keep moving toward the front pressure plate and the train will move forward.
4. Tap on the last picture to view it in video.

Wanna view it from outside? Get another player into drive while you watch it!
Have a safe journey!

title: Island Wars
text:
Island Wars is a multiplayer map suitable for 2-10 players. There are two different teams (blue vs red) and each team will spawn on their own island. Every so often there will be chests spawning on your islands with the weapons you will need to take down the enemy team. There are 8 different weapons and each one work a little bit different.

# How to play?

Every 30 seconds, 3 chests will be placed on each island containing different weapons. You can take the weapons you want, but you have to be careful that the opponent don’t attack you. Get together with your team to come up with a strategy to eliminate the enemy team.

Warning: All in-game instructions are in Spanish / Portuguese!

title: Half Heart Survival 2
text:
The objective of the map is to complete 10 levels of parkour without dying. There are no checkpoints so this will most likely be one of the hardest parkour maps you ever play. And to make things even harder your health has been reduced to one half heart. One wrong step and you are dead and have to start over.

How to play?

As soon as you’ve loaded the world make sure that there is a behavior pack enabled. Go to Settings and then press the Behavior Packs button to check this.

The included addon sets your health to one half heart. Your health isn’t visible in the interface for unknown reasons but it works fine anyways.

title: Bedwars by Blade
text:
This is a map called Bedwars that can play with your friends.

The goal of the game is to defeat the other teams.
Destroy other teams beds so that they cannot spawn after death.
Once all other teams beds are destroyed and players defeated, you win!

# How to play?

• After joining a game, you need to select a team.
• You have to get your recourses from little islands in the air. 
• You can trade with villagers to purchase the items or blocks you need.

# Coordinates

• /tp 114 69 147 (Orange)
• /tp 111 69 248 (Green)
• /tp 154 68 197 (Red)
• /tp 69 68 202 (Blue)

# Rules

• Only break player built blocks
• No killing the NPCs (unless Animal)
• You cannot respawn once your bed is destroyed
• Only use commands listed (/tp, /op, /spawnpoint, /give)
• No cheating
• Play on hard

Enjoy!

title: Bedwars Map - 4v4
text:
This is a fun multiplayer mini-game where up to eight players can compete against each other in a team match.

* You can enjoy up to 8 players, but 2 or 4 players are recommended.

# How to play?

1. Select a team. (Red or White)
2. Sleep in a bed (Each team has a respawn bed on their island)
3. Mine emerald blocks to buy items or upgrades for you or your team.
4. Get the items you need through trade with villagers.
5. Break the opponent's beds.

# Objective

If your team's bed is destroyed, you can no longer respawn. Defend your bed to survive and destroy other team's bed and kill them to win!

# Tips

• If you fall down from the island, you can go up again by using the water.
• In the middle island, logs, diamonds, iron, and gold can be mined indefinitely.
• Press the Trader Change button to trade with other villagers
• Villagers can unlock new offers when an existing offer is traded.

This update focuses of working on under-developed areas, making the whole city fell stronger and more complete. Also, finally, the long awaited downtown has began and will continue to be my primary focus through the next few updates. The good news about upcoming updates is that since school is coming to an end, I will be able to make more grand updates and have them come out more frequently! Be sure to stay tuned!

# How to play

Each level have two room and you have to remember anything in the room to find the different (or differents). But if you choose wrong, you will die and the map will destory!

# Rules

• Do not replace or break blocks
• Do not cheat
• Play on survival and peaceful

Hope you enjoy!

title: Ledsea Town Survival

Try to find all of the Chest And Finish the Lost Note!

• Find The Cursed Statue!

Self Mining Robot (Command Block Creations)

This is a clever and fun command block creation map. In this map, you can use a self mining robot and a machine that automatically collects the mined resources.

This is a Space PvP, mechanical has very entertaining as the use of automatic potions.
It also has an impressive and giant decoration.
It has a small parkour.

# Creator

title: RP Town (v3)
text:
This map features a town with a school and houses. There is a café, a restaurant, a bookstore, a clothing store, and a mart.

# What's new?

• A Mall (PusheenMart)
• 5 New Houses
• Some new shops
• Added some blocks

title: TNT Rain PvP Arena
text:
This is a PvP map where you can fight against other players with enchanted bow and TNT.

# Instruction

1. Pick a bow, an arrow and boots
2. Enchants a bow and boots. (if you enchant a bow, push button with a bow)
3. Choose your side
4. Play with your friends

Tap the picture below to preview how you can enchant them.

# How to PvP in this map?

• Shoot another player with flaming bow.
• Shoot the TNT on the ceiling. Then it falls and explodes.

# Rules

• TNT button for restart all tnt
• Bone button for kill all players and restart the game

title: Scientists Mob Lab
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This map features a facility that allows you to experiment with mobs.

The objective is to test all the new technology that your team of scientists have created.

* Original world name is "20 Ways To Die".

title: Candy Kingdom (Adventure Time)
text: Candy Kingdom from adventure time (princess bubblegum not included)

title: DarkLegends
text: DarkLegends is a really cool and secure base which is entirely powered by redstone. There are tons of redstone functionalities to explore within the base. Everything from automated doors to advance machines like an automated potion brewing system and a really easy-to-use wardrobe. And since it’s built in an ordinary world it’s perfect to use for your next survival adventure!

title: Scarox-Class Corvette
text:
Scarox-Class Corvette by SkallordHD

It's a fabulous spaceship creation.

title: 10,000 Fireworks
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

Welcome to the 10,000 Fireworks Graphic Test! This adventure style map was built to test the graphics / CPU limits of your device. Using a complex system of redstone, repeaters, dispensers and fireworks, this map will launch a total of 18,194 fireworks, in less than 45 seconds – that is of course if your device can render it correctly. Over 95% of devices will fail.

# Testing Your Graphics / CPU Limits

This map may make the app force quite; this is normal, and why they built it. This map wasn’t built to be playable; it was meant to test the capabilities of your device. This map averages 50 FPS on an average device, and drops to 2 FPS when you activate the fireworks. The game will run smooth when you explore the hub but lag is pretty much unavoidable once it all begins.

# Creators

• Archelous, CaptianCamera

title: Bullworth Academy
text:
This map feature the whole school with interiors.

• Main Building
• Dorm
• Library
• Auto Repair Shop
• Harrington House
• Gym
• Observatory
• Football Pitch

# Creators

• Java Edition: Nickaro
• Ported by: Themrjoojo

title: Redstone Woodland Mansion (v1.2)
text:
This is a Woodland Mansion which has been naturally generated and then had the rooms replaced by 17+ different redstone contraptions.

# What's new in v1.2?

• Added twice as many new redstone contraptions

title: Slime Dimension
text: This is a great map that will send you to the dimension of the slime. But it will not be easy to defeat slimes and conquer them. * Tip: At the top of the slime dimension are TNT blocks that can blow out the dimension.

title: Mined Prison: Darkest Secrets (Chapter 5)
text:
Mined Prison: Dark Secrets is the fifth map in a very popular adventure map series. Once again you find yourself in a bit of trouble. The group whose mission was to take down the corrupt system of the prison has been captured and everything you once had is long gone.

Do you have what it takes to bring things back to order and perhaps finally get out of this mess? We’ll see about that as you try to complete a series of different challenges ranging from parkour to puzzles.

# Rules
•Don’t break or place blocks (exception: torches, monster spawners)
•Turn volume to 100%
•Collect emeralds, they are like extra points
•Set difficulty to max

# Previous Maps
• Mined Prison 1: The Beginning
• Mined Prison 2: Test Subject
• Mined Prison 3: Secret Service
• Mined Prison 4: Training Complete

title: Don’t Jump
text: In this map you can’t jump. This is a complete new challenge for you. Even if you try to jump you will immediately die so you literally can’t jump. There are 10 different levels and each one is like a small puzzle as sometimes you will be required to push a piston or similar to proceed.

title: Rugged Jungle Mansion
text: This mansion is the perfect base for anyone who want to own their own huge mansion situated in a jungle. It has lots of room to fit plenty of people. One unusual (but a bit funny) part of the house is a village which is situated on the inside of the house. Yes, this sounds a bit strange but that’s the case. At least then you are never alone as you will always have villagers around you.

title: TNT Run (v2.0)
text:
TNT Run is a fun minigame which can either be played in single player or as a group in multiplayer. Either way, it’s a very intense minigame which takes place on a big platform made out of pressure plates, sand blocks and TNTs. Players have to run around on the platform to avoid falling down. The last person standing is the winner.

After a round of playing most of the platform will be destroyed. It is automatically reset as soon as a new game is started.

# What's new in v2.0?

• Added lava map
• Survival point
• Lobby has been changed

title: Piston Perfect
text: This is a Perfect piston puzzle map for all you piston lovers. The objective of this map is to use the pistons to get the sand in the hole.

title: FNaF: Sister Location – Night 2
text: This is the second map in its series which lets you play through the second night of Five Nights at Freddy’s: Sister Location in Minecraft. Five Night of Freddy’s is one of the top horror games out there, so it’s really nice to see parts of it transformed into a Minecraft version. The map got some really nice game mechanics such as the narrated voice which will guide you through the adventure.

title: Huge Modern Mansion
text:
This map features a big modern mansion. It has loads of luxurious things most of you probably can only dream of. Some including a basketball court, multiple swimming pools and enough rooms to host an entire tribe of villagers. It’s the perfect start out point if you want to live as a wealthy miner in the world of Minecraft. The entire mansion is surrounded by a big wall so you don’t have to worry about any monsters either.

Texture Pack: Frenden’s Meringued Cartoon Pack

title: Giant Blocks Parkour
text: This is a fun mini-game map that aims to complete the pakrour courses in 18 different giant blocks.

title: Dropper IB
text: Dropper IB is minigame with four different levels. Even though it’s a fairly small map it’s definitely worth to play if you enjoy dropper maps.

title: Private Peninsula Mansion
text:
This map features a modern private peninsula mansion. If you can play this map with a high-end device, it's best to use a modern-style texture pack.

# Creators

• Java Edition: MaxKim
• Ported by: SkallordHD

title: Cloud Fortress
text:
Cloud Fortress – Another floating castle made from ice and wool, not decorated on the inside!

Enjoy!

There are two versions available for download.

• SSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: The Witch’s Mansion Escape
text: The Witch’s Mansion Escape is an adventure map where you wake up finding yourself locked up in a room of a mansion which belongs to an evil witch. Buttons, levers and other redstone triggers can be found hidden on different places in the mansion. It’s your objective to find them and find a way to escape. Just be careful because if you use the redstone triggers unwisely it’s possible you will be stuck in the mansion for all eternity.

title: Gaturro’s Room
text: Gaturro’s Room is built in a similar style to the Toy Story 2 map where you can experience a very realistic room much larger than yourself, but because it’s much larger, it looks way more realistic.

title: Ninja Warrior Parkour Map
text:
Ninja Warrior Parkour Map by Capitalsfan92

There are 4 stages of difficult obstacles.
Complete all 4 stages for Total Victory.

title: Mesaville
text:
Mesaville is more than a village as it features everything from a naval base to impressive strongholds and other cool structures.

The uses for this map are many. For example, you could start a new survival adventure using this map, or you could just download it to explore all the different things in the map.

# What's new?

• Reduced torches and other lighting blocks in older parts of the build by over 50%.
• Created a Mayan Temple with an End Portal at it\’s heart (The End is currently unvisited)
• Created a Fortified wall around the top of a mesa, and built a +/- 45 structure village inside.
• Created a livestock farm and stables next to the village. Each stable contains a horse, saddle, diamond armour and wheat.
• One of the houses in the village contains supplies, furnaces, workbench and enchanting module that would be useful if this map is played in survival

title: FNAF 2
text:
Welcome back to Five Nights at Freddy's by Awsomegaming64. Play 5 player FNAF in Minecraft again at a cooler new location and don't worry, you'll be fine ;) .
(Check out FNAF the previos map)

title: SkyWars Village
text:
This is a kind of SkyWars map, consisting of 8 islands and a big island in the middle.
Each island has a small village and a chest filled with items.
This map can be played up to 8 players.

# How to play?

• Each player chooses one of eight small islands and moves there (in creative mode).
• When all players are ready, switch to survival mode and start the game.

SkyWars is a multiplayer mini-game map that you have to fight against other players in the islands above the sky.

# Creator

• YouTube: WsyCraft GAMEPLAYS
• Twitter: wsycraft96

* The signs in the map are in Portuguese, but it's not much to worry about.

title: A Minecraft White House
text:
Have you wanted to ever pretend that you live in the White House? That you are the most powerful person in the world? Well, in role-play that is possible at White House in Minecraft PE. Explore the meticulously recreated West Wing, the Residence, etc. 
I advise that you use a natural resource/texture pack. There are many online for free and Microsoft do sell them in the Minecraft PE Store.
This map is currently under development. The East Wing and Rose Garden require construction. Some areas of the interior aren’t completed. 
I hope you enjoy exploring. 
Creator: TheCrazyTitan

# What's new?

• Extensive landscaping
• Rose Garden
• Front Lawn (and fountain)
• Porter house
• West wing roads
• The famous gates

title: Giant Working Crafting Table
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

This is a giant fully working crafting table which can be used for crafting most items and blocks. It doesn’t work that much different from an ordinary crafting table except that it is maybe 20 times bigger and is entirely powered by redstone and command blocks. It’s a really cool redstone creation definitely worth checking out. The most interesting part is probably to try to understand how the machine works.

Tap the first and last picture below to preview how it works.

title: Midtown
text: A great place to explore and bring your friends along. From thirty different yachts (with interiors,) a rollercoaster, three different hotels, along with a cruise ship and Saturn V rocket, to 2 mighty Airbus A380’s, four houses and so much more, this map has it all.

title: Redstone Elevator
text:
A five story elevator that is controlled by a item frame.

The method is simple. Hit the arrow to select the desired floor, get on the elevator and press the button.

* Texture pack used : Defscape Texture Pack

title: The Quests - Puzzle Map
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

The Quests is a puzzle map which uses command blocks.
There are 8 different levels. For the last mission, you will even go to Mars!
Have Fun!

title: SG Farm Fighters
text: SG Farm Fighters is a strategy game where your objective is to kill the animals on the farm. If you complete all achievements then you will unlock an extra challenge. You can play this map both in multiplayer and in single player mode. To win the game you must reach 100 points!

title: Team Fortress 2: Capture The Intelligence
text:
Team Fortress 2: Capture The Intelligence

This map is a multiplayer minigame that recreated Team Fortress 2 in Minecraft.

Team Fortress 2 is the first person shooter game on Steam. Capture The Intelligence is the first mode of Team Fortress 2.

# How to play?

There are 2 fortresses, you have to kill all the players on the other team. The team that captured intelligence wins. If a team wins, the team's beacon will light up.

More information can be found at the Academy in the map.

title: Floder Up (v2.0)
text:
This is a short parkour map that contains 3 levels.

Level 1. Overcome obstacles in the sky
Level 2. Run with speed effect in the Nether
Level 3. Run with speed effect in the sky

# Rules

• Play in survival mode
• Don’t break/place blocks unless told so

title: The Bunny Battle
text:
The Bunny Battle map is a really cute and fun adventure. The story is wonderful and the gameplay is great. It’s definitely a new take on adventure map stories worth exploring.

# Story

Evil bunnies have decided to steal all the carrots in the world. They have already imprisoned many villagers and taken over their villages. Their next step in their evil master plan is to take over your carrot farm. It’s up to you to stop them before something really bad happens to the world!

# Creators

• EaterComputer, CrispyDiamondMC

title: Redstone Wave Machine
text: A redstone wave is absolutely useless but it’s really eye-pleasing to look at. It’s like an installation of art using minecarts, pistons and redstone.

title: The KILLER
text: Your daughter was just killed by someone! Now you must find the murderer and avenge her! Solve various puzzles and quests on your journey to the murderer's location!

title: Spaceflight (Beta)
text: This map features the International Space Station, the Hubble Space Telescope, a Saturn V rocket, a Delta IV rocket, the Space Shuttle and launch towers for each rocket. All of the space structures have custom interiors which have been realistically designed to include the mission hardware and other things you’d expect.  It’s a very realistic map (for being Minecraft) and perfect for any NASA or space enthusiasts out there!

title: Note Block Game Sounds
text:
This map contains five different redstone creations which can be used to play sounds from famous video games.

• Super Mario
• Tetris
• We are number one!
• Heatens!
• Pink Fluffy Unicorns

title: SkyWars The End
text: Skywars The End is a player versus player map situated high up in the sky. There are more than ten different floating islands which means there are plenty of room for many players to be playing at once competing against each other.

title: Find The Button Remade
text: This map lets you go through 10 challenging levels. In each level you will be tasked with the objective to find a hidden button.

title: SG Pocket Expansion
text:
SG Pocket Expansion is basically a new survival gamemode where you must survive in the sky in an ever-expanding environment.

The world terrain generation works very from vanilla though. Random blocks will randomly appear around you. Other randomized generations include spawned mobs and skyblock islands. This is considered one of the toughest survival challenges in Minecraft!

# Creator

• Original Java Map by: JUSTCAMH
• Bedrock Edition: SkyGames Team

title: Prince Island
text:
Prince Island - Modern Wooden Village by Ecebs

There are 4 houses in map. Explore the islands and decide which one is better.

title: Mountain Sky Village
text:
This map was created for the CubCon Server Network (a different version is used there for Hunger Games). It is a wonderful Sky Village with custom terrain.
All the houses that you see are connected with each other (through the mountains).

The map was 50% created by QWERTI10 and 50% by McBreakdown. And it was ported by T.R.X

# Recommended Shaders

• RSPE Shaders

# Bugs

• Sometimes block spawn on sky
• Sometimes grass become black

If you don't mind the bugs mentioned above, download it!

title: Rainbow City Parkour
text:
Your mission is to collect diamonds hidden in the city!
Everything what you need to know is in map!

Are you good in parkour? Download this map and test your skils!

title: Prison 6.5
text:
This is a prison map which can be used for roleplays, cops and robbers, prison escape or any other time when you need a prison.

# What's new in v6.5?

• New sniper rifle
• New prisoners
• Added an infirmary

And more!

title: Sky Levitation - PvP
text: Sky Levitation is a multiplayer map which combines skyblock PvP with levitation. There are a bunch of different islands and on each one you will find a chest with some gear, weapons and food. But that’s not all. You will also find a pressure plate which will give you a temporary levitation effect. Use this effect to access the other islands, loot items and ultimately slay your enemies.

title: Defeat The Concrete PE
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

Defeat The Conrete is a parkour map with 16 different levels and the main objective is to complete the victory monument. It’s a quite challenging map and at times even raging. But that is of course also dependent on your own skill level.

* The map itself includes a trailer.

title: The Doors
text: The Doors is a redstone alternative parkour map with multiple challengable objects ahead.

title: Stark's Mansion
text:
Tony Stark's Mansion was the private residence of billionaire philanthropist, and public superhero Tony Stark/Iron Man, located on a sea-side cliff along the coast of Malibu, California.

If you use the optional resource & behavior pack (Iron Man Add-ons by Steam Boy), you can spawn the Villagers and make them look like they are guarding your home.

Originally created by ItzNightWolf on PC Minecraft, and ported to PE version by Themrjoojo.

title: King of The Ladder
text:
King of The Ladder is a multiplayer mini-game that you can enjoy with your friends.

# How to play

• You will need 2-4 players for this game.
• The goal is to reach the top of the tower by climbing and doing parkour
• You and your friends will try to prevent each other from reaching the top by shooting them down or killing them.
• Your end goal is to reach the top first before your friends.

# Rules

• If your gear breaks or you run out of arrows you are allowed to give your self more
• No creative/flying
• No giving yourself any extra items
• No Breaking blocks
• No shooting or killing when you are on the floor,you can only kill when you are on the ladder(You can shoot from the ladder to the floor and shoot from the floor to the ladder)

Have fun!

# Creator

• YouTube: SgTRyanG

title: Prison Escape: Doom
text:
It's about breaking out the prison!

# Story

You are trapped in an old prison for the crime you didnt committed!
You don't know that who told the police about you being a robber!
You want to escape.

title: Ina Modern Mansion
text:
The building of this mansion is not perfect yet, it takes an additional only in its interior only.

There are two versions available for download.

• SSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: Don't Question it
text: This is a simple and easy puzzle map. In this map you are given a total of 10 levels to complete. Main task don't Question it.

title: Rexzy’s Village
text:
Rexzy’s Village is located in an alpine forest. It’s a medieval styled village with multiple clock towers, churches and homes of varying sizes. It work perfectly for a survival type of gameplay if you want to live in a village and feel more secure rather than living out in the woods all by yourself.

# Creator

• Twitter: @RexzyRey
• YouTube: xRexzyReyx

title: DC vs Marvel Map
text:
Welcome to the DC vs Marvel Battle arena! 
The fate of two universes depends on how you play! Choose fighters from DC or Marvel and fight to claim victory over your friends!
This epic map features many heroes from both universes, and 7 stages. Once your fighter runs out of items, they're not playable until you redownload the map.

# Rules

• No breaking blocks
• Only take 1 set of everything per battle.

title: SG Parkour Pounce
text:
This is a multiplayer parkour map where you’ll compete against friends in randomized parkour courses.

# Features

• Parkour courses are randomly selected every round.
• Big scoreboard with a counter displaying the current scores.

title: Olann Island PE
text:
Olann Island is a theme park map created by Enmah and ported to pocket edition by spl1tr.
It features a roller coaster casino on the beachfront and a water slide.

Hope you enjoy.

You can download the following four versions of the map and one texture pack.

# Map (McWorld)

There are two world-type versions with the Xaiwaker texture pack.

• Infinite World Type + Xaiwaker
• Old World Type + Xaiwaker

There are two world-type versions without texture packs.

• Infinite World Type 
• Old World Type (less lag)

# Texture Pack (Resource Pack)

This is the recommended texture pack for this map.

• Xaiwaker Texture Pack.

title: Survival++ Adventure
text:
This map takes place on an abandoned island where you play as a character who have been shipwrecked there and have to find whatever ways you can to survive. There are structures left on the island but there are no people to house them. All of it is like a huge mystery but an answer to it can not be certain.

#Storyline

You’ve been out for months sailing the seas and exploring the world but one day all hell broke loose. A raging storm destroyed your ship and soon you find yourself floating on some broken pieces of wood in the middle of the ocean. Luckily you notice something in the far distance stretching above the horizon. An island.. you’re saved!

# Creators

• Map by: Skyriad (PC version)
• Map ported by: Hyphona
• Addon by: Hyphona

title: MagmaRun
text: MagmaRun is a minigame in which your objective is to escape the Magma Blocks which slowly start filling the path behind. There are three different difficulty settings which you can change in the game lobby. All throughout the obstacle course there are different colors which each symbolize a different potion effect. You can play this map both in single player and in multiplayer mode.

title: SG Dreaming Part 3 (Horror)
text: This is the third and final installment of the Dreaming horror map experiences. This time you’ll find yourself in some kind of underground bunker or recovery facility. Your objective is to find a way out and escape. Is this real.. or are you just stuck in another dream? This map includes an interesting story as well as multiple different scares.

title: Mini Magic: Night Star
text:
This is a fantasy adventure map where you play as character who for months have been training to reach the highest level of Magician and today is your final test.

# Storyline

You’ve been in training for years to reach the highest level of Magician called Mini Magician. Yesterday you finally completed the exams and went to bed wondering how you did. However, when you wake up you have a note in front of you which explains the situation. “This is the final test. If you want to be a Mega Magician, you must infiltrate the Lavonic Fortress and retrieve the Night Star before the Witharo figures out how to use it!

title: Crack The Puzzle
text:
This is a fun puzzle map where you have to solve puzzles using your brain and knowledge of Minecraft.
At each level you have to find a way out of the room!

# Creator

• Twitter: @Creeper_Sky

title: Command Blocks Trap
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map features fun stuff you can do with command blocks!

If you don't want the spoilers, don't tap the pictures below.

title: Hide and Seek: Bedroom
text:
This is a fun hide-and-seek minigame taking place in a huge bedroom. It looks quite realistic and it will feel as if you are an ant in a huge world.

# How to play?

This map requires at least 2 players but can be played with as many players you want. At least one of the players has to be a seeker.

• The hiders should enter the bedroom and find a good hiding place.
• The seeker should jump into the cobweb and wait to pass through (don’t break the cobweb). Once the seeker has passed through the cobweb he or she can start looking for other players.

title: Burning Animals
text:
Super fan map like Pat and Jen do it's just like that but in PE and really fun with custom kits and more!

# How to play?

• Choose a kit
• Enter the map by selecting one animal.
• Press the Start button to start burning.
• Survive longer than your friends.
• The last surviving player wins.

# Creator

• YouTube: YLo

title: Spider Boss Fight
text:
It’s a fun boss fight map with a mystical feel to it.

# Storyline

Ah, another day of survival! That is, until you find an entrance to a massive spider nest, and everything goes bad. It's up to you to defend the land from Queen Venoma, a massive spider who intends to eat you and every other unsuspecting adventurer who finds themself inside of her kingdom.

title: Medieval City
text:
Start out your next adventure gameplay in a small medieval village. It’s beautifully designed with lots of cute little houses, farmland and other nicely designed structures.

It’s really the perfect map if you want to live in a city but don’t want to do the hard work of building it.

title: Welcome To The Tardis (Update 1)
text:
The map features many of the control rooms and other TARDIS areas and all of them are based on the ones in the Doctor Who TV show. You’ll start out in the Overworld at a police box and from there you can access the TARDIS!

# What's new

• Added all original Tardis rooms
• Remade the 11th Doctors Gold Control Room
• Added secrets

# Creator

• YouTube: MicroJP
• Twitter: @xXJezGamerXx
• Instagram: jeremyparamore

title: SG Xplosions (TNT Battles)
text:
In this game you can choose one of 5 custom Xplosion kits. Use their abilities to knock your enemies into the void on this randomly generating 4 island skyland!

# How to play?

Tap the portal at the beginning to start the game. The final player standing wins!

title: Cave of The Skull
text:
Welcome to cave of the skull

This is an open world and there are no rules. Explore the Skull Cave in Survival Mode, or enjoy the entire map freely in Creative Mode.

title: Zpknos Mansions
text: This map features two beautiful modern mansions.

title: Halloween Town
text:
Halloween Town is a really cool and spooky town which you must explore some time during Halloween. Here you will find many cool structures but also really scary creatures which will most likely make you not want to stay there for too long.

# Texture Pack

A texture pack (Nightmare Before Christmas) is included in the map and this will make most textures in the map look entirely different compared to without. You can also download the texture pack separately.

# Creator

• PC Version: ilikecutepeople
• Ported by: Spider_Mau744

title: Steampunk Ride
text:
In the Steampunk Roller Coaster map you get on a journey by minecart through a landscape and village inspired by steampunk. Steampunk is a genre of science fiction where usually things are powered by steam-power and the surroundings inspired by an 19th century theme.

The entire roller coaster is pretty huge and takes a long while to fully finish and absorb. If you are looking for a little adventure in an unusual world then this map could be of your liking.

title: Great Wall of China
text:
A parkour map which is creatively inspired by the great wall of China.

# Features

• Basic Jumps and Long Jumps
• 10 Courses
• Chests with Emerald BLOCKS ranging from 1-3!
• 5 Perks Tents

# Rules

• Play on peaceful
• You can only break and place perk blocks
• Any forms of cheating are not allowed
• Emeralds will be your score!

# Tip

One jump at a time, do not rush!

# Creator's Note

title: The Mystic Mansion
text:
This is a mystic adventure map which takes place in an old mansion somewhere out in a swamp far into the night. Step inside a mansion of mysteries and figure out a way to get back home. It mostly consists of mob battles. If you enjoy yourself a good mystery and some fighting then this map will be fun to play.

# Storyline

Suddenly you wake up and find yourself in an old shed somewhere out in a swamp. You have no idea why you are there or what’s going to happen but you do realize that you can’t stay in there forever. When you walk outside you see an old rusty mansion. Your immediate gut feeling tells you something is wrong but it’s the middle of the night and right now you just need somewhere safe to stay for the night.

You walk up to the door and ring the doorbell twice. The door opens and you slowly walk inside..

# Rules

• Set difficulty to hard
• Don’t break blocks
• Treat like an adventure map
• Play the map during night (wait for it to get dark)

There are two versions available for download.

• John Smith Legacy applied version (Recommended)
• Original version

title: Facility Flee (Updated)
text:
Facility Flee is a minigame recommended for 3–5 players. One will be the Beast and the rest of you will be Survivors whose main goal is to avoid the Beast and find a safe way out of the Facility. Survivors have the hardest (and sometimes most scary) objective as they have to be constantly on the lookout for the Beast who is out to get them.

The Beasts and the Survivors will spawn on two different locations and they have each different goals.

• Beast: Kill the survivors and let no one escape the facility
• Survivor: Escape the facility and find the button button near the Beast’s spawn (it’s needed for escaping)

If the Survivors win then remove the key (button) which you placed next to the iron door. If the Beast won then type /kill to go back to spawn.

title: Electric Furance
text:
This is a quite clever redstone machine which lets you build an electric furnace. The electric furnace is much better than an ordinary furnace since it doesn’t require any fuel (e.g. coal) to run. However, the downside is that it is slower than an ordinary furnace and doesn’t have the same mobility since it requires the redstone structure to be somewhere close to function properly.

# How does it work?

Turn on the machine by pushing the lever downwards. This is required in order to be able to build the electric furnace.

To build the electric furnace you will need one normal furnace block, one rail track and one minecart with hopper. Begin by first placing down the rail track. Then place the furnace on top of it. And then lastly place the minecart with hopper on the rail track.

You can now open the furnace UI (user interface) and start smelting your items. The process is slightly slower than a normal furnace, but the advantage is that you don’t need any fuel.

# Play as a minotaur

Chase after the survivors and kill them all, But be careful to protect the exit!

• Speed +1
• Custom Head

# Map Styles

Customise the map with the 6 optional themes, These change the blocks of the walls (Glass, Ice, Solid Blocks) they also change the time and centre build (The 12 block tall feature that helps when navigating through the maze!)

# What's new in this update?

• Added new themes (Nether, Sky Land, Desert, Oceania)

title: The Wall Parkour
text:
The Wall Parkour

Walls made by HerbondYT
Tony's house made by Vilaxshi

Normal Mode: Creative
Hard Mode: Survival

Hope you have fun!

If you enjoy this map, follow @herbondplaysmc on Twitter.

title: Islands of Eden
text: Islands of Eden is a survival map taking place on islands in the sky. But it’s not just survival. You will also have to find wool blocks which are required for completing a monument.

title: Zombie Castle
text:
This map contains a huge castle called Zombie Castle.
You can use it for anything from hide and seek to a PvE battle arena.

title: Untenable
text:
There are 10 levels which have been designed to make you rage. The objective for the player is to find a solution to pass each level. It’s not as easy as it may seem as there are a lot of unnecessary objectives designed to distract and waste your time. Also, the ways to pass the level may not make any sense at all. You can’t skip levels are they are chained together. Passing one level makes the next level playable. There are also hints in each level.

* If you installed the map but can not find it, scroll down the list of worlds.

title: Find The Button Classic Edition
text: This map includes 10 levels and takes somewhere around 30 minutes to complete. As a player you have to find and press the button in each level to complete it. You can either play it alone in single player or together with other players in multiplayer.

title: Camp Nou (FC Barcelona)
text:
Camp Nou is the home stadium of FC Barcelona.
The map is a recreation of Camp Nou in the Minecraft version.

# Creator

• PreFXDesigns

title: Camping On The Beach
text:
Camping On The Beach (Acampamento na Praia)
It's part 2 of the camp map series.

title: TreeHouse Survival
text: This map is perfect for anyone who’ve always wanted to live in a tree and experience an existence somewhat similar to that of Tarzan. There are plenty of houses too which means that you can bring a bunch of your friends to live with you up among the trees. None of the houses provide any furniture and blocks so that’s something you probably want to start out working on.

title: Multiplayer Skyblock
text:
Welcome to MicahTheManiac’s Skyblock: Living In The Skies Edition!
This is the Multiplayer edition.

This map was originally a modded map created in Minecraft PE version 0.10.5, but has now been converted to be compatible with version 1.1 or later. (This is no longer a modded map.)

# Features

• 2 players recommened
• 1 big dugeon
• 1 witch hut island
• 3 islands total
• Potions, Elytras, and Diamonds

title: Steve and Alex Burn It! (v1.25)
text:
This is a fun multiplayer mini-game that you can enjoy with your friends. 

This mini-game is similar to a burning house. You can choose either Steve or Alex, and lava will start burning Steve or Alex. Players must survive for as long as possible using items in the dropper.
The player who survives to the end wins.

# What's new in v1.25?

• another sign for contacting
• lava comes slower now

# Hints to next map

• Series 40 years old in 2017
• 8+ movies
• Best sci-fi out there

title: Five Nights at Freddy's
text: Five Nights at Freddy’s is in fact an indie game which was released back in August 2014. The game caught some traction and popularity and because of this (and the fact it’s a fun game) Kingbudderjr decided to create a map of it Minecraft PE.

title: Elytra Christmas
text: Elytra Christmas is a great map to play during the holidays as it’s set in a Christmas-themed environment. Put on a pair of elytra wings and get ready for some flying action. You can either play it alone or challenge some friends. The map consists of one long fixed course which includes challenges such as tunnels which you have to fly through and other obstacles.

title: Slimeblock Megaplane
text:
This is a fully functional airplane entirely made out of redstone parts and slimeblocks. It can hold up to 10 passengers and can fly for an infinite amount of time which surely makes it a fuel efficient aircraft. Use this creation as a blueprint for building a similar airplane in your own world. It’s an amazing creation but with one downside. And that is that it can only fly in one direction.

# How to use the airplane?

Follow the orange arrows to find the airplane. Replace the orange clay block at the tail of the airplane to kickstart the engine.

title: Super Parkour Challenge
text: This is a simple parkour map. It includes 40 various stages. After each stage there are cakes and 1,2,3 or 4 diamonds depending on the difficulty of the stage.

title: Smashy Road City
text:
The cell phone game Smashy Road.
We tried to build a city of the Games.

It can be a variety of content on this map.
It can also be a multiplayer mode or using a script
It can have a variety of games.

title: Adventure Parkour
text:
This is an easy and short parkour map called Adventure Parkour.

• It has only 4 levels
• You can play with your friends

# Rules

• Do not cheat
• Play on peaceful

title: Top 10 Command Block Creations (v2)
text:
This map includes 10 really cool command block creations designed specifically for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition.

# Creator

• Twitter: @M7MoGameR
• Google+: M7MoGameR
• XBox Live: M7MoGameR

# Credits

title: Player vs Mob Training Arena
text: This arena map is perfect for practicing fighting. You can spawn any type of mobs and fight many at the same time or do duel battles against just single mobs. It doesn’t really matter whether you are alone or have friends to play this map with as it’s fun practice either way. Put on some gear and train your combat skills!

title: One Night At Frankie’s Freeroam
text: This map is a horror game which is inspired by the popular Five Nights At Freddie’s video game. There have been three maps before it but this one is different. In this version you will not be limited to just cameras. No, instead you’ll be walking around inside inside Frankbear’s Pizzeria avoiding a scary animatronic.

title: Puzzle Dome
text:
This is a simple puzzle and maze map made up of four levels.

# Levels

• 1. Find the lever
• 2. Find the path
• 3. Quiz
• 4. Maze in Nether
