title: Fallen Earth
text:
# Fallen Earth

Fallen Earth is a Hardcore Complete the Monument Map. It features over 10 unique “Caverns,” all hand-built Custom Terrain. The map spans an entire 256×256 world, allowing for massive exploration and discoveries to be made. The “Hardcore” aspect comes into play throughout the entire map, often resulting in intense battles and near-death experiences in Fallen Earth’s custom Mineshaft, Nether Fortress, Witch’s House, and its 10 different biomes. You are also alone. Underground, in Crystalline Caverns, a hazardous cave-system filled with monsters and evil. Are you strong enough to complete the Final Monument?

# Complete the Monument

Complete the Monument is unlike a regular adventure map. It isn’t centered around a storyline, or puzzles. It states a long-term goal from the beginning, and that is the only goal. The Final Monument will be a place you will become very familiar over time, as you collect resources and items that you are required to place in designated areas. Exploration is key. If you don’t dare to venture deep into the Caverns, you will never be be able to gather the necessary materials to complete the map. Be brave.

# Background

Fallen Earth first took shape back at the beginning of 2012. As a Map Creator who likes to stay away from Mods and WorldEdit, I dedicated myself to create something with a wide variety of Custom Terrain built exclusively by hand. Fallen Earth was the result. I had first decided that it would be yet another adventure map to add to my ever-growing collection. It was then that I ran across Vech’s and InHaze. I fell in love with their work, and as you may noticed, I was inspired hugely by InHaze and his CTM Map, Crystal Caverns. Over the course of two years, Fallen Earth slowly took shape, and is now the best piece of work I 

Enjoy!

title: Seed (1300752478) - Ocean Monument
text:
You spawn on a small island that’s actually part of a set of islands. These aren’t anything special.

To find the monument, go to the island that’s in front of the one you spawned on. To the right of that island, you’ll find the ocean monument under the surface of the water.

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "1300752478" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap one of the download buttons above to install it automatically.

# What are seeds?

Minecraft seeds are values made up of character(s) (including negative or positive integers) that are used as the basis for generating every Minecraft world.

Suddenly in the middle of the night you wake up with a feeling that something is very wrong. As you look around you notice that everything in the city have been destroyed. Someone or some people must have attacked and been very quick about it.

All your stuff is gone and you’ve now decided to go out and find out who did this to you and your city.

title: DeathRun: Temple Madness 2.0
text:
DeathRun is a game where your fate on winning depends on how good you are at avoiding obstacles and traps. This is a multiplayer minigame where some of you will be runners and others will be the killers. It’s an extremely intense game and especially for the runners who are constantly threatened by different traps.

# How to play?

There are two different roles and each role has a unique objective to complete. 

• The Runners are tasked to reach the finish but only one player can become victorious. It’s pretty much a “every man for himself” situation.
• The Killers / Death are tasked to activate the traps that may interfere with the Runners’ path. The Killers / Death can win if the time runs out for the Runners. 

# Stages

• Grasslands
• Undertake: Part 1
• Snowy Hills
• The Fandom Project
• (New!) Temple Madness 2.0

# What's new in Temple Madness 2.0 update?

• A new level (Temple Madness 2.0) is now available to play! 
• Added more people in the Hall of Fame! 
• Added a cake in the lobby to celebrate DeathRun passing its 1st Anniversary!

title: Mined Prison: Test Subject (Chapter 2)
text:
After your previous failed attempt of escaping the prison you’ve been put in isolation for two weeks. The old warden has been replaced by a new one. Apparently he got a new use for you inside the prison as a test subject. The adventures which lay ahead might cause you to think that isolation probably was a whole lot safer than going through all this.

In the map you will be put on a test through a series of the different experiments. It makes for a varying adventure with lots of different minigames to experience.

# Story
For two weeks you’ve been stuck in an isolation cell. A key twists in the keyhole and the door opens. Light lands on your face but a shadow quickly overtakes it. The first face you see isn’t exactly pretty.

It’s the new chief warden. Chief Warden: “How’s the cell mr Smith? You getting comfy in there yet?”. You can’t help but grin when you look up at the enormously fat warden. Not because he looks funny, but the feeling of seeing a face after such a long time is incredible. So whether it’s an ugly face or not, doesn’t matter.

The uncontrollable grin quickly changes to a grunting and annoyed face when realizing it’s the chief warden. You: “Who are you?!”

Chief Warden: “I’m the new chief warden. The previous one got fired so I replaced him. Now, get out of the cell. You’ve done your time in there. I’ve got someone I’d like you to meet…”

You push yourself up against the wall, stumbling out of the cell.

# Other Chapters
• The Beginning (Chapter 1)
• Secret Service (Chapter 3)
• Training Complete (Chapter 4)

# Rules
• Don’t break/place blocks unless told so
• Change difficulty when to do so

Buy the chests from him, and see what you get!

This map also has custom music in the shop to get it more of a shop feel!

Also, there is a special cobblestone generator that spawns when you collect a certain chest, and also a crusher, that crushes cobblestone, gravel and sand.

title: Victorian Manor
text: The Victorian Manor created by Geoman! This Victorian styled mansion is completely finished from the interior to exterior! There are paths, gardens, and more outside, as well as furniture and decorator in the inside.

title: SG 4C: Original
text: SG 4C is a chunk building map where the SG team and other SkyGames Partners build their amazing creations in a chunk area. You can apply to be a SkyGames Partner or to be a SG Staff Member. The first installment of this series contain Temple, House, Storage Hut and a Bigger House.

title: Murder Run
text: This map is based on Ssundee’s popular video series where one plays as the murderer and the rest of the players have to hide. The hiders have the advantage of being able to buy traps. These traps can then be used for defending themselves against the murderer. It’s really a last person standing type of map.

title: 10 Hopper Uses
text: If you are looking for new ways to improve your redstone skills then this map will educate you on how to build machines using hoppers. Hoppers are used to catch items or transport items into or away from chests. There are lots of uses for them and here we’ll have a look at 10 different machines you can build.

title: Unthinkable Minecraft
text:
This puzzle map includes 8 different puzzles which will test your thinking process in multiple different ways. In each level you’ll find yourself in a small room no larger than 9 blocks in size. There’s only one way out and that’s through the door in front of you. However, the door is locked so you will need to find a solution for the puzzle in order to open the door.

# Creator

• YouTube: Deletric

title: The Forbidden Forest
text:
The map aims to challenge the player to survive and escape a forest filled with traps and enemies.

The map by: TenguMaster and Matsoni42.

title: Tower of the Teen Titans
text:
This map features a huge tower of the teen titans, also known as the Titans Tower.

The Titans Tower is the Teen Titans' base of operations, built by the Titans. It is located on an island in the Jump City bay. Each Titan has his or her own room.

title: Da Wae Parkour
text: Oh no! The queen has been taken by the blue Ugandan Knuckles! Find 'Da Wae' by parkouring through a series of parkours set by the Blue Ugandan Knuckles.

title: Candy Land Parkour
text:
Welcome to Candy Land Parkour!
A new parkour map inspired by pc map called christmas calendar level 19.
Your mission is find a portal to go home.

# Rules
• Don't cheat or use mods!
• Don't break or replace blocks!
• Play in peaceful

title: Drought - Western Adventure Map
text:
Drought is a western themed adventure map created by Geoman. Estimate play time 45-60 minutes. Includes parkour, puzzles, PvM, and more!

# STORY

You're lost and thirsty wondering the desert when you stubble across a town. The river is dry and the people are in dire need of water. You offer to help in exchange for somewhere to stay.

# OBJECTIVE

To restore the river and save the town.

If you like this map, follow @Geoman2247 on Twitter.

title: Redstone Boat Race
text: This map is made mainly to show some of the redstone contraptions which can be used to make your ice boat race more enjoyable. It also features a part where contraptions are shown on their own so you can copy it to your world.

title: Underwater Ruins
text:
This map is a concept of new underwater ruins included in the Aquatic Update.
It's based on Instagram footage released by Minecraft. Keep in mind that this map is just a fan-created concept!

title: 39 Furniture Ideas
text: This map showcases furniture and decoration ideas that you can decorate your house. It may not be very new, but it's worth a map that contains a collection of design ideas. It can be an inspirational map to someone.

title: The Mysterious Maze
text:
The Mysterious Maze is a fun adventure map that anyone can enjoy.

# Story

You are starting in an island on the sky.
Your mission is to go into the maze with clues in the island and see what's at the end of the maze.
Warning! There are monsters in the maze.

# Rules

• Only break/place blocks if told you to do so.
• Set difficulty on easy.
• Set render distance to minimum.
• Do not arrive to the edge of the island.
• Do not cheating.

# Creator 

• The map created by: TalMelamed
• Twitter: @Tal_Melamed

Enjoy the map and good luck!

title: Insanity Button
text: Insanity Button is a find the button minigame which includes 12 different levels. The difficulty is considered medium-easy and is suitable for anyone who like puzzles but don’t want to break their mind trying to find the solutions.

title: TNT Wars! Castle Edition (Fix)
text:
Weltome to Red vs Blue TNT Wars Castle Edition!

In this map you need to battle against eachther with your very own built TNT CANNON!
Player who dies, loses
And player who survives, WINS!

Good Luck!

# Note

• You can download the McTemplate of this map. So you can easily reset the world.

title: Awesome Medieval Castle
text: This map contains a huge medieval/old castle.

title: Minecraft Trivia 2
text:
Test your Minecraft knowledge by answering a great variety of questions. Giving the wrong answer will result in a horrible death so you better be careful when deciding on an answer. 

# Rules

• Play in survival mode
• Stay in-game, don’t make searches on the internet!
• Don’t break blocks
• Difficulty: Easy

title: Black TNT Run 2
text: Black TNT Run 2 is an intensely fun parkour and minigame map. There are 10 different levels and in each one you must get to the other side of the room by jumping on pressure plates. Every time you step on a block you got less than a second to make a decision of where to jump next. This map was created for single player use but it could be used in multiplayer as well but then it’s much more difficult to complete.

title: One Night At Frankie’s – The Revenge
text: This map is inspired by Five Nights At Freddy’s but in this map you will be in a factory trying to survive through night. But is not going to be easy because there are alive hostile animatronics roaming the factory. It’s considered a survival map with some horror elements. At this point there doesn’t seem to be much other functionalities in terms of the items and so on.

title: Working iPhone X
text:
This is a fully working recreation of the iPhone X in Minecraft.
You can interact with the creation in several different ways such as swipe to unlock or accessing some of the pre-installed apps.

# How does it work?

You can use the iPhone similarly to using a smartphone in real life.

• To turn on the phone fly up close to the power button on the side. A few moments later it will boot up.
• Swipe, also known as fly across the screen, to unlock the iPhone.
• There are several different apps which you can access by flying towards the buttons.

IMPORTANT! Requires at least 10 chunks render distance! (Change in video settings.)

title: Call of Duty NUK3TOWN BO3 KitPVP
text:
Call of Duty NUK3TOWN BO3 KitPVP (v6) By PoisonX and FloBoi

The official battlefield for any Minecrafter who enjoys Call of Duty BO3. This map has been remade block by block, from the original COD on Xbox. Credits for the map remake goes to PoisonX. In this version, I added kits scattered all around the map for players to find. Some are pretty easy to spot, while some of them take more than a second glance. Be sure to take advantage of the kill streak room, located on the east side of the map. Good luck soldier.

title: Alice - The Horror Game 2
text:
This is a horror minigame where you have to find the cross and kill Alice before being killed by Alice.
It is also a sequel map of Alice The Horror Game.

# How to play?

• When you started the game, find the Key in chest and go to the Game room.
• Compass is Useful for Alice can found easily Speed is Give you 10 seconds to run

# What's new?

• Added Key
• Added Shop
• Change Cross
• Change Map
• Alice Can Spawn in 2 Position
• Alice is Slowly if Easy Mode And Fast if Hard Mode

More information can be found on the YouTube video below.

title: Euromansion
text:
Euromanson is a beautiful mansion built in a modern style for those who appreciate comfort and roominess.
This map contains one large house, a swimming pool, a tennis court and much more.

title: Guess Who! (v3)
text:
This is a simple minigame for two players. Each player will be given a block and then try to guess the block of the other player.
The map is automated and requires two players to play.

# How to play

Take turns asking questions to try to figure out which block your friend got. You are only allowed to ask yes or no questions. You can eliminate blocks you know isn't your opponent's based on your questions.

Once you think you know your opponent's block, you can guess during your turn. If you guess correctly, you win the game. If you guess incorrectly, the other player wins.

* Blocks that have been eliminated are automatically restored at the end of the game.

title: Egypt Survival
text:
Egypt Survival is a survival map consisting of several different locations. There are 6 different locations you can visit.

# Locations

• Qattara Depression
• Great Sand Sea
• Siwa
• Giza
• The Forbidden Zone
• The End

Explore the tombs, passageways, towers and pyramids and try to complete the different quests

# Quests

• Collect loot to make sure you have enough items to successfully be able to fight all enemies to the very end
• Trade with villagers at Siwa using different currencies
• Find 4 portal blocks to make the Nether portal which will take you to The Forbidden Zone
• Make eyes of ender and build the End portal
• Find fireworks and a pair of wings and kill the ender dragon
• Look for a secret place in the End
• Go to the Achievement Hall
• Complete the tasks to earn great rewards
• Look for Explorer’s House and place the trophies in the Trophy Room to get the great rewards

title: Master Village
text:
This map is called Master Village.
It contains a windmill village, cave and rails that can ride around.

title: Stranded Deep
text:
Have you played the game Stranded Deep? No? Yea? Well, if you haven't this is a map base on the concept of Stranded Deep. You as the main character experience a plan crash, survive with what you have, good luck.
It's more fun to play with your friends in multiplayer.

Tap on the name of the creator at the top to watch the trailer for this map.

title: Lava Escape
text: You’ve found some treasures but while doing so you set of an alarm which triggered the lava defence system. This map sets you up for an intense challenge where you need to complete three different parkour courses while trying to escape lava which is pouring down from the ceiling. If you aren’t quick enough you will die!

title: Redstone Tour
text: This map includes 23 different redstone creations. Some of them include a mob farm, food farms and fountains. It’s a great way to be inspired and get some ideas what next to build in your own worlds. All of the signs in the map are in Spanish. But don’t worry, they are all quite easy to understand without reading the signs.

title: Modern Oceanfront Villa
text: This map features beautiful houses near the beach.

title: Hide and Seek: Living Room
text:
This is a fun hide-and-seek minigame taking place in a huge living room. It looks quite realistic and it will feel as if you are an ant in a huge world.

# How to play?

This map requires at least 2 players but can be played with as many players you want. At least one of the players has to be a seeker.

• The hiders should enter the living room and find a good hiding place.
• The seeker should jump into the water cobweb and wait to pass through (don’t break the cobweb). Once the seeker has passed through the cobweb he or she can start looking for other players. Found players should announce in the chat that they have been found and gather back at the starting area.

Most signs in the map are in Spanish, but it is not hard to understand this minigame.

title: Maze Journey
text:
The Maze Journey features a whole lot of different mazes all in different shapes and colors.
There is no real objective in the MCPE map other than challenging yourself by entering the different mazes. For example, you could compete against your friends who can get get out fastest.
All of the mazes are in fact quite small, but very complex built to make sure they aren’t too easily solved.
This are the first 3 levels, but there are much more levels coming soon!!

title: Rooms: E.Y.E. Is Watching
text:
Rooms is a parkour map consisting of 10 different rooms. Complete a parkour challenge the lever you will need to access the next room. There are multiple different blocks which will each give you different special abilities depending on the color.

# Special Blocks

• Gray Concrete: Neutral
• Blue Concrete: Speed
• Brown Concrete: Slowness
• Green Concrete: Jump Boost
• Black Concrete: Blindness

# Storyline

E.Y.E. is disappointed at your progress in Minecraft and have decided to bring you to a room where you may redeem yourself. Complete all of the rooms to make E.Y.E. happy. Always remember.. E.Y.E. is watching!

title: 30 Animal Home Designs
text: This map includes 30 different designs for homes which are specifically meant for animals such as dogs, cats, pigs and plenty of other animals. Even though most of them are fairly simple to build they look really cozy.

title: S.H.I.E.L.D Helicarrier PE
text:
The Helicarrier, a fictional flying aircraft carrier appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. It is depicted as the signature capital ship of the fictional intelligence/defense agency S.H.I.E.L.D.

The Avengers Helicarrier is finally here!

Its is huge! with many many rooms inside on multiple decks.
I have been working hard on this for quite a while now trying to get all the proportions right and i wanted to make it as accurate as possible, which i feel has been done right.
Inside i had to use some imagination as i had only a few images to work from. Interior rooms havent been filled due to time.

Some Highlights are the command decks, the engine rooms with arc reactors, and the hulk containment cell with working drop function. (just like the movie)

# Notes

• It was created for desktop version by VISR3, and ported into PE.
• There were some glitches due to the porting.
• If you don't mind that, download it.

title: SkyCraftPE
text:
SkyCraftPE is a survival map consisting of five floating islands in sky.
The goal is to find your way across to the other islands.

title: Vallsburg Steampunk Valley
text:
This town is dispersed with mills and levetating houses that defy the natural laws of physics. This valley is held by the back of the industry of it's engrossed harbor that caters to the areonautical sky Vessels. The murky, yet lively mines provide Vallsburg's needed materials for it's construction of goods.

There are two versions available for download.

• CSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

# Creators

• Java Edition: Team Vindicta
• Ported by: TheMrJooJo

title: SG Zombies 4 (Gun PvE)
text:
SG Zombies 4 is a PvE sequel of SG Zombies. In this map we have added guns from the Cloudy Warfare texture pack plus re-wrote the whole code so there is way less lag. It has also been created on an entire new map (By Hypixel: Towerfall) with 5 different zones and some of gates to unlock. There are more cool features and the waves are also a whole lot harder. This might be one of the most challenging sequels ever!

# How to play?

The objective is to survive all 15 waves of zombies. Gain coins by killing zombies and use the coins to unlock gates or buy items needed for surviving more levels.

# Other Maps

• SG Zombies 1
• SG Zombies 2
• SG Zombies 3
• SG Zombies 5
• SG Zombies 6

title: Hello Neighbor (Addon!)
text: This map is based on a horror survival video game called Hello Neighbor which is expected to be released some time this year. For some reason you find yourself inside your neighbor’s house and have to find a way without him catching you. It’s lots of fun and very challenging!

title: Gravity Gun Simulator
text:
You get to throw snowball at husks launching them in the air as if you had a gravity gun!

Tap the picture below to preview how it works

title: Nether Village (fix)
text: In this map you will find a nether village with double blacksmith and many nether fortresses!

title: Ultimate Sky Factory (v1.3)
text:
This is a challenging survival map where you have to start with only one tree and survive.

Key features of the map:

• Lucky Chests
• Custom Crafting
• Unique Machines
• Modded (Particles, Customised Items etc)
• Void
• Modded Villagers
• Sieve System (Ex Nihilo) 
• Quest System via Villager
• Finally a use for flint
• Rocket/Jetpack Boots
• Netherrack is now able to be sieved
• IG & SG Spawn eggs
• Updated/tweeked the villager trades
• Ticking area at spawn
• Visual updates

title: World Of Keralis PE
text:
This map is modern city map.

I port this map to pe :)
I think it is pretty cool :D
I ported the most important/beautifull buildings :)
There was a little chunk error:(

title: Choose Your Fate
text:
This is a mini game called Choose Your Fate.

# Rules

• Choose one option
• Don't cheat
• Don't break blocks
• do /spawnpoint on diamond blocks

It is very difficult. Play on easy mode.

Have Fun!

# Note

You can download the McTemplate of this map. So you can easily reset the world.

title: McDonalds Map
text:
This map created the McDonald's store and farm in Minecraft.
The map uses lamps as lights and a freezer room with lights that you can switch on and off with a lever. It also has an epic modern farm.

# What This Map Features

• Freezer Room
• Working Lights
• McDonalds Logo
• Counter
• Deep Fryer
• Seats & Tables
• Redstone
• Toilet
• Parking
• Drive Thru
• Toilet
• Drive Thru & Parking
• Farm (Ride the minecart track)

# What The Farm Has

To get to the farm ride the minecart track at the side of the McDonalds.

• Working Cow Machine
• Modern Farm House

title: Murder Mystery by Blade
text:
Murder Mystery is a map that allows you to play with your friends as a killer and witness.
Depending on the teleport coordinates you choose, you become a killer or a witness.
The killer must kill the witnesses, and the witnesses must escape.

On the map, you can find rules and how to play.
Up to 4 players can enjoy together.

title: King of the Jungle
text:
King of the Jungle – A King of the Ladder Minigame

In this jungle themed King of the Ladder minigame (2-4 players), the goal is to reach the top of the vines before your friends. Jump off the platform and onto the vines where you can either fight for the chests or race straight to the top. Don’t fall off though, or you’ll end up dying in the fiery pit.

There are multiple ways to play but the one recommended is: Set a timer for 5 minutes, the one reaming at the top when the timer ends wins. Have fun!

Created By: Geoman
Twitter: @Geoman2247

title: Tomb Crafter Adventure
text: Experience a great adventure to find Oliver Wood's bow and the legendary sword Excalibur. A great adventure that includes parkour but also fight all in one!

title: Extreme Parkour 1
text: This map will put your parkour skills to the extreme. We have introduced cobweb parkour and neo jumps. With parctice you will be able to do. All jumps are possible. We have added some Easter eggs. Have fun.

title: Garden Of Eden
text:
This map is a beautiful creation made with the concept of Garden of Eden.

There are two versions available for download.

• Simple Shader applied version
• Original version

title: Everyone Run 2 (Beta)
text:
If you have played Everyone Run, you should know what it is. This is a second version of it with longer track and added some features. You will spawn with Speed V, Jump Boost V. If not, get them by pressing the pressure plates over the command block. You need to run to the end by those effects. This is a beta test version of the map, which means there might be bugs.

# How to play?

This map requires at least two players (unless you want to compete against yourself of course). Once all players have spawned in the world make sure all of you got the following potion effects active: Speed V, Jump Boost V, and Night Vision.

Then one of you should press on the button at the redstone lamp to begin the countdown. It’s entirely powered by redstone so all you have to do is just for a few seconds before starting to run.

title: Seed (Trynase3d) - Cave, Island
text:
Seed (Trynase3d) - Big Cave, Desert Island    

When you use this you will find yourself stranded on a small desert island with a small amount of resources nearby. Build a boat and travel to the next island to find a large cave, some animals and a few trees.

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "Trynase3d" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap one of the download buttons above to install it automatically.

# What are seeds?

Minecraft seeds are values made up of character(s) (including negative or positive integers) that are used as the basis for generating every Minecraft world.

title: Heist Master
text: You used to be a professional hacker, but you were fired. In need of money, you hack a bank to get its vault code. You will enter the vault, complete the rooms, and get all the moolah you want! Also, after comleting the map, there is a subway where you can go to my 15 x 15 redstone build, which will be your new house! Try to find all of the restone contraptions. Finally, if you look hard enough in the bank, you can find a Behind The Scenes ride! Enjoy! Stay Cat-Like!

title: Meteor Invasion Hunger Games
text: Meteor Invasion Hunger Games is based on an "alien invasion" on a small village, making any human structure abandoned and outgrown by plants and vines. The map has a balanced amount of chest loot around the map, epic structures and interesting secrets the deeper inside the map.

title: Lexerland (v3)
text:
Lexerland (previously known as Lexercity) includes one city and several other different parts worth exploring.

# What have been updated in v3?

• Added The IAMA complex (IAMA Tower + IAMA tower)
• Added harbour walls/fence to surround the bay in LexerCity
• Replaced normal glass with stained glass on some buildings
• Added LBTV (Lexerland Broadcast & Television)
• Added Jhayville Embassy, ItsRamin Republic Embassy, Peaceland Embssy & Avrin Embassy
• Improved roads and infrastructure
• Added Lexerland Police Departement, Lexerland National Court & LexerCity Public Library
• Added New shops to the Shard Mall
• Reclaimed land for LIA Airport amd added a second runway.
• And much more!

title: Mined Prison: The Beginning (Chapter 1)
text:
Mined Prison is prison break adventure map. The story goes that you’ve been framed for a murder and put in prison for life. Now you want to escape and get your freedom back.

The map offers choice based decisions which will affect the continued situations in the map (such as interactions with guards). The adventure goes on for a long while and follow a great story. As you progress in the map your desire for freedom will grow and the end of your adventure will unwantingly feel closer.

# Story
You have been framed for murder and put in a high security prison called Mined Prison for life. Your chances of ever seeing your family outside the prison walls have been reduced to zero the moment you stepped inside the prison. But you have no intention to stay in there any longer than necessary so you are planning a prison break. Try to find an exit..

# Rules
• Don’t break blocks (except for clay blocks!)
• No mods
• Don’t turn clay into clay blocks to place them
• Try to find all the emeralds (a fun little extra mission!)

title: Dropper IB 4
text: Dropper IB 4 is Dropper with epic levels in one stage you have 4 levels you must collect all 4 levers to go in next stage check it out !!!

title: The Walls (PvP)
text:
The Walls is a type of survival game suited for at least four players. There will be four different teams and each one will spawn on a different location. Surrounding each team’s base is a huge wall. For the next 10 minutes players will have to gather resources and craft new items. And all of this needs to happen before the walls fall and the final battle takes place.

# How to play?

Each team will be faced with a 10-minute challenge to collect the resources needed for crafting weapons and other items which are useful for PvP.
Once the time is up the walls will fall and next a battle with break out. The team that is the last one standing is the winner of the game.

title: Asian Empire
text: The legendary city of Shen Yuan has turned into a country. Hope you love it!

title: Desert Oasis (Concept)
text:
This map includes a cool concept for a desert oasis which maybe similar to woodland mansions could appear in Minecraft. A desert oasis is basically a small area of vegetation which surrounds a small water source. It would be really cool if these generated in vast desert biomes with plenty of sand. Sure, deserts are already known for desert temples and wells but this would make it even better.

This is just a concept and not an official idea.

title: Self-Building Mansion
text: This is a great creation to use in case you want an easy way to hide your house from possible intruders while you are out fighting monsters or down in the mines looking for diamonds. You don’t need to be a technical genius to do it either since all you’ll need to do is to press two different buttons to build or collapse the house.

title: Ship Wars
text:
Ship Wars is a fun PvP map that requires at least two players.

# How to play?

• You will be separated on two different floating ships
• The objective is simply to destroy the other team’s ship.
• you can use three different weapons which each cause a different type of damage.

# weapons

• Dynamite Stick (explosive) = Egg
• Lightning Staff (lightning) = Snowball
• Bow and Arrow (causes fire)

title: Rural Retreat
text:
Explore a millionaire’s rural paradise — a secluded British manor house set within a forest with expansive grounds and amenities. This complex has a completed exterior and interior. The interior will be fully updated on this map’s next and final update. Please comment below if you would like to add anything to the final update.

# Creator

• Twitter: @The_Crazy_Titan

title: Escape From School
text:
This is a short escape map called Escape From School.

# Story

It's the last week of school, you're tired of school, so you decided to leave school. Your mission is to leave school.

# Rules

• Difficulty Peaceful
• Gamemode 0 (Survival)

title: Noah Edward Books
text: This map is based on the Noah Edward book series.

title: Escapists: The Prison of Minecraft
text:
Use your cunning escape skills and help from your prison-mates to eventually escape the prison! Gain emeralds and buy an axe to cut down the wood wall hidden among the station. To win this unique and well-made map, you will need to steal the warden’s ship at the end of the map. Flick the lever and the ship’s control panel and you win!

# Storyline

You were once part of the defense force of America, but you were fired and thrown into the global prison of space after you were caught passing information to a spy. The prison lies in Earth’s orbit and the only escape is the warden’s personal ship. You don’t play to stay long.

title: Future City
text: Future City is jaw-dropping creation featuring several futuristic looking skyscrapers and other advanced buildings one would imagine exist in a large city maybe twenty years ahead in the future. Parts of the city has been built out in the water and the one thing connecting the entire thing together is a tube of some sort perhaps inspired by the Hyperloop.

title: Entity_505 The New Terror
text:
You have a great day until this day gone bad.... because a mystery portal appears outside your tree house.... what kind of adventure will start?.... you will see it when you will play the map/

• Creator: GunnerbossGR  
• Texture Creator: GunnerbossGR

title: Special Block Parkour
text:
This is a very hard parkour map made out of special blocks. No normal blocks are used. As in no building blocks.

# Creator

Subscribe and turn on notifications to see me play my maps and see special spoilers for future maps. Merch available on the teeser app!

• YouTube: Countryballer34

title: The Darkest Halls
text:
A horror map that implements multiple features from the horror genre, from jumpscares to dark paths that seem to never end, if you want a dose of shock, try this map out! Find out where X is, and can you guess who he is?

Made by The Obsidian Gemstone and Cheete.

title: The Parkour 2
text:
Welcome to The Parkour 2

You can see the rules and how to play in the map.

title: Parkour Madness
text: Parkour Madness is unsurprisingly a parkour map where several life-threatening challenges await. Lava and zombies are normal occurrences in the map. There are a couple of checkpoints scattered around the map but they are on few locations which make every jump incredible important (and dangerous).

title: Jgames Modern Mansion
text: This map features a three-story modern mansion. The house is well decorated, and there is a small swimming pool and a car outside the house.

title: World Flags Map
text: This map has all of the flags that you guys requested in my previous armor stand maps. The flags I have are America, Canada, Russia, Germany, Australia, New Zealand, England, Greece, Japan, and Great Britain.

title: The Ender Elytra
text:
This is an awesome elytra map which includes a multitude of flying challenges which are for the most part very difficult (at least as soon you get past the first levels). It’s an ender themed map which means it includes structures which are in some way inspired by the End. As a whole, it is a very difficult map especially because there are no checkpoints and lots of traps.

# How to play?
You can either play this map together with friends or by yourself. That’s completely up to you. But before you start playing do yourself the favor of equipping a pair of elytra wings.

• In air press jump once to activate the wings

The objective is very simple. All you need to do is to fly through the rings or other types of structures on the way.

# Rules
• Survival mode
• Set difficulty to peaceful
• Don’t break blocks
• Go through all rings

Creators: DanFlex, NetherBrine, BubbleGirlRox

title: Riverside Survival House
text:
This map features a small but beautiful survival house on the riverside.

There are two versions available for download.

• Grendale (16x) texture pack applied version
• Original version

title: Kit PvP V2

This fun kit pvp map includes a variety of custom made kits, all using command blocks! Fight with over 15 free kits and collect coins to purchase stronger kits to destroy your opponents in every way! 
Keep track of stats in a new stat room!
Gamble your coins in the fully customized casino!
Safe your coins in a safe and keep them for later!
Purchase trails to make your character look awesome!
New kits are added all the time, and look forward to new maps every other week!
If you have any ideas or concerns email us at akazestc@gmail.com

title: 7 Rainbow Parkour (v2)

This map is a parkour map with 7 different levels in red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, blue and purple. The difficulty varies from levels (you may have a hard time on the yellow level because there are bunch of head-hitting jumps). The levels are short. You’ll get an object for each level. Have fun!!!

• Fixed the bug in level 7 that if the players fall they can’t go back

title: Anteiku (Tokyo Ghoul)

Anteiku was a small neighbourhood cafe in the Tokyo Ghoul series.
This map is a simple mix of anime Tokyo Ghoul with Anteiku.

# Rules

Hope you enjoy!

title: Modern Apartment Design Ideas
text:
There are five modern apartment design ideas on this map. Each building is well decorated, not only on the outside but also on the inside.

If you plan to build a modern apartment building in your map, you may be inspired by this map.

title: Egaland
text: Egaland is a modern city and actually one of the oldest ones for Minecraft PE which is still being updated regularly. The city consists mostly of colorful skyscrapers and other large housing objects but there are also awesome creations such as a museum and an airport which you can explore.

title: PvP SkyWars
text:
This is a PvP map where you can fight against other players on various small islands above the sky.

# How to play

Explore these small islands and find pressure plates. There are different events for each pressure plate. For example, you might get armor or weapons, or you might get poisoned. Using these events is very helpful for PvP.

# Translations

This map is in Portuguese, but there are not many signs to read, and you will naturally learn to play. If you want to know what they mean, you can refer to the translations below.

Mapa feito por RailsonPlay6
= Map made by RailsonPlay6

procure meios de conseguir armas e armaduras.
= Find weapons and armor

Obrigado por baixar
= Thank you for downloading

compartilhe meu mapa.
= Share my map

cuidado em no que você pisa.
= Careful in what you tread.

Veneno!
= Poison!

perigo
= Danger

title: Sky Airport
text:
This map is made up of several tracks: two in height and three on the ground. You can take off and land on these tracks, but you will need elytra. Good flies; )

# Tips

• We advise you to take a potion of speed, an pair of elytra and a map.
• Remember the coordinates to teleport (Look around the spawn point.)
• The beacons represent the runways

# Custom Elytra Wings

• Resource Packs used in screenshot: Watcher (Red), Inferno (Yellow), Dragon Skull
• These resource packs were created by Paradiscal.
• If you want more elytra wings resources, search 'elytra' in the search tab.

title: Burn the Food!
text:
This is a burning map about surviving inside a build (in this case, food) while lava is pouring down. You can try to kill or knock off the other player(s) to win. You need to find special items to help you. There are classes that you can choose from to help you win.

Map made by OneGirlGamer11

title: Pitfall! PE
text: Pitfall! is a classic video game released back in 1982 for the Atari 2600 console. The map is inspired by this game and the obstacles and goals are similar. Simply put, you need to get past a bunch of different obstacles by the use of parkour and collect all treasures (or gold ingots). Your score is judged based on how many gold ingots you have in the end of the map.

title: Tomb Crafter 6: Lost Temple
text: Tomb Crafter 6: Lost Temple is an amazing adventure map in which you’ve traveled to an old forgotten temple in search for another ancient artifact known as the Royal Mask.

Legend of Zelda (The Legend of Minecraft - Adventure of Steve)

title: FNAF Sister Location

title: 6x6 Sky Islands Survival
text:
Survive on only these 10 islands? Expand each one and slowly become more advanced in this map. 

The main objective of the game is to survive on the given islands. And there are some challenges.

# Challenges

1. Expand each island as much as you can.
2. Create a tree farm.
3. Make a 3 story house.
4. Make a wheat, carrot, beetroot and sugarcane farm.
5. Activate the Nether.
6. Make a mob spawner. (Empty dark space)
7. Make a mob grinder.
8. Find all of the emeralds. (One hidden on each island)
9. Collect a total of 20 diamonds.
10. Find the secret island! (A bit of work needed here..)
11. Explore all 10 islands FULLY. (Over and under)

title: Survival Abang Adek
text: This map features small houses and farms in a town far from the city.

title: SG EasterFest
text:
This map includes five different Easter games. It’s entirely up to you whether you play it together with other players, or alone by yourself. However, for some games you’ll need at least two players. Happy Easter!

# Minigames

• Egg Hunt: Package Hunt!
• Egg Defense: Protect the eggs from the groups of zombies!
• Egg and Seek: Hide and Seek!
• Steal the Egg: Capture the Flag!
• SwitchPvP: Battle in teams and get randomly switched with other enemy team mebers!

title: Hand Island
text: Hand Island is a huge island shaped as the palm of a hand. At the main center of the island you will find a forest and some mountains. And at the fingers (which are basically peninsulas) you’ll find a hilly terrain with beach coastlines and trees. Surrounding the island there is a huge ocean.

title: Mob Battle Arena
text:
Hey guys here's a new map: 3 it's a very hard Mob Battle Arena with 4 levels: easy-impossible you need to destroy all the spawners in each level to enter the next.

You may experience many failures. It's very hard :P 

I hope you will enjoy!

# Notes

title: Treasure Hunt
text:
This is a fun adventure map called Treasure.
It is quite difficult.

# Storyline

It was late at night and you were reading a boot about treasure. You turned the page and you saw that their is an unfound treasure, so you thought by yourself I should go look for it. And you did. you were travelling for months and finally you found this place, you know for sure that the treasure is here. But ...

# Rules

• Don't break any blocks unless told to do so
• Don't cheat
• Don't place any blocks unless told to do so

title: Zombie Extreme
text: Zombie Extreme is the ultimate training to prepare for the apocalypse. There three different arenas and in each one you will be equipped with a customized weapon (MP5) which you can use to shoot the incoming zombies. You’ll also have non-player teammates who will help you out. But don’t trust them too much. Once they die, they will also become zombies!

title: Sepzak-Class Carrier
text:
Sepzak-Class Carrier by Skallord

title: BeatBox 64 (Note Block Sequencer)
text:
Welcome to BeatBox 64

BeatBox 64 is a noteblock sequencer set in 4/4 time. at it’s core is a 64 tick clock that powers 512 noteblocks, each of which can be turned on and off with the flip of a lever.

• 64 tick duration
• 512 noteblocks 
• Tuning corridors for easy tuning
• Create simple beats, songs, or full on wall of sound

Comes fully tuned with my own original song “Last March of the Nostalgia Machine”

Let’s make some music!

* Note: Due to updates with noteblocks from 0.15.0+, the whole progression cannot be heard in one spot. To hear the song as it plays, stand in the center and fly up or down to follow the sound.

title: Advanced TNT Cannon
text: This is an advanced TNT cannon which is really useful if you want to set up a defense for your base. For example, maybe you are going to play a TNT wars then it would be a good idea to build this machine as it lets you fire TNTs in 8 different directions!

title: Seed (6543296) - 2 Ravines, Mineshaft
text:
This is a great seed if you want to explore the ravines and abandoned mineshaft near the ocean.

# How to use?

• Before creating the world, enter "6543296" in the "Seed" field of the "Game Settings".
• Or, tap one of the download buttons above to install it automatically.

# Ravine

Ravines are a new type of randomly generated terrain which can occur mostly everywhere. This time it has been generated very close to the ocean.

# What are seeds?

Minecraft seeds are values made up of character(s) (including negative or positive integers) that are used as the basis for generating every Minecraft world.

title: God Items (Command Blocks)
text:
This is a command block creation which adds three items with godly powers. You can only use the items as long you are within a certain area of the machine. But it’s still definitely a pretty cool creation to explore.

You can activate each weapon’s feature by holding it in your hand.

• Lightning Sword – lightning
• Destroyer Sword – digs a 3×3 hole in the ground
• Killer Sword – lightning and one-shots most enemies

It's a great map to explore, and it's also good for role-playing.

If you use this map for survival, there are a few rules to get started.
First, go into the shack (with TNT blocks scattered around) behind the Athena cabin. choose a weapon from there. then, choose a cabin.

title: The Lab
text:
The Lab is a challenging adventure, puzzle and parkour map with a very different (but funny) storyline. During an experiment to create a growth serum for pigs the scientist accidently added the wrong ingredient causing the pig to behave very angrily.

This wasn’t noticed until the pig had grown to an enormous size and destroyed most parts of the lab and was now on its way to destroy the city as well. Who could have thought that a giant pig would be the one and most difficult threat to the survival of the human race?

# Storyline

A scientist have for quite some time being doing experiments with pigs in several attempts to create a growth serum. In the most recently experiment the scientist accidently put the wrong ingredient in the growth serum which caused the pig to grow to incredible size but at the same time become really strong and mad.

No one took notice until it was too late and the pig has wrecked the entire lab and a big part of the city. The Minecraftian government have you put on the task to go in there, find the pig and solve the problem.

# Rules

• Don’t break blocks
• Set difficulty to peaceful

title: The Building Game
text:
The Building Game - Inspired By The PC Minigame!

Welcome To The Building Game!

This is a minigame map inspired by Sethbling who created The Building Game on the PC version of Minecraft! This minigame may or may not improve your building skills!

# Rules

There are little to no rules in this map, but there are 2 ways to play it:

• Free Building: Build whatever you want, and after your done you will try to find out what the other person has built!
• Write & Build: Write down what to build in a room, then switch to the room on the right/left and build what the other person has wrote!

# Other things to know

• You can play with up to 1-4 players
• Sadly I didn't build more rounds, so it only has one :/
• I do not tell you what to build it depends on you. You are the one who builds. So if you decide to build something very, well gross so be it!

title: Automatic Piston House
text: This is a redstone house with 30+ Piston Mechanisms. And don’t forget the under ground elevator.

title: ZaMiBy - A Small Village
text: This map features a small village with various types of houses.

title: Jetpack Elytra Course
text:
This is an elytra minigame which makes use of the new rocket boosters (also known as firework rockets) in version 1.2 for Minecraft. It works similar to other elytra games we’ve posted in the past except that in this one you will be able to use the firework rockets to propel yourself faster. It’s a really good practice course for anyone who want to refine their elytra skills!

# Firework Rocket

When you hold a firework rocket in your hand and are gliding with elytra, using the firework rocket will boost the flying speed.
It might take a few tries before you get it right and learn how to do it.

* In my experience, when I'm gliding, tap and hold the screen once or twice to activate the rocket.

title: Mine Golf
text:
Welcome to Mine Golf!
Your objective is to put golf balls in holes. Simple?

# Rules

• Don't break blocks
• Don't jump over obstacles
• Always start at dark green carpets
• Play on peaceful

# How to play?

• Take a golf ball from a chest.
• Stand on dark grass area.
• Hold down the slot that contains the golf ball.

Tap the picture below to preview how to play.

Good luck!

This map was created by marcusogarte2.
If you enjoy it, follow @marcusogarte2 on Twitter.

It’s a really fun mix of gameplay where you’ll start out building a castle and then fight to protect it in a battle. The main objective for both teams are to protect an obsidian block. title: Pacman The Minecraft Version

Pac-Man is one of the most popular video games of all time and it’s probably safe to say that it’s common knowledge to most gamers. This minigame lets you take the role as Pac-Man in a maze where your objective is to find 51 blocks of gold.

title: Quest of the Assassin
text:
A big adventure map inspired by Assassin's Creed!

# Storyline

You woke up in a small and dark room with no memory of who you were. Suddenly a voice spoke to you. It said that you have been kidnapped and you are in the kidnappers compound. You had to find a way out.

Enjoy and Have fun!

text: Tomb Crafter 5: Sphinx is the fifth map in an on-going adventure maps series. This time you’ve been sent on a mission to Egypt where you are visiting the ancient pyramids. Your quest is to find three ancient golden artefacts. There is also an extra quest in which you must find 12 emeralds to decipher a secret code which will lead you to a secret room.

title: Bikini Bottom City
text:
Bikini Bottom is a fictional city that is the main setting of SpongeBob SquarePants. Located at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean, it is where the series' main characters live, and where most of the episodes take place.

This is an amazing map to explore. It includes most of the locations as seen in the animated TV series.

This map is from the PC version. So there may be some parts that are not ported properly. But if you ignore them, it's a great map to enjoy.

Find and destroy is a fun and easy game you can play the either singleplayer or multiplayer the map also has seven levels.

The objective of the game is to find and destroy the gold block in order to go to the next level.

title: Half Heart Challenge
text: Welcome to Half Heart Challenge, a short yet tough parkour map. Your objective is simple: find the wooden button to progress to the next level. You only have one half a heart, so you have to avoid taking any damage. Complete all 8 levels to beat the map.

title: Volcanic Desert KitPvP
text:
This is a medium sized player vs. player map which is suitable for a large group of players. There are 10 different kits to choose between and most of it is designed to let the players decide the way they want to play themselves. It’s great map if you want to improve on your fighting skills while having some fun with your friends!

How to play?
Begin by picking one of the 10 different classes. You may only change your class once a round has ended. Each class get a unique set of weapons and armor.

Make sure that all players are spread out all over the arena. Then start a countdown from 5 before ultimately starting the round. The objective is to eliminate all other players/teams.

The player/team who is last standing is the winner. You can replay the many times as you want. If you ever run out of kits then make sure to download the world template to reuse the map.

There are a couple of hidden passages throughout the map. For example, here is one. Jump into the lava and see for yourself!

Rules
• Don’t mix kits
• Don’t use the drops from killed players
• No camping

Creators: Cody2074, Logan2922, Madrussian

title: Hide And Seek - SpongeBob Movie
text:
It’s a hide-and-seek map taking place inside the SpongeBob movie. You’ll start out at a movie theater and from there you can enter a boxed-in world which features some of the SpongeBob characters. This type of minigame is best suitable for multiplayer gameplay.

# Creators

• Creator: Emzy255
• Ported by: TrueTriz

title: Sewer Boat Race
text:
Compete against your friends in a sewer race and find out who will win the honorable title as the sewer rat champion.

# Rules

• Set difficulty to peaceful
• Don’t destroy blocks
• Play at night

title: Pokemon Kanto Region for PE
text:
The Kanto region (Japanese: カントー地方 Kantō-chihō) is a region of the Pokémon world.

I based the majority of Kanto off of the HGSS maps, but the gym leaders and elite four are taken from RBGY. I chose to show Cinnabar Island post-destruction by volcano because it enabled me to build something new rather than just another town. The safari zone from RBGY remains (Baoba hasn't moved to Johto yet). All caves are explorable, though only Cerulean Cave and Victory Road are completely accurate to the games. Almost all buildings are enterable and all interiors are decorated.

The map isn't perfect; I began the map thinking I would make everything full-size to most accurately represent the games. Past Viridian City and Pewter City buildings are a bit smaller. The map is quite flat as well (though this is mainly due to the source material!). I did not make the Sevii Islands or any Johto areas yet … perhaps I'll get started on those soon!

Thanks to my sisters for the help with this map. Please leave feedback, we would love to hear what you think! Have fun and thanks for reading! 

# Features

• Red's House in Pallet Town (aka the spawn point)
• Vermillion City and the S.S. Anne
• Pewter City Gym
• Cerulean Cave: could Mewtwo be here?!

title: Cute Songs (Noteblock)
text:
This is a redstone map which features five different songs which each last for somewhere between 20 to 30 seconds. It’s a fun little showcase to see a few different possibilities of the type of music you can create in Minecraft just by using redstone. I think all of them are actually Indonesian songs but since I am not Indonesian I cannot say that with 100% certainty.

How to play the songs?
Press the button at each creation to start playing the song. Keep in mind that you have to keep following the redstone signal in order to hear the entire song with no loss of sound.

title: Heavenly Palace
text:
This is an impressive creation featuring a huge table and clouds surrounding it.
This map is a commemorative creation designed to celebrate one of the Chinese holiday.

title: Parkour Advancer
text: Parkour Advancer is a map consisting of tens of stages which takes place in everywhere from shabby sewers to all sorts of different biomes. It’s a really well thought out map with medium-hard obstacles and amazing looking builds. The combination of challenging parkour and epic creations results in a top notch experience. It’s well worth it so make sure to try it out.

title: 10 Advanced Redstone Creations
text: This map includes 10 different advanced redstone creations. Some of them are essential to build at some point in time since they will allow you to more easily keep track of the different items you’ve collected throughout your life span in Minecraft. Redstone is pretty much the key to reach maximum efficiency and to be able to much quicker reach the End (in a positive way).

title: Soccer Game (v2.0)
text:
This map was inspired by the famous hypixel game (football) with lots of fun.

All signs in the map are in Spanish, but you can easily find out how to play the game.
Tap on the picture below to see a short video that shows how to start the game.

A special add-on was used for this map, in which the chicken was replaced by a soccer ball, and feathers were replaced by soccer shoes.
There are also drinks to improve speed and jump, so you can use it when you need it during the game.

How to play the game is simple. If you hit the soccer ball with the soccer shoes in your hand, the soccer ball will goes forward. If you put a soccer ball in your opponent's goalpost, you win.

title: Five Nights at Candy’s
text: Five Nights at Candy’s is a fangame of Five Nights at Freddy’s. It was created by a creative individual under the name of Emil Macko. It’s similar to the FNAF games but the story is different and takes place after Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza was closed. As a result new space in the restaurant industry opened up for Candy’s. It’s a different joint but with similar daunting animatronics.

title: Frosty Spleef
text: Spleef is a multiplayer minigame where the objective is to destroy blocks below other players, causing them to fall off platforms and die. This map is suitable for 5+ players since it is a fairly large map which includes multiple layers of platforms.

title: The Subterranean Facility
text:
Explore the unknown facility.
Go through different sectors.
Find your way out.

The NXUS Subterranean Facility is a futuristic adventure/escape map. 
It contains about 30-40 mins of gameplay.
There are simple parkour elements, lots of exploring and many other things to discover.

title: Easy Rainbow Parkour
text:
This is a Parkour map around 2-4 minutes. Good for videos. Made for WorldofGamingTV1 and JackFrostMiner.

Rainbow parkour includes the following:

• Parkour (Obviously)
• Sprinting Route
• Rainbows
• Budder (Gold)
• Tiny Puzzles
• 2-3 block jumps
• Mini Underground Route
• Long Falls.

It is a fun map for beginners and people who are tired of difficult parkour.

title: Crazy's Redstone Creations
text: This is an awesome redstone showcase map with 32 different creations.

title: Advanced Redstone Mansion
text: This map features an amazing mansion which is fully powered by redstone. Before entering it you will need to bypass the lava door by deactivating with a passcode. Inside the mansion you will find more than 30 different redstone powered systems including everything from an automatic stove to automatic farms and smart decorations.

title: Wizard PVP
text:
This is a PvP minigame that can be played together for up to 6 players. 
Play this map with your friends to test your wizard skills!

# Instruction

1. Choose your side

• Slitherin (Black)
• Grifindor (Red)

2. Take wand and food as needed.

• Sharpen Wand (Shapenness V)
• Leviousa Wand (Knockback V)
• Potato

3. Sleep in bed and enter the arena in the morning.

# Tips

• There are chests which contain useful potions scattered around the arena.

title: Mansion On The Island
text:
This map features a huge mansion on the island.

There are two versions available for download.

• Flow's HD applied version
• Original version

title: Jump And Run (vol.1)
text:
This map is a short and simple parkour map.
If you are a beginner or like a simple minigame map, try it out.

title: BedWars 3v3v3v3
text:
This is a bed wars map that can be enjoyed together for up to 12 people.

The goal of the game is to defeat the other teams.
Destroy other teams beds so that they cannot spawn after death.
Once all other teams beds are destroyed and players defeated, you win!

# Tips

• You can get infinite supply of swords, bows, and arrows through the command blocks in your base.
• There are wools in chests in each base. Place them and move the islands.
• There are a lot of resources on the middle island. Get them ahead of other teams.

title: Medieval Island Village
text: This is a medieval island situated out in the ocean with no mainland to be seen anywhere close to it. The island got a farm, multiple houses, a small harbor and even a few secrets hidden around on the islands (both underwater and on the island).

title: Boat On Ice Race
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.2 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.2 or higher before downloading.

Get ready for some bobsledding in Minecraft! This is a racing map in which you will preferably compete against other players in a race on ice. You’re vehicle will be an ordinary boat which when placed on ice will slide and the real pros will be able to reach incredible speeds!

# How to play?

This game is suited for anywhere between 2-5 players. It’s not your ordinary type of boat race. The main difference is that you will be traveling on ice! And as a result, you will be able to reach much higher speeds than ever possible in the water.

The main objective is to be the one to first reach the finish line and place down your wool block.

title: Happy Never After Coaster!
text:
The Happy Never After coaster is an incredible Minecraft PE rollercoaster that will take you on a spooky journey though a darker side of Minecraft.
Enjoy!

title: KitPVP Unlimited
text:
KitPVP Unlimited is a simple PvP minigame. You can choose one of four classes.

• Sword Man
• Archer Man
• Armor Man
• Speed Man

If you have selected a class, you will enter the arena and defeat the opponent. If you die, you can choose a class again in the lobby and enter the arena. And get revenge!

title: More TNT Command
text:
* This map only works with Minecraft PE version 1.0.5 or later.
* Please make sure Minecraft PE version is 1.0.5 or higher before downloading.

This map is a command block creation which replaces some spawn eggs with powerful destructive items.

# Features

• Normal TNT
• Double TNT
• Super TNT
• Ultra TNT
• Nuke
• Speed Boost
• Clear Lag
• Lightning Bolt
• ThunderBolt

title: Small Beach House
text:
Hello! This is a beach house I made. 
I hope you enjoy it as much as I did building it!
There is a secret loot room. Try to find it!

title: Caverns - Skywars PE
text:
This is a kind of SkyWars map, consisting of 8 small islands and a big island in the middle.
Each island has many resources that can be mined. Your goal is to mine the resources, conquer the other islands and survive until the end.

This map can be played up to 8 players.
SkyWars is a multiplayer mini-game map that you have to fight against other players in the islands above the sky.

title: Confetti Dropper
text: Confetti Dropper is a fun minigame map with 8 different dropper challenges.

title: Escape - Maze And Parkour
text:
Welcome to Escape! The only way out is by completing all of the challenges. Can you do it?

• Up to four players!
• 3 crazy mazes!
• 3 crazy parkour courses!
• All jumps are possible without mods.

Have fun!

title: Texture Review Map (v1.2.1)
text: A creative map for texture reviews

title: Kex-Class Bulk Freighter
text:
This is a cool space fighter ship! It was originally made for the PC version by Skallord and now is ported to PE! Enjoy!

There are two versions available for download.

• SSPE Shaders applied version
• Original version

title: Find The Button: Animals Edition
text:
This map features 10 different levels based on animals in Minecraft.

# How To Play

The objective in each level is to find a button that has been hidden somewhere in the level. When you find it, press it to continue to the next level. There’s a hint book which you can read in case that you get stuck on any level. It works for both single player mode and multiplayer. Play in adventure an peaceful gamemodes. Have fun!

title: Roller Coaster Illusionary V.2
text: A fantastic illusion rollercoaster map!

title: SG Mega Games (125 Games)
text:
Hey Cloudies! We now have a 1.4 Survival server! Join for some awesome aquatic anarchy fun!  bedrock.pig.sg

SG Mega Games, The BEST Minigame Tournament Map! With 125 Minigames and many more to come! The possibilities are almost endless, literally, There are over 1 Vigintillion Game Orders!
Play with up to 8 friends, or play solo! We have the following features:

• 125 Games
• 5 Points to Win! (Scoreboard is displayed in the middle of the arena with pillars)
• 1-8 Player Games
• Extreme Randomizer (Games will not seem like they are repeating)
• Celebration for Winner!
• Lag Free (For high-end devices, Not androids or kindles)

Many updates are sure to come! Enjoy!

title: Shape of You - Noteblock Song
text:
The map is made up of hundreds of redstones and note blocks and is designed to play Shape of You by Ed Sheeran.
Press the button at the orange wool to play the song.

title: Akademi High School
text: Welcome to Akademi High School, a highly prestigious school institute! For now, the map features the school from Yandere Simulator, and includes the garden, track, and some unfinished structures. Some of the unfinished buildings are the gym and the locker room. However, the map is great for roleplay, and if there are any  suggestions, please contact me. Thank you for your time!

title: Modern Villa #6
text:
Modern Villa Series 6 by emilup

Hope you love it!

title: Guide The Sheep
text:
One day you were conducting an experiment with your pet sheep, but something went horribly wrong and your lab burst into flames. You must now guide your sheep through multiple obstacles and stages and try to escape the lab before you and your sheep go down with it. Good luck!

# Rules

• Use wheat to guide the sheep
• Play on peaceful

title: Sky Survival Islands
text:
This map spawns you on a skyblock island with very little resources. It’s up to you to use whatever survival skills you’ve got to survive for as long as possible.

The objective is to find a way to survive and gradually explore the other islands across the map. It’s not just the blocks you can use to survive but there is also a mob spawners which make sure you never run out of mobs.

title: Resource Testing Mega World
text:
* THIS IS NOT A GAME

Use only for developers.
And people who want to test textures.

Useful map for testing resources and models in minecraft. This map includes ALL the blocks, items and mobs in minecraft, sorted by:

# blocks

• nature
• wooden
• glass
• others

# Redstone

• Rails
• Droppers
• Pistons
• Command and structure blocks

# items

• Stuff
• Misc
• Armor
• Weapons
• Potions
• Arrows
• Particles!!

Full version includes all the mobs.
But causes lag. (must use a high device with enough RAM)
Maybe I forgot one block, tell me which one :)
